analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_08.01.001/1 svāyambhuvasyeha guro vaṃśo 'yaṃ vistarāc chrutaḥ
analyzed: svāyambhuvasya iha guro vaṃśaḥ yam vistarāt śrutaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.001/3 yatra viśvasṛjāṃ sargo manūn anyān vadasva naḥ
analyzed: yatra viśvasṛjām sargaḥ manūn anyān vadasva naḥ

original: BhP_08.01.002/1 manvantare harerjanma karmāṇi ca mahīyasaḥ
analyzed: manvantare hareḥ janma karmāṇi ca mahīyasaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.002/3 gṛṇanti kavayo brahmaṃstāni no vada śṛṇvatām
analyzed: gṛṇanti kavayaḥ brahman tāni naḥ vada śṛṇvatām
yadi asmin antare brahman bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.003/3 kṛtavān kurute kartā hy atīte 'nāgate 'dya vā
analyzed: kṛtavān kurute kartā hi atīte na āgate vā
śrī ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.01.004/1 manavo 'smin vyatītāḥ ṣaṭ kalpe svāyambhuvādayaḥ
analyzed: manavaḥ smin vyatītāḥ ṣaṭ kalpe svāyambhuva ādayaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.004/3 ādyaste kathito yatra devādīnāṃ ca sambhavaḥ
analyzed: ādyaḥ te kathitaḥ yatra deva ādīnām ca sambhavaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.005/1 ākūtyāṃ devahūtyāṃ ca duhitrostasya vai manoḥ
analyzed: ākūtyām devahūtyām ca duhitroḥ tasya vai manoḥ
dharma jñāna upadeśa artham bhagavān putra tām gataḥ
kṛtam purā bhagavataḥ kapilasya anuvarṇitam

original: BhP_08.01.006/3 ākhyāsye bhagavān yajño yac cakāra kurūdvaha
analyzed: ākhyāsye bhagavān yajñaḥ yat cakāra kuru udvaha
viraktaḥ kāma bhogeṣu śatarūpā patiḥ prabhuḥ

original: BhP_08.01.007/3 visṛjya rājyaṃ tapase sabhāryo vanamāviśat
analyzed: visṛjya rājyam tapase sa bhāryaḥ vanam āviśat

original: BhP_08.01.008/1 sunandāyāṃ varṣaśataṃ padaikena bhuvaṃ spṛśan
analyzed: sunandāyām varṣa śatam padā ekena bhuvam spṛśan
tapyamānaḥ tapaḥ ghoram idam anvāha bhārata
śrī manuḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.01.009/1 yena cetayate viśvaṃ viśvaṃ cetayate na yam
analyzed: yena cetayate viśvam viśvam cetayate na yam

original: BhP_08.01.009/3 yo jāgarti śayāne 'smin nāyaṃ taṃ veda veda saḥ
analyzed: yaḥ jāgarti śayāne smin na ayam tam veda veda saḥ

original: BhP_08.01.010/1 ātmāvāsyamidaṃ viśvaṃ yat kiñcij jagatyāṃ jagat
analyzed: ātma āvāsyam idam viśvam yat kiñcid jagatyām jagat

original: BhP_08.01.010/3 tena tyaktena bhuñjīthā mā gṛdhaḥ kasya sviddhanam
analyzed: tena tyaktena bhuñjīthāḥ mā gṛdhaḥ kasya svid dhanam

original: BhP_08.01.011/1 yaṃ paśyati na paśyantaṃ cakṣuryasya na riṣyati
analyzed: yam paśyati na paśyantam cakṣuḥ yasya na riṣyati
tam bhūta nilayam devam suparṇam upadhāvata

original: BhP_08.01.012/1 na yasyādyantau madhyaṃ ca svaḥ paro nāntaraṃ bahiḥ
analyzed: na yasya ādi antau madhyam ca svaḥ paras na antaram bahis

original: BhP_08.01.012/3 viśvasyāmūni yadyasmādviśvaṃ ca tadṛtaṃ mahat
analyzed: viśvasya amūni yat yasmāt viśvam ca tat ṛtam mahat

original: BhP_08.01.013/1 sa viśvakāyaḥ puruhūtaīśaḥ satyaḥ svayaṃjyotirajaḥ purāṇaḥ
analyzed: sa viśva kāyaḥ puruhūta īśaḥ satyaḥ svayam jyotiḥ ajaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.013/3 dhatte 'sya janmādyajayātmaśaktyā tāṃ vidyayodasya nirīha āste
analyzed: dhatte sya janma ādya jayā ātma śaktyā tām vidyayā udasya nirīhaḥ āste
atha agre ṛṣayaḥ karmāṇ īhante karma hetave

original: BhP_08.01.014/3 īhamāno hi puruṣaḥ prāyo 'nīhāṃ prapadyate
analyzed: īhamānaḥ hi puruṣaḥ prāyas nīhām prapadyate

original: BhP_08.01.015/1 īhate bhagavān īśo na hi tatra visajjate
analyzed: īhate bhagavān īśaḥ na hi tatra visajjate

original: BhP_08.01.015/3 ātmalābhena pūrṇārtho nāvasīdanti ye 'nu tam
analyzed: ātma lābhena pūrṇa arthaḥ na avasīdanti ye nu tam

original: BhP_08.01.016/1 tamīhamānaṃ nirahaṅkṛtaṃ budhaṃ nirāśiṣaṃ pūrṇamananyacoditam
analyzed: tam īhamānam nirahaṅkṛtam budham pūrṇam ananya coditam

original: BhP_08.01.016/3 nṝn śikṣayantaṃ nijavartmasaṃsthitaṃ prabhuṃ prapadye 'khiladharmabhāvanam
analyzed: nṝn śikṣayantam nija vartma saṃsthitam prabhum prapadye khila dharma bhāvanam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

analyzed: tān tathā avasitān vīkṣya yajñaḥ sarva gataḥ hariḥ
yāmaiḥ parivṛtaḥ devaiḥ hatvā aśāsat triviṣṭapam

dyumat suṣeṇa rociṣmat pramukhāḥ tasya ca ātmajāḥ

ūrjastambha ādayaḥ sapta ṛṣayaḥ brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.021/1 ṛṣestu vedaśirasastuṣitā nāma patny abhūt
analyzed: ṛṣeḥ tu vedaśirasaḥ tuṣitā nāma patnī abhūt

original: BhP_08.01.021/3 tasyāṃ jajñe tato devo vibhurity abhiviśrutaḥ
analyzed: tasyām jajñe tatas devaḥ vibhuḥ iti abhiviśrutaḥ
aṣṭāśīti sahasrāṇi munayaḥ ye dhṛta vratāḥ
anvaśikṣan vratam tasya kaumāra brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.023/1 tṛtīya uttamo nāma priyavratasuto manuḥ
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ uttamaḥ nāma priyavrata sutaḥ manuḥ

original: BhP_08.01.023/3 pavanaḥ sṛñjayo yajña hotrādyāstatsutā nṛpa
analyzed: pavanaḥ sṛñjayaḥ yajña hotra ādyāḥ tad sutāḥ nṛpa
vasiṣṭha tanayāḥ sapta ṛṣayaḥ pramadā ādayaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.024/3 satyā vedaśrutā bhadrā devā indrastu satyajit
analyzed: satyāḥ veda śrutāḥ bhadrāḥ devāḥ indraḥ tu satya jit

original: BhP_08.01.025/1 dharmasya sūnṛtāyāṃ tu bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ
analyzed: dharmasya sūnṛtāyām tu bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.025/3 satyasena iti khyāto jātaḥ satyavrataiḥ saha
analyzed: satyasenaḥ iti khyātaḥ jātaḥ satya vrataiḥ saha
saḥ nṛta vrata duḥśīlān asataḥ yakṣa rākṣasān
bhūta druhaḥ bhūta gaṇān ca avadhīt satyajit sakhaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.027/1 caturtha uttamabhrātā manurnāmnā ca tāmasaḥ
analyzed: caturthaḥ uttama bhrātā manuḥ nāmnā ca tāmasaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.027/3 pṛthuḥ khyātirnaraḥ keturity ādyā daśa tatsutāḥ
analyzed: pṛthuḥ khyātiḥ naraḥ ketuḥ iti ādyāḥ daśa tad sutāḥ

original: BhP_08.01.028/1 satyakā harayo vīrā devāstriśikha īśvaraḥ
analyzed: satyakāḥ harayaḥ vīrāḥ devāḥ triśikhaḥ īśvaraḥ
jyotirdhāma ādayaḥ sapta ṛṣayaḥ tāmase ntare

original: BhP_08.01.029/1 devā vaidhṛtayo nāma vidhṛtestanayā nṛpa
analyzed: devāḥ vaidhṛtayaḥ nāma vidhṛteḥ tanayāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_08.01.029/3 naṣṭāḥ kālena yairvedā vidhṛtāḥ svena tejasā
analyzed: naṣṭāḥ kālena yaiḥ vedāḥ vidhṛtāḥ svena tejasā

original: BhP_08.01.030/1 tatrāpi jajñe bhagavān hariṇyāṃ harimedhasaḥ
analyzed: tatra api jajñe bhagavān hariṇyām harimedhasaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.030/3 haririty āhṛto yena gajendro mocito grahāt
analyzed: hariḥ iti āhṛtaḥ yena gaja indraḥ mocitaḥ grahāt
śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_08.01.031/1 bādarāyaṇa etat te śrotumicchāmahe vayam
analyzed: bādarāyaṇaḥ etat te śrotum icchāmahe vayam
hariḥ yathā gaja patim grāha grastam amūmucat

original: BhP_08.01.032/1 tatkathāsu mahat puṇyaṃ dhanyaṃ svastyayanaṃ śubham
analyzed: tad kathāsu mahat puṇyam dhanyam svastyayanam śubham

original: BhP_08.01.032/3 yatra yatrottamaśloko bhagavān gīyate hariḥ
analyzed: yatra yatra uttamaślokaḥ bhagavān gīyate hariḥ
śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.01.033/1 parīkṣitaivaṃ sa tu bādarāyaṇiḥ prāyopaviṣṭena kathāsu coditaḥ
analyzed: parīkṣitā evam sa tu bādarāyaṇiḥ prāya upaviṣṭena kathāsu coditaḥ

original: BhP_08.01.033/3 uvāca viprāḥ pratinandya pārthivaṃ mudā munīnāṃ sadasi sma śṛṇvatām
analyzed: uvāca viprāḥ pratinandya pārthivam mudā munīnām sadasi sma śṛṇvatām
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
āsīt giri varaḥ rājan trikūṭaḥ iti viśrutaḥ
kṣīrodena āvṛtaḥ śrīmān yojana ayutam ucchritaḥ

original: BhP_08.02.002/1 tāvatā vistṛtaḥ paryak tribhiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ payonidhim
analyzed: tāvatā vistṛtaḥ paryak tribhiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ payonidhim
diśaḥ kham rocayan āste raupya āyasa hiraṇmayaiḥ
anyaiḥ ca kakubhaḥ sarvāḥ ratna dhātu vicitritaiḥ

sa ca avanijyamāna aṅghriḥ samantāt payaḥ ūrmibhiḥ

kinnaraiḥ apsarobhiḥ ca krīḍadbhiḥ juṣṭa kandaraḥ
yatra saṅgīta sat nādaiḥ nadat guham amarṣayā
abhigarjanti harayaḥ ślāghinaḥ para śaṅkayā
nānā araṇya paśu vrāta saṅkula droṇī alaṅkṛtaḥ

udyānam ṛtumat nāma ākrīḍam sura yoṣitām
sarvatas laṅkṛtam divyaiḥ nitya puṣpa phala drumaiḥ
mandāraiḥ pārijātaiḥ ca pāṭalā aśoka campakaiḥ
cūtaiḥ piyālaiḥ panasaiḥ āmraiḥ āmrātakaiḥ api
kramukaiḥ nārikelaiḥ ca kharjūraiḥ bījapūrakaiḥ
madhukaiḥ śāla tālaiḥ ca tamālaiḥ asana arjunaiḥ

matta ṣaṭpada nirghuṣṭam śakuntaiḥ ca kala svanaiḥ

śobhitam tīra jaiḥ ca anyaiḥ nitya ṛtubhiḥ alam drumaiḥ

original: BhP_08.02.020/3 sakaṇṭakaṃ kīcakaveṇuvetravad viśālagulmaṃ prarujan vanaspatīn
analyzed: sa kaṇṭakam kīcaka veṇu vetra vat viśāla gulmam prarujan vanaspatīn

original: BhP_08.02.021/1 yadgandhamātrāddharayo gajendrā vyāghrādayo vyālamṛgāḥ sakhaḍgāḥ
analyzed: yad gandha mātrāt harayaḥ gaja indrāḥ vyāghra ādayaḥ vyāla mṛgāḥ sa khaḍgāḥ
mahā uragāḥ ca api bhayāt dravanti sa gaura kṛṣṇāḥ sa rabhāḥ camaryaḥ

original: BhP_08.02.022/3 anyatra kṣudrā hariṇāḥ śaśādayaś caranty abhītā yadanugraheṇa
analyzed: anyatra kṣudrāḥ hariṇāḥ śaśa ādayaḥ caranti abhītāḥ yad anugraheṇa

original: BhP_08.02.023/1 sa gharmataptaḥ karibhiḥ kareṇubhir vṛto madacyutkarabhairanudrutaḥ
analyzed: sa gharma taptaḥ karibhiḥ kareṇubhiḥ vṛtaḥ mada cyut karabhaiḥ anudrutaḥ

original: BhP_08.02.023/3 giriṃ garimṇā paritaḥ prakampayan niṣevyamāṇo 'likulairmadāśanaiḥ
analyzed: girim garimṇā paritas prakampayan niṣevyamāṇaḥ likulaiḥ mada aśanaiḥ

original: BhP_08.02.024/1 saro 'nilaṃ paṅkajareṇurūṣitaṃ jighran vidūrān madavihvalekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: saraḥ nilam paṅkaja reṇu rūṣitam jighran vidūrāt mada vihvala īkṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_08.02.024/3 vṛtaḥ svayūthena tṛṣārditena tat sarovarābhyāsamathāgamaddrutam
analyzed: vṛtaḥ sva yūthena tṛṣā arditena tat sarovara abhyāsam atha agamat drutam

original: BhP_08.02.025/3 papau nikāmaṃ nijapuṣkaroddhṛtam ātmānamadbhiḥ snapayan gataklamaḥ
analyzed: papau nikāmam nija puṣkara uddhṛtam ātmānam adbhiḥ snapayan gata klamaḥ

original: BhP_08.02.026/1 sa puṣkareṇoddhṛtaśīkarāmbubhir nipāyayan saṃsnapayan yathā gṛhī
analyzed: sa puṣkareṇa uddhṛta śīkara ambubhiḥ nipāyayan saṃsnapayan yathā gṛhī

original: BhP_08.02.026/3 ghṛṇī kareṇuḥ karabhāṃśca durmado nācaṣṭa kṛcchraṃ kṛpaṇo 'jamāyayā
analyzed: ghṛṇī kareṇuḥ karabhān ca durmadaḥ na ācaṣṭa kṛcchram kṛpaṇaḥ ja māyayā

original: BhP_08.02.027/1 taṃ tatra kaścin nṛpa daivacodito grāho balīyāṃścaraṇe ruṣāgrahīt
analyzed: tam tatra kaścid nṛpa daiva coditaḥ grāhaḥ balīyān caraṇe ruṣā agrahīt

original: BhP_08.02.027/3 yadṛcchayaivaṃ vyasanaṃ gato gajo yathābalaṃ so 'tibalo vicakrame
analyzed: yadṛcchayā evam vyasanam gataḥ gajaḥ yathābalam saḥ tibalaḥ vicakrame

original: BhP_08.02.028/1 tathāturaṃ yūthapatiṃ kareṇavo vikṛṣyamāṇaṃ tarasā balīyasā
analyzed: tathā āturam yūtha patim kareṇavaḥ vikṛṣyamāṇam tarasā balīyasā

original: BhP_08.02.028/3 vicukruśurdīnadhiyo 'pare gajāḥ pārṣṇigrahāstārayituṃ na cāśakan
analyzed: vicukruśuḥ dīna dhiyaḥ pare gajāḥ pārṣṇigrahāḥ tārayitum na ca aśakan
niyudhyatoḥ evam ibha indra nakrayoḥ vikarṣatoḥ antarataḥ bahis mithas

original: BhP_08.02.029/3 samāḥ sahasraṃ vyagaman mahīpate saprāṇayościtramamaṃsatāmarāḥ
analyzed: samāḥ sahasram vyagamat mahīpate sa prāṇayoḥ citram amaṃsata amarāḥ

original: BhP_08.02.030/1 tato gajendrasya manobalaujasāṃ kālena dīrgheṇa mahān abhūdvyayaḥ
analyzed: tatas gaja indrasya manaḥ bala ojasām kālena dīrgheṇa mahān abhūt vyayaḥ

original: BhP_08.02.030/3 vikṛṣyamāṇasya jale 'vasīdato viparyayo 'bhūt sakalaṃ jalaukasaḥ
analyzed: vikṛṣyamāṇasya jale vasīdataḥ viparyayaḥ bhūt sakalam jalaukasaḥ

original: BhP_08.02.031/1 itthaṃ gajendraḥ sa yadāpa saṅkaṭaṃ prāṇasya dehī vivaśo yadṛcchayā
analyzed: ittham gaja indraḥ sa yadā āpa saṅkaṭam prāṇasya dehī vivaśaḥ yadṛcchayā
a pārayan ātma vimokṣaṇe ciram dadhyau imām buddhim atha abhyapadyata

original: BhP_08.02.032/1 na māmime jñātaya āturaṃ gajāḥ kutaḥ kariṇyaḥ prabhavanti mocitum
analyzed: na mām ime jñātayaḥ āturam gajāḥ kutas kariṇyaḥ prabhavanti mocitum

original: BhP_08.02.032/3 grāheṇa pāśena vidhāturāvṛto 'py ahaṃ ca taṃ yāmi paraṃ parāyaṇam
analyzed: grāheṇa pāśena vidhātuḥ āvṛtaḥ aham ca tam yāmi param parāyaṇam

original: BhP_08.02.033/1 yaḥ kaścaneśo balino 'ntakoragāt pracaṇḍavegādabhidhāvato bhṛśam
analyzed: yaḥ kaścana īśaḥ balinaḥ ntaka uragāt pracaṇḍa vegāt abhidhāvataḥ bhṛśam

original: BhP_08.02.033/3 bhītaṃ prapannaṃ paripāti yadbhayān mṛtyuḥ pradhāvaty araṇaṃ tamīmahi
analyzed: bhītam prapannam paripāti yad bhayāt mṛtyuḥ pradhāvati araṇam tamīmahi
śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.03.001/1 evaṃ vyavasito buddhyā samādhāya mano hṛdi
analyzed: evam vyavasitaḥ buddhyā samādhāya manaḥ hṛdi

original: BhP_08.03.001/3 jajāpa paramaṃ jāpyaṃ prāgjanmany anuśikṣitam
analyzed: jajāpa paramam jāpyam prāc janmani anuśikṣitam
uvāca

original: BhP_08.03.002/1 oṃ namo bhagavate tasmai yata etac cidātmakam
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate tasmai yatas etat cit ātmakam
puruṣāya ādi bījāya para īśāya abhidhīmahi

original: BhP_08.03.003/1 yasminnidaṃ yataścedaṃ yenedaṃ ya idaṃ svayam
analyzed: yasmin idam yatas ca idam yena idam yaḥ idam svayam

original: BhP_08.03.003/3 yo 'smāt parasmāc ca parastaṃ prapadye svayambhuvam
analyzed: yaḥ smāt parasmāt ca paraḥ tam prapadye svayambhuvam

original: BhP_08.03.004/1 yaḥ svātmanīdaṃ nijamāyayārpitaṃ kvacidvibhātaṃ kva ca tat tirohitam
analyzed: yaḥ sva ātmani idam nija māyayā arpitam kvacid vibhātam kva ca tat tirohitam

original: BhP_08.03.004/3 aviddhadṛk sākṣy ubhayaṃ tadīkṣate sa ātmamūlo 'vatu māṃ parātparaḥ
analyzed: a viddha dṛś sākṣī ubhayam tat īkṣate saḥ ātma mūlaḥ vatu mām parātparaḥ

original: BhP_08.03.005/1 kālena pañcatvamiteṣu kṛtsnaśo lokeṣu pāleṣu ca sarvahetuṣu
analyzed: kālena pañcatva miteṣu kṛtsnaśas lokeṣu pāleṣu ca sarva hetuṣu

original: BhP_08.03.005/3 tamastadāsīdgahanaṃ gabhīraṃ yastasya pāre 'bhivirājate vibhuḥ
analyzed: tamaḥ tat āsīt gahanam gabhīram yaḥ tasya pāre vibhuḥ

original: BhP_08.03.006/1 na yasya devā ṛṣayaḥ padaṃ vidur jantuḥ punaḥ ko 'rhati gantumīritum
analyzed: na yasya devāḥ ṛṣayaḥ padam viduḥ jantuḥ punar kaḥ rhati gantum īritum

original: BhP_08.03.006/3 yathā naṭasyākṛtibhirviceṣṭato duratyayānukramaṇaḥ sa māvatu
analyzed: yathā naṭasya ākṛtibhiḥ viceṣṭataḥ duratyaya anukramaṇaḥ sa mā avatu

original: BhP_08.03.007/1 didṛkṣavo yasya padaṃ sumaṅgalaṃ vimuktasaṅgā munayaḥ susādhavaḥ
analyzed: didṛkṣavaḥ yasya padam su maṅgalam vimukta saṅgāḥ munayaḥ su sādhavaḥ

original: BhP_08.03.007/3 caranty alokavratamavraṇaṃ vane bhūtātmabhūtāḥ suhṛdaḥ sa me gatiḥ
analyzed: caranti a loka vratam avraṇam vane bhūta ātma bhūtāḥ suhṛdaḥ sa me gatiḥ

original: BhP_08.03.008/1 na vidyate yasya ca janma karma vā na nāmarūpe guṇadoṣa eva vā
analyzed: na vidyate yasya ca janma karma vā na nāma rūpe guṇa doṣaḥ eva vā

original: BhP_08.03.008/3 tathāpi lokāpyayasambhavāya yaḥ svamāyayā tāny anukālamṛcchati
analyzed: tathā api loka apyaya sambhavāya yaḥ sva māyayā tāni anukālam ṛcchati
tasmai namaḥ pareśāya brahmaṇe nanta śaktaye
arūpāya uru rūpāya namaḥ āścarya karmaṇe
namaḥ ātma pradīpāya sākṣiṇe paramātmane
namaḥ girām vidūrāya manasaḥ cetasām api
sattvena pratilabhyāya naiṣkarmyeṇa vipaścitā
namaḥ kaivalya nāthāya nirvāṇa sukha saṃvide

original: BhP_08.03.012/1 namaḥ śāntāya ghorāya mūḍhāya guṇadharmiṇe
analyzed: namaḥ śāntāya ghorāya mūḍhāya guṇa dharmiṇe

original: BhP_08.03.012/3 nirviśeṣāya sāmyāya namo jñānaghanāya ca
analyzed: nirviśeṣāya sāmyāya namaḥ jñāna ghanāya ca
kṣetrajñāya namaḥ tubhyam sarva adhyakṣāya sākṣiṇe
puruṣāya ātma mūlāya mūlaprakṛtaye namaḥ
sarva indriya guṇa draṣṭre sarva pratyaya hetave

original: BhP_08.03.014/3 asatā cchāyayoktāya sadābhāsāya te namaḥ
analyzed: asatā chāyayā uktāya sat ābhāsāya te namaḥ
namaḥ namaḥ te khila kāraṇāya niṣkāraṇāya adbhuta kāraṇāya
sarva āgama āmnāya mahā arṇavāya namaḥ pavargāya parāyaṇāya
guṇa araṇi channa cit uṣmapāya tad kṣobha visphūrjita mānasāya

original: BhP_08.03.016/3 naiṣkarmyabhāvena vivarjitāgama svayaṃprakāśāya namas karomi
analyzed: naiṣkarmya bhāvena vivarjita āgama svayaṃprakāśāya namaḥ karomi

original: BhP_08.03.017/1 mādṛk prapannapaśupāśavimokṣaṇāya muktāya bhūrikaruṇāya namo 'layāya
analyzed: mādṛś prapanna paśu pāśa vimokṣaṇāya muktāya bhūri karuṇāya namaḥ layāya

original: BhP_08.03.017/3 svāṃśena sarvatanubhṛnmanasi pratīta pratyagdṛśe bhagavate bṛhate namaste
analyzed: sva aṃśena sarva tanubhṛt manasi pratīta pratyak dṛśe bhagavate bṛhate namaḥ te
ātma ātmaja āpta gṛha vitta janeṣu saktaiḥ duṣprāpaṇāya guṇa saṅga vivarjitāya

original: BhP_08.03.018/3 muktātmabhiḥ svahṛdaye paribhāvitāya jñānātmane bhagavate nama īśvarāya
analyzed: muktātmabhiḥ sva hṛdaye paribhāvitāya jñāna ātmane bhagavate namaḥ īśvarāya

original: BhP_08.03.019/1 yaṃ dharmakāmārthavimuktikāmā bhajanta iṣṭāṃ gatimāpnuvanti
analyzed: yam dharma kāma artha vimukti kāmāḥ bhajantaḥ iṣṭām gatim āpnuvanti

original: BhP_08.03.019/3 kiṃ cāśiṣo rāty api dehamavyayaṃ karotu me 'dabhradayo vimokṣaṇam
analyzed: kim ca āśiṣaḥ rāti api deham avyayam karotu me dabhra dayaḥ vimokṣaṇam

original: BhP_08.03.020/1 ekāntino yasya na kañcanārthaṃ vāñchanti ye vai bhagavatprapannāḥ
analyzed: ekāntinaḥ yasya na kañcana artham vāñchanti ye vai bhagavat prapannāḥ

original: BhP_08.03.020/3 atyadbhutaṃ taccaritaṃ sumaṅgalaṃ gāyanta ānandasamudramagnāḥ
analyzed: ati adbhutam tad caritam su maṅgalam gāyantaḥ ānanda samudra magnāḥ

original: BhP_08.03.021/1 tamakṣaraṃ brahma paraṃ pareśam avyaktamādhyātmikayogagamyam
analyzed: tam akṣaram brahma param para īśam avyaktam ādhyātmika yoga gamyam
atīndriyam sūkṣmam iva ati dūram anantam ādyam paripūrṇam īḍe

original: BhP_08.03.022/1 yasya brahmādayo devā vedā lokāścarācarāḥ
analyzed: yasya brahma ādayaḥ devāḥ vedāḥ lokāḥ cara acarāḥ

original: BhP_08.03.022/3 nāmarūpavibhedena phalgvyā ca kalayā kṛtāḥ
analyzed: nāma rūpa vibhedena phalgvyā ca kalayā kṛtāḥ

original: BhP_08.03.023/1 yathārciṣo 'gneḥ saviturgabhastayo niryānti saṃyānty asakṛt svarociṣaḥ
analyzed: yathā arciṣaḥ gneḥ savituḥ gabhastayaḥ niryānti saṃyānti asakṛt sva rociṣaḥ

original: BhP_08.03.023/3 tathā yato 'yaṃ guṇasampravāho buddhirmanaḥ khāni śarīrasargāḥ
analyzed: tathā yatas yam guṇa sampravāhaḥ buddhiḥ manaḥ khāni śarīra sargāḥ

original: BhP_08.03.024/1 sa vai na devāsuramartyatiryaṅ na strī na ṣaṇḍho na pumān na jantuḥ
analyzed: sa vai na deva asura martya tiryak na strī na ṣaṇḍhaḥ na pumān na jantuḥ

original: BhP_08.03.024/3 nāyaṃ guṇaḥ karma na san na cāsan niṣedhaśeṣo jayatādaśeṣaḥ
analyzed: na ayam guṇaḥ karma na sat na ca asat niṣedha śeṣaḥ jayatāt aśeṣaḥ
jijīviṣe na aham iha amuyā kim antar bahis ca āvṛtaye ibha yonyā

original: BhP_08.03.025/3 icchāmi kālena na yasya viplavas tasyātmalokāvaraṇasya mokṣam
analyzed: icchāmi kālena na yasya viplavaḥ tasya ātma loka āvaraṇasya mokṣam
saḥ ham viśva sṛjam viśvam aviśvam viśva vedasam

original: BhP_08.03.026/3 viśvātmānamajaṃ brahma praṇato 'smi paraṃ padam
analyzed: viśvātmānam ajam brahma praṇataḥ smi param padam
yoga randhita karmāṇaḥ hṛdi yoga vibhāvite

original: BhP_08.03.027/3 yogino yaṃ prapaśyanti yogeśaṃ taṃ nato 'smy aham
analyzed: yoginaḥ yam prapaśyanti yogeśam tam nataḥ smi aham
namaḥ namaḥ tubhyam asahya vega śakti trayāya akhila dhī guṇāya
prapanna pālāya duranta śaktaye kad indriyāṇām an avāpya vartmane

original: BhP_08.03.029/1 nāyaṃ veda svamātmānaṃ yacchaktyāhaṃdhiyā hatam
analyzed: na ayam veda svam ātmānam yat śaktyā ahaṃdhiyā hatam
tam duratyaya māhātmyam bhagavantam itas smi aham
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
evam gaja indram upavarṇita nirviśeṣam
brahma ādayaḥ vividha liṅga bhidā abhimānāḥ
na ete yadā upasasṛpuḥ nikhila ātmaka tvāt
tatra akhila amara mayaḥ hariḥ āvirāsīt
tam tadvat ārtam upalabhya jagannivāsaḥ

original: BhP_08.03.031/2 stotraṃ niśamya divijaiḥ saha saṃstuvadbhiḥ
analyzed: stotram niśamya divijaiḥ saha saṃstuvadbhiḥ
chandaḥ mayena garuḍena samuhyamānaḥ
cakra āyudhaḥ bhyagamat āśu yatas gaja indraḥ
saḥ ntar sarasi uru balena gṛhītaḥ ārtaḥ

original: BhP_08.03.032/2 dṛṣṭvā garutmati hariṃ kha upāttacakram
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā garutmati harim khe upātta cakram
utkṣipya sa ambuja karam giram āha kṛcchrān
nārāyaṇa akhila guro bhagavan namaḥ te
tam vīkṣya pīḍitam ajaḥ sahasā avatīrya
sa grāham āśu sarasaḥ kṛpayā ujjahāra
grāhāt vipāṭita mukhāt ariṇā gaja indram
saṃpaśyatām hariḥ amūmucat ucchriyāṇām
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
tadā deva ṛṣi gandharvāḥ brahma īśāna purogamāḥ

original: BhP_08.04.001/3 mumucuḥ kusumāsāraṃ śaṃsantaḥ karma taddhareḥ
analyzed: mumucuḥ kusuma āsāram śaṃsantaḥ karma tat hareḥ
neduḥ dundubhayaḥ divyāḥ gandharvāḥ nanṛtuḥ jaguḥ
ṛṣayaḥ cāraṇāḥ siddhāḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ puruṣottamam

original: BhP_08.04.003/1 yo 'sau grāhaḥ sa vai sadyaḥ paramāścaryarūpadhṛk
analyzed: sau grāhaḥ sa vai sadyas parama āścarya rūpa dhṛk
muktaḥ devala śāpena hūhūḥ gandharva sattamaḥ
praṇamya śirasā adhīśam uttamaślokam avyayam
agāyata yaśaḥ dhāma kīrtanya guṇa sat katham

original: BhP_08.04.005/1 so 'nukampita īśena parikramya praṇamya tam
analyzed: saḥ nu kampitaḥ īśena parikramya praṇamya tam

original: BhP_08.04.005/3 lokasya paśyato lokaṃ svamagān muktakilbiṣaḥ
analyzed: lokasya paśyataḥ lokam svam agāt mukta kilbiṣaḥ
gaja indraḥ bhagavat sparśāt vimuktaḥ jñāna bandhanāt
prāptaḥ bhagavataḥ rūpam pīta vāsāḥ catur bhujaḥ

original: BhP_08.04.007/1 sa vai pūrvamabhūdrājā pāṇḍyo draviḍasattamaḥ
analyzed: sa vai pūrvam abhūt rājā pāṇḍyaḥ draviḍa sattamaḥ
indradyumnaḥ iti khyātaḥ viṣṇu vrata parāyaṇaḥ

original: BhP_08.04.008/1 sa ekadārādhanakāla ātmavān gṛhītamaunavrata īśvaraṃ harim
analyzed: saḥ ekadā ārādhana kāle ātmavān gṛhīta mauna vrataḥ īśvaram harim
jaṭādharaḥ tāpasaḥ cyutam samarcayāmāsa kula acala āśramaḥ

original: BhP_08.04.009/1 yadṛcchayā tatra mahāyaśā muniḥ samāgamac chiṣyagaṇaiḥ pariśritaḥ
analyzed: yadṛcchayā tatra mahā yaśāḥ muniḥ samāgamat śiṣya gaṇaiḥ pariśritaḥ

original: BhP_08.04.009/3 taṃ vīkṣya tūṣṇīmakṛtārhaṇādikaṃ rahasy upāsīnamṛṣiścukopa ha
analyzed: tam vīkṣya tūṣṇīm akṛta arhaṇa ādikam rahasi upāsīnam ṛṣiḥ cukopa ha

original: BhP_08.04.010/1 tasmā imaṃ śāpamadādasādhur ayaṃ durātmākṛtabuddhiradya
analyzed: tasmai imam śāpam adāt asādhuḥ ayam durātmā akṛtabuddhiḥ adya

original: BhP_08.04.010/3 viprāvamantā viśatāṃ tamisraṃ yathā gajaḥ stabdhamatiḥ sa eva
analyzed: vipra avamantā viśatām tamisram yathā gajaḥ stabdha matiḥ saḥ eva
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.04.011/1 evaṃ śaptvā gato 'gastyo bhagavān nṛpa sānugaḥ
analyzed: evam śaptvā gataḥ gastyaḥ bhagavān nṛpa sa anugaḥ
indradyumnaḥ pi rājarṣiḥ diṣṭam tat upadhārayan
āpannaḥ kauñjarīm yonim ātma smṛti vināśinīm
evam vimokṣya gaja yūthapam abjanābhaḥ
tena api pārṣada gatim gamitena yuktaḥ
gandharva siddha vibudhaiḥ upagīyamāna
karma adbhutam sva bhavanam garuḍa āsanaḥ gāt

original: BhP_08.04.014/1 etan mahārāja taverito mayā kṛṣṇānubhāvo gajarājamokṣaṇam
analyzed: etat mahā rāja tava īritaḥ mayā kṛṣṇa anubhāvaḥ gaja rāja mokṣaṇam

original: BhP_08.04.014/3 svargyaṃ yaśasyaṃ kalikalmaṣāpahaṃ duḥsvapnanāśaṃ kuruvarya śṛṇvatām
analyzed: svargyam yaśasyam kali kalmaṣa apaham duḥsvapna nāśam kuru varya śṛṇvatām
yathā anukīrtayanti etat śreyaskāmāḥ dvijātayaḥ
śucayaḥ prātar utthāya duḥsvapna ādi upaśāntaye

original: BhP_08.04.016/1 idamāha hariḥ prīto gajendraṃ kurusattama
analyzed: idam āha hariḥ prītaḥ gaja indram kurusattama
śṛṇvatām sarva bhūtānām sarva bhūta mayaḥ vibhuḥ
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_08.04.017/1 ye māṃ tvāṃ ca saraścedaṃ girikandarakānanam
analyzed: ye mām tvām ca saraḥ ca idam giri kandara kānanam
vetra kīcaka veṇūnām gulmāni sura pādapān

original: BhP_08.04.018/1 śṛṅgāṇīmāni dhiṣṇyāni brahmaṇo me śivasya ca
analyzed: śṛṅgāṇi imāni dhiṣṇyāni brahmaṇaḥ me śivasya ca

original: BhP_08.04.018/3 kṣīrodaṃ me priyaṃ dhāma śvetadvīpaṃ ca bhāsvaram
analyzed: kṣīrodam me priyam dhāma śvetadvīpam ca bhāsvaram

original: BhP_08.04.019/1 śrīvatsaṃ kaustubhaṃ mālāṃ gadāṃ kaumodakīṃ mama
analyzed: śrīvatsam kaustubham mālām gadām kaumodakīm mama
sudarśanam pāñcajanyam suparṇam pataga īśvaram

original: BhP_08.04.020/1 śeṣaṃ ca matkalāṃ sūkṣmāṃ śriyaṃ devīṃ madāśrayām
analyzed: śeṣam ca mad kalām sūkṣmām śriyam devīm mad āśrayām

original: BhP_08.04.020/3 brahmāṇaṃ nāradamṛṣiṃ bhavaṃ prahrādameva ca
analyzed: brahmāṇam nāradam ṛṣim bhavam prahrādam eva ca
matsya kūrma varāha ādyaiḥ avatāraiḥ kṛtāni me

original: BhP_08.04.021/3 karmāṇy anantapuṇyāni sūryaṃ somaṃ hutāśanam
analyzed: karmāṇi ananta puṇyāni sūryam somam hutāśanam
praṇavam satyam avyaktam go viprān dharmam avyayam
dākṣāyaṇīḥ dharmapatnīḥ soma kaśyapayoḥ api

original: BhP_08.04.023/1 gaṅgāṃ sarasvatīṃ nandāṃ kālindīṃ sitavāraṇam
analyzed: gaṅgām sarasvatīm nandām kālindīm sita vāraṇam

original: BhP_08.04.023/3 dhruvaṃ brahmaṛṣīn sapta puṇyaślokāṃśca mānavān
analyzed: dhruvam brahma ṛṣīn sapta puṇyaślokān ca mānavān
utthāya apararātra ante prayatāḥ su samāhitāḥ

original: BhP_08.04.024/3 smaranti mama rūpāṇi mucyante te 'ṃhaso 'khilāt
analyzed: smaranti mama rūpāṇi mucyante te ṃhasaḥ khilāt

original: BhP_08.04.025/1 ye māṃ stuvanty anenāṅga pratibudhya niśātyaye
analyzed: ye mām stuvanti anena aṅga pratibudhya niśā atyaye

original: BhP_08.04.025/3 teṣāṃ prāṇātyaye cāhaṃ dadāmi vipulāṃ gatim
analyzed: teṣām prāṇa atyaye ca aham dadāmi vipulām gatim
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.04.026/1 ity ādiśya hṛṣīkeśaḥ prādhmāya jalajottamam
analyzed: iti ādiśya hṛṣīkeśaḥ prādhmāya jalaja uttamam
harṣayan vibudha anīkam āruroha khagādhipam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
rājan uditam etat te hareḥ karma agha nāśanam

original: BhP_08.05.001/3 gajendramokṣaṇaṃ puṇyaṃ raivataṃ tvantaraṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: gaja indra mokṣaṇam puṇyam raivatam tu antaram śṛṇu
pañcamaḥ raivataḥ nāma manuḥ tāmasa sodaraḥ
bali vindhya ādayaḥ tasya sutāḥ ha arjuna pūrvakāḥ
vibhuḥ indraḥ sura gaṇāḥ rājan bhūta raya ādayaḥ
hiraṇyaromā vedaśirāḥ ūrdhvabāhu ādayaḥ dvijāḥ

original: BhP_08.05.004/1 patnī vikuṇṭhā śubhrasya vaikuṇṭhaiḥ surasattamaiḥ
analyzed: patnī vikuṇṭhā śubhrasya vaikuṇṭhaiḥ sura sattamaiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.004/3 tayoḥ svakalayā jajñe vaikuṇṭho bhagavān svayam
analyzed: tayoḥ sva kalayā jajñe vaikuṇṭhaḥ bhagavān svayam

original: BhP_08.05.005/1 vaikuṇṭhaḥ kalpito yena loko lokanamaskṛtaḥ
analyzed: vaikuṇṭhaḥ kalpitaḥ yena lokaḥ loka namaskṛtaḥ
ramayā prārthyamānena devyā tad priya kāmyayā
tasya anubhāvaḥ kathitaḥ guṇāḥ ca parama udayāḥ

original: BhP_08.05.006/3 bhaumān reṇūn sa vimame yo viṣṇorvarṇayedguṇān
analyzed: bhaumān reṇūn sa vimame yaḥ viṣṇoḥ varṇayet guṇān

original: BhP_08.05.007/1 ṣaṣṭhaśca cakṣuṣaḥ putraścākṣuṣo nāma vai manuḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhaḥ ca cakṣuṣaḥ putraḥ cākṣuṣaḥ nāma vai manuḥ
pūru pūruṣa sudyumna pramukhāḥ cākṣuṣa ātmajāḥ

original: BhP_08.05.008/1 indro mantradrumastatra devā āpyādayo gaṇāḥ
analyzed: indraḥ mantra drumaḥ tatra devāḥ āpya ādayaḥ gaṇāḥ
munayaḥ tatra vai rājan haviṣmat vīraka ādayaḥ
tatra api deva sambhūtyām vairājasya abhavat sutaḥ

original: BhP_08.05.009/3 ajito nāma bhagavān aṃśena jagataḥ patiḥ
analyzed: ajitaḥ nāma bhagavān aṃśena jagataḥ patiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.010/1 payodhiṃ yena nirmathya surāṇāṃ sādhitā sudhā
analyzed: payodhim yena nirmathya surāṇām sādhitā sudhā
bhramamāṇaḥ mbhasi dhṛtaḥ kūrma rūpeṇa mandaraḥ
śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_08.05.011/1 yathā bhagavatā brahman mathitaḥ kṣīrasāgaraḥ
analyzed: yathā bhagavatā brahman mathitaḥ kṣīrasāgaraḥ
yad artham vā yatas ca adrim dadhāra ambu cara ātmanā

original: BhP_08.05.012/1 yathāmṛtaṃ suraiḥ prāptaṃ kiṃ cānyadabhavat tataḥ
analyzed: yathā amṛtam suraiḥ prāptam kim ca anyat abhavat tatas
etat bhagavataḥ karma vadasva parama adbhutam

original: BhP_08.05.013/1 tvayā saṅkathyamānena mahimnā sātvatāṃ pateḥ
analyzed: tvayā saṅkathyamānena mahimnā sātvatām pateḥ

original: BhP_08.05.013/3 nātitṛpyati me cittaṃ suciraṃ tāpatāpitam
analyzed: na atitṛpyati me cittam su ciram tāpa tāpitam
śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.05.014/1 sampṛṣṭo bhagavān evaṃ dvaipāyanasuto dvijāḥ
analyzed: sampṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān evam dvaipāyana sutaḥ dvijāḥ
abhinandya hareḥ vīryam abhyācaṣṭum pracakrame
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
yadā yuddhe suraiḥ devāḥ badhyamānāḥ śita āyudhaiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.015/3 gatāsavo nipatitā nottiṣṭheran sma bhūriśaḥ
analyzed: gatāsavaḥ nipatitāḥ na uttiṣṭheran sma bhūriśas

original: BhP_08.05.016/1 yadā durvāsaḥ śāpena sendrā lokāstrayo nṛpa
analyzed: yadā durvāsaḥ śāpena sa indrāḥ lokāḥ trayaḥ nṛpa
niḥśrīkāḥ ca abhavan tatra neśuḥ ijyā ādayaḥ kriyāḥ
niśāmya etat sura gaṇāḥ mahā indra varuṇa ādayaḥ
na adhyagacchan svayam mantraiḥ mantrayantaḥ viniścitam
tatas brahma sabhām jagmuḥ meroḥ mūrdhani sarvaśas

original: BhP_08.05.018/3 sarvaṃ vijñāpayāṃ cakruḥ praṇatāḥ parameṣṭhine
analyzed: sarvam cakruḥ praṇatāḥ parameṣṭhine
sa vilokya indra vāyu ādīn niḥsattvān vigata prabhān

original: BhP_08.05.019/3 lokān amaṅgalaprāyān asurān ayathā vibhuḥ
analyzed: lokān amaṅgala prāyān asurān a yathā vibhuḥ

original: BhP_08.05.020/1 samāhitena manasā saṃsmaran puruṣaṃ param
analyzed: samāhitena manasā saṃsmaran puruṣam param

original: BhP_08.05.020/3 uvācotphullavadano devān sa bhagavān paraḥ
analyzed: uvāca utphulla vadanaḥ devān sa bhagavān paraḥ
aham bhavaḥ yūyam atho sura ādayaḥ manuṣya tiryak druma gharma jātayaḥ

original: BhP_08.05.021/3 yasyāvatārāṃśakalāvisarjitā vrajāma sarve śaraṇaṃ tamavyayam
analyzed: yasya avatāra aṃśa kalā visarjitāḥ vrajāma sarve śaraṇam tam avyayam

original: BhP_08.05.022/1 na yasya vadhyo na ca rakṣaṇīyo nopekṣaṇīyādaraṇīyapakṣaḥ
analyzed: na yasya vadhyaḥ na ca rakṣaṇīyaḥ na upekṣaṇīya ādaraṇīya pakṣaḥ

original: BhP_08.05.022/3 tathāpi sargasthitisaṃyamārthaṃ dhatte rajaḥsattvatamāṃsi kāle
analyzed: tathā api sarga sthiti saṃyama artham dhatte rajaḥ sattva tamāṃsi kāle

original: BhP_08.05.023/1 ayaṃ ca tasya sthitipālanakṣaṇaḥ sattvaṃ juṣāṇasya bhavāya dehinām
analyzed: ayam ca tasya sthiti pālana kṣaṇaḥ sattvam juṣāṇasya bhavāya dehinām

original: BhP_08.05.023/3 tasmādvrajāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ jagadguruṃ svānāṃ sa no dhāsyati śaṃ surapriyaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt vrajāmaḥ śaraṇam jagadgurum svānām sa naḥ dhāsyati śam sura priyaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.05.024/1 ity ābhāṣya surān vedhāḥ saha devairarindama
analyzed: iti ābhāṣya surān vedhāḥ saha devaiḥ ariṃdama

original: BhP_08.05.024/3 ajitasya padaṃ sākṣāj jagāma tamasaḥ param
analyzed: ajitasya padam sākṣāt jagāma tamasaḥ param
tatra adṛṣṭa svarūpāya śruta pūrvāya vai prabhuḥ
stutim abrūta daivībhiḥ gīrbhiḥ tu avahita indriyaḥ
śrī brahmā uvāca
avikriyam satyam anantam ādyam guhā āśayam niṣkalam apratarkyam

original: BhP_08.05.026/3 mano 'grayānaṃ vacasāniruktaṃ namāmahe devavaraṃ vareṇyam
analyzed: manaḥ grayānam vacasā aniruktam namāmahe deva varam vareṇyam
vipaścitam prāṇa manaḥ dhiyā ātmanām artha indriya ābhāsam anidram avraṇam

original: BhP_08.05.027/3 chāyātapau yatra na gṛdhrapakṣau tamakṣaraṃ khaṃ triyugaṃ vrajāmahe
analyzed: chāyā ātapau yatra na gṛdhra pakṣau tam akṣaram kham tri yugam vrajāmahe

original: BhP_08.05.028/1 ajasya cakraṃ tvajayeryamāṇaṃ manomayaṃ pañcadaśāramāśu
analyzed: ajasya cakram tu ajayā īryamāṇam manaḥ mayam pañcadaśa aram āśu
tri nābhi vidyut calam aṣṭa nemi yat akṣam āhuḥ tam ṛtam prapadye

original: BhP_08.05.029/1 ya ekavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ paraṃ tad alokamavyaktamanantapāram
analyzed: yaḥ eka varṇam tamasaḥ param tat alokam avyaktam ananta pāram

original: BhP_08.05.029/3 āsāṃ cakāropasuparṇamenam upāsate yogarathena dhīrāḥ
analyzed: āsām cakāra upasuparṇam enam upāsate yoga rathena dhīrāḥ

original: BhP_08.05.030/1 na yasya kaścātititarti māyāṃ yayā jano muhyati veda nārtham
analyzed: na yasya kaḥ ca atititarti māyām yayā janaḥ muhyati veda nā artham

original: BhP_08.05.030/3 taṃ nirjitātmātmaguṇaṃ pareśaṃ namāma bhūteṣu samaṃ carantam
analyzed: tam nirjita ātmā ātma guṇam para īśam namāma bhūteṣu samam carantam

original: BhP_08.05.031/1 ime vayaṃ yatpriyayaiva tanvā sattvena sṛṣṭā bahirantarāviḥ
analyzed: ime vayam yat priyayā eva tanvā sattvena sṛṣṭāḥ bahis antar āvis

original: BhP_08.05.031/3 gatiṃ na sūkṣmāmṛṣayaśca vidmahe kuto 'surādyā itarapradhānāḥ
analyzed: gatim na sūkṣmām ṛṣayaḥ ca vidmahe kutas sura ādyāḥ itara pradhānāḥ

original: BhP_08.05.032/1 pādau mahīyaṃ svakṛtaiva yasya caturvidho yatra hi bhūtasargaḥ
analyzed: pādau mahī iyam sva kṛtā eva yasya caturvidhaḥ yatra hi bhūta sargaḥ

original: BhP_08.05.032/3 sa vai mahāpūruṣa ātmatantraḥ prasīdatāṃ brahma mahāvibhūtiḥ
analyzed: sa vai mahā pūruṣaḥ ātmatantraḥ prasīdatām brahma mahā vibhūtiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.033/1 ambhastu yadreta udāravīryaṃ sidhyanti jīvanty uta vardhamānāḥ
analyzed: ambhaḥ tu yat retaḥ udāra vīryam sidhyanti jīvanti uta vardhamānāḥ

original: BhP_08.05.033/3 lokā yato 'thākhilalokapālāḥ prasīdatāṃ naḥ sa mahāvibhūtiḥ
analyzed: lokāḥ prasīdatām naḥ sa mahā vibhūtiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.034/1 somaṃ mano yasya samāmananti divaukasāṃ yo balamandha āyuḥ
analyzed: somam manaḥ yasya samāmananti divaukasām yaḥ balam andhaḥ āyuḥ

original: BhP_08.05.034/3 īśo nagānāṃ prajanaḥ prajānāṃ prasīdatāṃ naḥ sa mahāvibhūtiḥ
analyzed: īśaḥ nagānām prajanaḥ prajānām prasīdatām naḥ sa mahā vibhūtiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.035/1 agnirmukhaṃ yasya tu jātavedā jātaḥ kriyākāṇḍanimittajanmā
analyzed: agniḥ mukham yasya tu jātavedāḥ jātaḥ kriyā kāṇḍa nimitta janmā

original: BhP_08.05.035/3 antaḥsamudre 'nupacan svadhātūn prasīdatāṃ naḥ sa mahāvibhūtiḥ
analyzed: antar samudre nupacan sva dhātūn prasīdatām naḥ sa mahā vibhūtiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.036/1 yaccakṣurāsīt taraṇirdevayānaṃ trayīmayo brahmaṇa eṣa dhiṣṇyam
analyzed: yat cakṣuḥ āsīt taraṇiḥ deva yānam trayī mayaḥ brahmaṇaḥ eṣa dhiṣṇyam

original: BhP_08.05.036/3 dvāraṃ ca mukteramṛtaṃ ca mṛtyuḥ prasīdatāṃ naḥ sa mahāvibhūtiḥ
analyzed: dvāram ca mukteḥ amṛtam ca mṛtyuḥ prasīdatām naḥ sa mahā vibhūtiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.037/1 prāṇādabhūdyasya carācarāṇāṃ prāṇaḥ saho balamojaśca vāyuḥ
analyzed: prāṇāt abhūt yasya carācarāṇām prāṇaḥ sahaḥ balam ojaḥ ca vāyuḥ

original: BhP_08.05.037/3 anvāsma samrājamivānugā vayaṃ prasīdatāṃ naḥ sa mahāvibhūtiḥ
analyzed: anvāsma samrājam iva anugāḥ vayam prasīdatām naḥ sa mahā vibhūtiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.038/1 śrotrāddiśo yasya hṛdaśca khāni prajajñire khaṃ puruṣasya nābhyāḥ
analyzed: śrotrāt diśaḥ yasya hṛdaḥ ca khāni prajajñire kham puruṣasya nābhyāḥ

original: BhP_08.05.038/3 prāṇendriyātmāsuśarīraketaḥ prasīdatāṃ naḥ sa mahāvibhūtiḥ
analyzed: prāṇa indriya ātma asu śarīra keto prasīdatām naḥ sa mahā vibhūtiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.039/1 balān mahendrastridaśāḥ prasādān manyorgirīśo dhiṣaṇādviriñcaḥ
analyzed: balāt mahendraḥ tridaśāḥ prasādāt manyoḥ girīśaḥ dhiṣaṇāt viriñcaḥ

original: BhP_08.05.039/3 khebhyastu chandāṃsy ṛṣayo meḍhrataḥ kaḥ prasīdatāṃ naḥ sa mahāvibhūtiḥ
analyzed: khebhyaḥ tu chandāṃsi ṛṣayaḥ meḍhrataḥ kaḥ prasīdatām naḥ sa mahā vibhūtiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.040/1 śrīrvakṣasaḥ pitaraśchāyayāsan dharmaḥ stanāditaraḥ pṛṣṭhato 'bhūt
analyzed: śrīḥ vakṣasaḥ pitaraḥ chāyayā āsan dharmaḥ stanāt itaraḥ pṛṣṭhatas bhūt

original: BhP_08.05.040/3 dyauryasya śīrṣṇo 'psaraso vihārāt prasīdatāṃ naḥ sa mahāvibhūtiḥ
analyzed: dyauḥ yasya śīrṣṇā u psarasaḥ vihārāt prasīdatām naḥ sa mahā vibhūtiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.041/1 vipro mukhādbrahma ca yasya guhyaṃ rājanya āsīdbhujayorbalaṃ ca
analyzed: vipraḥ mukhāt brahma ca yasya guhyam rājanyaḥ āsīt bhujayoḥ balam ca

original: BhP_08.05.041/3 ūrvorviḍ ojo 'ṅghriravedaśūdrau prasīdatāṃ naḥ sa mahāvibhūtiḥ
analyzed: ūrvaḥ ūrvaḥ viś ojaḥ ṅghriḥ a veda śūdrau prasīdatām naḥ sa mahā vibhūtiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.042/1 lobho 'dharāt prītirupary abhūddyutir nastaḥ paśavyaḥ sparśena kāmaḥ
analyzed: lobhaḥ dharāt prītiḥ upari abhūt dyutiḥ nastas paśavyaḥ sparśena kāmaḥ

original: BhP_08.05.042/3 bhruvoryamaḥ pakṣmabhavastu kālaḥ prasīdatāṃ naḥ sa mahāvibhūtiḥ
analyzed: bhruvoḥ yamaḥ pakṣma bhavaḥ tu kālaḥ prasīdatām naḥ sa mahā vibhūtiḥ

original: BhP_08.05.043/1 dravyaṃ vayaḥ karma guṇān viśeṣaṃ yadyogamāyāvihitān vadanti
analyzed: dravyam vayaḥ karma guṇān viśeṣam yat yoga māyā vihitān vadanti

original: BhP_08.05.043/3 yaddurvibhāvyaṃ prabudhāpabādhaṃ prasīdatāṃ naḥ sa mahāvibhūtiḥ
analyzed: yat durvibhāvyam prabudhā apabādham prasīdatām naḥ sa mahā vibhūtiḥ
namaḥ stu tasmai upaśānta śaktaye svā rājya lābha pratipūrita ātmane

original: BhP_08.05.044/3 guṇeṣu māyāraciteṣu vṛttibhir na sajjamānāya nabhasvadūtaye
analyzed: guṇeṣu māyā raciteṣu vṛttibhiḥ na sajjamānāya nabhasvat ūtaye
sa tvam naḥ darśaya ātmānam asmad karaṇa gocaram

original: BhP_08.05.045/3 prapannānāṃ didṛkṣūṇāṃ sasmitaṃ te mukhāmbujam
analyzed: prapannānām didṛkṣūṇām sa smitam te mukha ambujam

original: BhP_08.05.046/1 taistaiḥ svecchābhūtai rūpaiḥ kāle kāle svayaṃ vibho
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ sva icchā bhūtaiḥ rūpaiḥ kāle kāle svayam vibho

original: BhP_08.05.046/3 karma durviṣahaṃ yan no bhagavāṃstat karoti hi
analyzed: karma durviṣaham yat naḥ bhagavān tat karoti hi
kleśa bhūri alpa sārāṇi karmāṇi viphalāni vā

original: BhP_08.05.047/3 dehināṃ viṣayārtānāṃ na tathaivārpitaṃ tvayi
analyzed: dehinām viṣaya ārtānām na tathā eva arpitam tvayi
na avamaḥ viphalāya īśvara arpitaḥ

original: BhP_08.05.048/3 kalpate puruṣasyaiva sa hy ātmā dayito hitaḥ
analyzed: kalpate puruṣasya eva sa hi ātmā dayitaḥ hitaḥ
yathā hi skandha śākhānām taroḥ mūla avasecanam
evam ārādhanam viṣṇoḥ sarveṣām ātmanaḥ ca hi
namaḥ tubhyam anantāya durvitarkya ātma karmaṇe

original: BhP_08.05.050/3 nirguṇāya guṇeśāya sattvasthāya ca sāmpratam
analyzed: nirguṇāya guṇa īśāya sattva sthāya ca sāmpratam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
evam stutaḥ sura gaṇaiḥ bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ
teṣām āvirabhūt rājan sahasra arka udaya dyutiḥ

original: BhP_08.06.002/1 tenaiva sahasā sarve devāḥ pratihatekṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: tena eva sahasā sarve devāḥ pratihata īkṣaṇāḥ

original: BhP_08.06.002/3 nāpaśyan khaṃ diśaḥ kṣauṇīmātmānaṃ ca kuto vibhum
analyzed: na apaśyan kham diśaḥ kṣauṇīm ātmānam ca kutas vibhum

original: BhP_08.06.003/1 viriñco bhagavān dṛṣṭvā saha śarveṇa tāṃ tanum
analyzed: viriñcaḥ bhagavān dṛṣṭvā saha śarveṇa tām tanum
su acchām marakata śyāmām kañja garbha aruṇa īkṣaṇām
tapta hema avadātena lasat kauśeya vāsasā
prasanna cāru sarva aṅgīm su mukhīm sundara bhruvam
mahā maṇi kirīṭena keyūrābhyām ca bhūṣitām
karṇa ābharaṇa nirbhāta kapola śrī mukha ambujām
kāñcī kalāpa valaya hāra nūpura śobhitām
kaustubha ābharaṇām lakṣmīm bibhratīm vana mālinīm
sudarśana ādibhiḥ sva astraiḥ mūrtimadbhiḥ upāsitām

original: BhP_08.06.007/3 tuṣṭāva devapravaraḥ saśarvaḥ puruṣaṃ param
analyzed: tuṣṭāva deva pravaraḥ sa śarvaḥ puruṣam param
sarva amara gaṇaiḥ sākam sarva aṅgaiḥ avanim gataiḥ
śrī brahmā uvāca
ajāta janma sthiti saṃyamāyāḥ guṇāya nirvāṇa sukha arṇavāya
aṇoḥ aṇimne parigaṇya dhāmne mahā anubhāvāya namaḥ namaḥ te
rūpam tava etat puruṣa ṛṣabha ijyam śreyaḥ rthibhiḥ vaidika tāntrikeṇa

original: BhP_08.06.009/3 yogena dhātaḥ saha nastrilokān paśyāmy amuṣminnu ha viśvamūrtau
analyzed: yogena dhātar saha naḥ tri lokān paśyāmi amuṣmin nu ha viśvamūrtau

original: BhP_08.06.010/1 tvayy agra āsīt tvayi madhya āsīt tvayy anta āsīdidamātmatantre
analyzed: tvayi agre āsīt tvayi madhye āsīt tvayi ante āsīt idam ātmatantre

original: BhP_08.06.010/3 tvamādiranto jagato 'sya madhyaṃ ghaṭasya mṛtsneva paraḥ parasmāt
analyzed: tvam ādiḥ antaḥ jagataḥ sya madhyam ghaṭasya mṛtsnā iva paraḥ parasmāt

original: BhP_08.06.011/1 tvaṃ māyayātmāśrayayā svayedaṃ nirmāya viśvaṃ tadanupraviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: tvam māyayā ātma āśrayayā svayā idam nirmāya viśvam tat anupraviṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_08.06.011/3 paśyanti yuktā manasā manīṣiṇo guṇavyavāye 'py aguṇaṃ vipaścitaḥ
analyzed: paśyanti yuktāḥ manasā manīṣiṇaḥ guṇa vyavāye pi aguṇam vipaścitaḥ

original: BhP_08.06.012/1 yathāgnimedhasy amṛtaṃ ca goṣu bhuvy annamambūdyamane ca vṛttim
analyzed: yathā agni medhasi amṛtam ca goṣu bhuvi annam ambu udyamane ca vṛttim

original: BhP_08.06.012/3 yogairmanuṣyā adhiyanti hi tvāṃ guṇeṣu buddhyā kavayo vadanti
analyzed: yogaiḥ manuṣyāḥ adhiyanti hi tvām guṇeṣu buddhyā kavayaḥ vadanti

original: BhP_08.06.013/1 taṃ tvāṃ vayaṃ nātha samujjihānaṃ sarojanābhāticirepsitārtham
analyzed: tam tvām vayam nātha samujjihānam saroja nābha ati cira īpsita artham

original: BhP_08.06.013/3 dṛṣṭvā gatā nirvṛtamadya sarve gajā davārtā iva gāṅgamambhaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā gatāḥ nirvṛtam adya sarve gajāḥ dava ārtāḥ iva gāṅgam ambhaḥ

original: BhP_08.06.014/1 sa tvaṃ vidhatsvākhilalokapālā vayaṃ yadarthāstava pādamūlam
analyzed: sa tvam vidhatsva akhila lokapālāḥ vayam yad arthāḥ tava pāda mūlam
samāgatāḥ te bahis antar ātman kim vā anya vijñāpyam aśeṣa sākṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_08.06.015/1 ahaṃ giritraśca surādayo ye dakṣādayo 'gneriva ketavaste
analyzed: aham giritraḥ ca sura ādayaḥ ye dakṣa ādayaḥ gneḥ iva ketavaḥ te

original: BhP_08.06.015/3 kiṃ vā vidāmeśa pṛthagvibhātā vidhatsva śaṃ no dvijadevamantram
analyzed: kim vā vidhatsva śam naḥ dvija deva mantram
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.06.016/1 evaṃ viriñcādibhirīḍitastad vijñāya teṣāṃ hṛdayaṃ yathaiva
analyzed: evam viriñca ādibhiḥ īḍitaḥ tat vijñāya teṣām hṛdayam yathā eva

original: BhP_08.06.016/3 jagāda jīmūtagabhīrayā girā baddhāñjalīn saṃvṛtasarvakārakān
analyzed: jagāda jīmūta gabhīrayā girā baddhāñjalīn saṃvṛta sarva kārakān
ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ tasmin sura kārye sureśvaraḥ
vihartu kāmaḥ tān āha samudra unmathana ādibhiḥ
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_08.06.018/1 hanta brahmannaho śambho he devā mama bhāṣitam
analyzed: hanta brahman aho śambho he devāḥ mama bhāṣitam

original: BhP_08.06.018/3 śṛṇutāvahitāḥ sarve śreyo vaḥ syādyathā surāḥ
analyzed: śṛṇuta avahitāḥ sarve śreyaḥ vaḥ syāt yathā surāḥ
yāta dānava daiteyaiḥ tāvat sandhiḥ vidhīyatām
kālena anugṛhītaiḥ taiḥ yāvat vaḥ bhavaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_08.06.020/1 arayo 'pi hi sandheyāḥ sati kāryārthagaurave
analyzed: arayaḥ pi hi sandheyāḥ sati kārya artha gaurave

original: BhP_08.06.020/3 ahimūṣikavaddevā hy arthasya padavīṃ gataiḥ
analyzed: ahi mūṣika vat devāḥ hi arthasya padavīm gataiḥ
amṛta utpādane yatnaḥ kriyatām avilambitam

original: BhP_08.06.021/3 yasya pītasya vai janturmṛtyugrasto 'maro bhavet
analyzed: yasya pītasya vai jantuḥ mṛtyu grastaḥ maraḥ bhavet
kṣiptvā kṣīrodadhau sarvāḥ vīrudh tṛṇa latā oṣadhīḥ

original: BhP_08.06.022/3 manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ kṛtvā tu vāsukim
analyzed: manthānam mandaram kṛtvā netram kṛtvā tu vāsukim
sahāyena mayā devāḥ nirmanthadhvam atandritāḥ

original: BhP_08.06.023/3 kleśabhājo bhaviṣyanti daityā yūyaṃ phalagrahāḥ
analyzed: kleśa bhājaḥ bhaviṣyanti daityāḥ yūyam phala grahāḥ

original: BhP_08.06.024/1 yūyaṃ tadanumodadhvaṃ yadicchanty asurāḥ surāḥ
analyzed: yūyam tat anumodadhvam yat icchanti asurāḥ surāḥ

original: BhP_08.06.024/3 na saṃrambheṇa sidhyanti sarvārthāḥ sāntvayā yathā
analyzed: na saṃrambheṇa sidhyanti sarva arthāḥ sāntvayā yathā
na bhetavyam kālakūṭāt viṣāt jaladhi sambhavāt

original: BhP_08.06.025/3 lobhaḥ kāryo na vo jātu roṣaḥ kāmastu vastuṣu
analyzed: lobhaḥ kāryaḥ na vaḥ jātu roṣaḥ kām astu vastuṣu
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.06.026/1 iti devān samādiśya bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ
analyzed: iti devān samādiśya bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ
teṣām antardadhe rājan svacchanda gatiḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_08.06.027/1 atha tasmai bhagavate namaskṛtya pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: atha tasmai bhagavate namaskṛtya pitāmahaḥ

original: BhP_08.06.027/3 bhavaśca jagmatuḥ svaṃ svaṃ dhāmopeyurbaliṃ surāḥ
analyzed: bhavaḥ ca jagmatuḥ svam svam dhāma upeyuḥ balim surāḥ

original: BhP_08.06.028/1 dṛṣṭvārīn apy asaṃyattān jātakṣobhān svanāyakān
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā arīn api a saṃyattān jāta kṣobhān sva nāyakān
nyaṣedhat daitya rāj ślokyaḥ sandhi vigraha kāla vid
te vairocanim āsīnam guptam ca asura yūthapaiḥ
śriyā paramayā juṣṭam jita aśeṣam upāgaman

original: BhP_08.06.030/1 mahendraḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā sāntvayitvā mahāmatiḥ
analyzed: mahā indraḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā sāntvayitvā mahāmatiḥ

original: BhP_08.06.030/3 abhyabhāṣata tat sarvaṃ śikṣitaṃ puruṣottamāt
analyzed: abhyabhāṣata tat sarvam śikṣitam puruṣottamāt

original: BhP_08.06.031/1 tat tvarocata daityasya tatrānye ye 'surādhipāḥ
analyzed: tat tu arocata daityasya tatra anye ye sura adhipāḥ
śambaraḥ riṣṭanemiḥ ca ye ca tripura vāsinaḥ

original: BhP_08.06.032/1 tato devāsurāḥ kṛtvā saṃvidaṃ kṛtasauhṛdāḥ
analyzed: tatas deva asurāḥ kṛtvā saṃvidam kṛta sauhṛdāḥ
udyamam paramam cakruḥ amṛta arthe parantapa
tatas te mandara girim ojasā utpāṭya durmadāḥ

original: BhP_08.06.033/3 nadanta udadhiṃ ninyuḥ śaktāḥ parighabāhavaḥ
analyzed: nadantaḥ udadhim ninyuḥ śaktāḥ parigha bāhavaḥ
dūra bhāra udvaha śrāntāḥ śakra vairocana ādayaḥ

original: BhP_08.06.034/3 apārayantastaṃ voḍhuṃ vivaśā vijahuḥ pathi
analyzed: a pārayantaḥ tam voḍhum vivaśāḥ vijahuḥ pathi

original: BhP_08.06.035/1 nipatan sa giristatra bahūn amaradānavān
analyzed: nipatan sa giriḥ tatra bahūn amara dānavān
cūrṇayāmāsa mahatā bhāreṇa kanakācalaḥ
tān tathā bhagnamanasaḥ bhagna bāhu ūru kandharān
vijñāya bhagavān tatra babhūva garuḍadhvajaḥ
giri pāta viniṣpiṣṭān vilokya amara dānavān

original: BhP_08.06.037/3 īkṣayā jīvayāmāsa nirjarān nirvraṇān yathā
analyzed: īkṣayā jīvayāmāsa nirjarān nirvraṇān yathā

original: BhP_08.06.038/1 giriṃ cāropya garuḍe hastenaikena līlayā
analyzed: girim ca āropya garuḍe hastena ekena līlayā
āruhya prayayau abdhim sura asura gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_08.06.039/1 avaropya giriṃ skandhāt suparṇaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: avaropya girim skandhāt suparṇaḥ patatām varaḥ

original: BhP_08.06.039/3 yayau jalānta utsṛjya hariṇā sa visarjitaḥ
analyzed: yayau jala ante utsṛjya hariṇā sa visarjitaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
te nāga rājam āmantrya phala bhāgena vāsukim

original: BhP_08.07.001/3 parivīya girau tasmin netramabdhiṃ mudānvitāḥ
analyzed: parivīya girau tasmin netram abdhim mudā anvitāḥ

original: BhP_08.07.002/1 ārebhire surā yattā amṛtārthe kurūdvaha
analyzed: ārebhire surāḥ yattāḥ amṛta arthe kuru udvaha

original: BhP_08.07.002/3 hariḥ purastāj jagṛhe pūrvaṃ devāstato 'bhavan
analyzed: hariḥ purastāt jagṛhe pūrvam devāḥ tatas bhavan
tat na aicchan daitya patayaḥ mahāpuruṣa ceṣṭitam
na gṛhṇīmaḥ vayam puccham aheḥ aṅgam amaṅgalam
svādhyāya śruta sampannāḥ prakhyātāḥ janma karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_08.07.004/3 iti tūṣṇīṃ sthitān daityān vilokya puruṣottamaḥ
analyzed: iti tūṣṇīm sthitān daityān vilokya puruṣottamaḥ

original: BhP_08.07.004/5 smayamāno visṛjyāgraṃ pucchaṃ jagrāha sāmaraḥ
analyzed: smayamānaḥ visṛjya agram puccham jagrāha sa amaraḥ
kṛta sthāna vibhāgāḥ te evam kaśyapa nandanāḥ

original: BhP_08.07.006/3 mamanthuḥ paramaṃ yattā amṛtārthaṃ payonidhim
analyzed: mamanthuḥ paramam yattāḥ amṛta artham payonidhim
mathyamāne rṇave saḥ driḥ an ādhāraḥ hi apaḥ viśat
dhriyamāṇaḥ balibhiḥ gauravāt pāṇḍu nandana
te su nirviṇṇa manasaḥ parimlāna mukha śriyaḥ
āsan sva pauruṣe naṣṭe daivena ati balīyasā
vilokya vighneśa vidhim tadā īśvaraḥ duranta vīryaḥ vitatha abhisandhiḥ

original: BhP_08.07.009/3 kṛtvā vapuḥ kacchapamadbhutaṃ mahat praviśya toyaṃ girimujjahāra
analyzed: kṛtvā vapuḥ kacchapam adbhutam mahat praviśya toyam girim ujjahāra

original: BhP_08.07.010/1 tamutthitaṃ vīkṣya kulācalaṃ punaḥ samudyatā nirmathituṃ surāsurāḥ
analyzed: tam utthitam vīkṣya kula acalam punar samudyatāḥ nirmathitum sura asurāḥ

original: BhP_08.07.010/3 dadhāra pṛṣṭhena sa lakṣayojana prastāriṇā dvīpa ivāparo mahān
analyzed: dadhāra pṛṣṭhena sa lakṣa yojana prastāriṇā dvīpaḥ iva aparaḥ mahān
sura asura indraiḥ bhuja vīrya vepitam paribhramantam girim aṅga pṛṣṭhatas
bibhrat tad āvartanam ādi kacchapaḥ mene ṅga kaṇḍūyanam aprameyaḥ

original: BhP_08.07.012/1 tathāsurān āviśadāsureṇa rūpeṇa teṣāṃ balavīryamīrayan
analyzed: tathā asurān āviśat āsureṇa rūpeṇa teṣām bala vīryam īrayan

original: BhP_08.07.012/3 uddīpayan devagaṇāṃśca viṣṇur daivena nāgendramabodharūpaḥ
analyzed: uddīpayan deva gaṇān ca viṣṇuḥ daivena nāga indram abodha rūpaḥ

original: BhP_08.07.013/1 upary agendraṃ girirāḍ ivānya ākramya hastena sahasrabāhuḥ
analyzed: upari aga indram giri rāj iva anyaḥ ākramya hastena sahasra bāhuḥ

original: BhP_08.07.013/3 tasthau divi brahmabhavendramukhyair abhiṣṭuvadbhiḥ sumano 'bhivṛṣṭaḥ
analyzed: tasthau divi brahma bhava indra mukhyaiḥ abhiṣṭuvadbhiḥ

original: BhP_08.07.014/1 upary adhaścātmani gotranetrayoḥ pareṇa te prāviśatā samedhitāḥ
analyzed: upari adhas ca ātmani gotra netrayoḥ pareṇa te samedhitāḥ

original: BhP_08.07.014/3 mamanthurabdhiṃ tarasā madotkaṭā mahādriṇā kṣobhitanakracakram
analyzed: mamanthuḥ abdhim tarasā mada utkaṭāḥ mahā adriṇā kṣobhita nakra cakram
surāḥ
pauloma kāleya bali ilvala ādayaḥ dava agni dagdhāḥ saralāḥ iva abhavan
devān ca tad śvāsa śikhā hata prabhān dhūmra ambara sraj vara kañcuka ānanān

original: BhP_08.07.016/3 samabhyavarṣan bhagavadvaśā ghanā vavuḥ samudrormyupagūḍhavāyavaḥ
analyzed: samabhyavarṣan bhagavat vaśāḥ ghanāḥ vavuḥ samudra ūrmi upagūḍha vāyavaḥ
mathyamānāt tathā sindhoḥ deva asura varūthapaiḥ

original: BhP_08.07.017/3 yadā sudhā na jāyeta nirmamanthājitaḥ svayam
analyzed: yadā sudhā na jāyeta svayam
mūrdhni bhrājat vilulita kacaḥ sraj dharaḥ rakta netraḥ
jaitraiḥ dorbhiḥ jagat abhaya daiḥ dandaśūkam gṛhītvā
mathnan pratigiriḥ iva aśobhata atho dhṛta adriḥ
nirmathyamānāt udadheḥ abhūt viṣam mahā ulbaṇam hālahala āhvam agratas
timi dvipa grāha timiṅgila ākulāt

original: BhP_08.07.020/1 tadugravegaṃ diśi diśy upary adho visarpadutsarpadasahyamaprati
analyzed: tat ugra vegam diśi diśi upari adhas visarpat utsarpat asahyam aprati

original: BhP_08.07.020/3 bhītāḥ prajā dudruvuraṅga seśvarā arakṣyamāṇāḥ śaraṇaṃ sadāśivam
analyzed: bhītāḥ prajāḥ dudruvuḥ aṅga sa īśvarāḥ arakṣyamāṇāḥ śaraṇam sadāśivam

original: BhP_08.07.021/1 vilokya taṃ devavaraṃ trilokyā bhavāya devyābhimataṃ munīnām
analyzed: vilokya tam deva varam trilokyāḥ bhavāya devyā abhimatam munīnām

original: BhP_08.07.021/3 āsīnamadrāvapavargahetos tapo juṣāṇaṃ stutibhiḥ praṇemuḥ
analyzed: āsīnam adrau apavarga hetoḥ tapaḥ juṣāṇam stutibhiḥ praṇemuḥ
śrī prajāpatayaḥ ūcuḥ
devadeva mahādeva bhūtātman bhūtabhāvana
trāhi naḥ śaraṇa āpannān trailokya dahanāt viṣāt
tvam ekaḥ sarva jagataḥ īśvaraḥ bandha mokṣayoḥ

original: BhP_08.07.023/3 taṃ tvāmarcanti kuśalāḥ prapannārtiharaṃ gurum
analyzed: tam tvām arcanti kuśalāḥ prapanna ārti haram gurum
guṇa mayyā sva śaktyā asya sarga sthiti apyayān vibho

original: BhP_08.07.024/3 dhatse yadā svadṛg bhūman brahmaviṣṇuśivābhidhām
analyzed: dhatse yadā sva dṛś bhūman brahma viṣṇu śiva abhidhām

original: BhP_08.07.025/1 tvaṃ brahma paramaṃ guhyaṃ sadasadbhāvabhāvanam
analyzed: tvam brahma paramam guhyam sat asat bhāva bhāvanam
nānā śaktibhiḥ ābhātaḥ tvam ātmā jagat īśvaraḥ
tvam śabdayoniḥ jagat ādiḥ ātmā prāṇa indriya dravya guṇaḥ svabhāvaḥ

original: BhP_08.07.026/3 kālaḥ kratuḥ satyamṛtaṃ ca dharmas tvayy akṣaraṃ yat trivṛdāmananti
analyzed: kālaḥ kratuḥ satyam ṛtam ca dharmaḥ tvayi akṣaram yat trivṛt āmananti
agniḥ mukham te khila devatā ātmā kṣitim viduḥ loka bhava aṅghri paṅkajam

original: BhP_08.07.027/3 kālaṃ gatiṃ te 'khiladevatātmano diśaśca karṇau rasanaṃ jaleśam
analyzed: kālam gatim te khila devatā ātmanaḥ diśaḥ ca karṇau rasanam jaleśam

original: BhP_08.07.028/1 nābhirnabhaste śvasanaṃ nabhasvān sūryaśca cakṣūṃṣi jalaṃ sma retaḥ
analyzed: nābhiḥ nabhaḥ te śvasanam nabhasvān sūryaḥ ca cakṣūṃṣi jalam sma retaḥ

original: BhP_08.07.028/3 parāvarātmāśrayaṇaṃ tavātmā somo mano dyaurbhagavan śiraste
analyzed: parāvara ātma āśrayaṇam tava ātmā somaḥ manaḥ dyauḥ bhagavan śiraḥ te

original: BhP_08.07.029/1 kukṣiḥ samudrā girayo 'sthisaṅghā romāṇi sarvauṣadhivīrudhaste
analyzed: kukṣiḥ samudrāḥ girayaḥ sthi saṅghāḥ romāṇi sarva oṣadhi vīrudhaḥ te

original: BhP_08.07.029/3 chandāṃsi sākṣāt tava sapta dhātavas trayīmayātman hṛdayaṃ sarvadharmaḥ
analyzed: chandāṃsi sākṣāt tava sapta dhātavaḥ trayī maya ātman hṛdayam sarva dharmaḥ
mukhāni pañca upaniṣadaḥ tava īśa yaiḥ triṃśat aṣṭa uttara mantra vargaḥ

original: BhP_08.07.030/3 yat tac chivākhyaṃ paramātmatattvaṃ deva svayaṃjyotiravasthitiste
analyzed: yat tat śiva ākhyam paramātma tattvam deva svayam jyotiḥ avasthitiḥ te

original: BhP_08.07.031/1 chāyā tvadharmormiṣu yairvisargo netratrayaṃ sattvarajastamāṃsi
analyzed: chāyā tu adharma ūrmiṣu yaiḥ visargaḥ netra trayam sattva rajaḥ tamāṃsi

original: BhP_08.07.031/3 sāṅkhyātmanaḥ śāstrakṛtastavekṣā chandomayo deva ṛṣiḥ purāṇaḥ
analyzed: sāṅkhya ātmanaḥ śāstra kṛtaḥ tava īkṣā chandaḥ mayaḥ devaḥ ṛṣiḥ purāṇaḥ
na te giritra akhila lokapāla viriñca vaikuṇṭha sura indra gamyam

original: BhP_08.07.032/3 jyotiḥ paraṃ yatra rajastamaśca sattvaṃ na yadbrahma nirastabhedam
analyzed: jyotiḥ param yatra rajaḥ tamaḥ ca sattvam na yat brahma nirasta bhedam

original: BhP_08.07.033/2 bhūtadruhaḥ kṣapayataḥ stutaye na tat te
analyzed: bhūta druhaḥ kṣapayataḥ stutaye na tat te
yaḥ tu anta kāle idam ātma kṛtam sva netra
vahni sphuliṅga śikhayā bhasitam na veda
ye tu ātma rāma gurubhiḥ hṛdi cintita aṅghri
dvandvam carantam umayā tapasā abhitaptam
katthante ugra paruṣam niratam śmaśāne
te nūnam ūtim avidan tava hāta lajjāḥ

original: BhP_08.07.035/1 tat tasya te sadasatoḥ parataḥ parasya
analyzed: tat tasya te sat asatoḥ paratas parasya
na añjas sva rūpa gamane prabhavanti bhūmnaḥ

original: BhP_08.07.035/3 brahmādayaḥ kimuta saṃstavane vayaṃ tu
analyzed: brahma ādayaḥ kim uta saṃstavane vayam tu
tad sarga sarga viṣayāḥ api śakti mātram

original: BhP_08.07.036/1 etat paraṃ prapaśyāmo na paraṃ te maheśvara
analyzed: etat param prapaśyāmaḥ na param te maheśvara
mṛḍanāya hi lokasya vyaktiḥ te vyakta karmaṇaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.07.037/1 tadvīkṣya vyasanaṃ tāsāṃ kṛpayā bhṛśapīḍitaḥ
analyzed: tat vīkṣya vyasanam tāsām kṛpayā bhṛśa pīḍitaḥ
sarva bhūta suhṛd devaḥ idam āha satīm priyām
uvāca

original: BhP_08.07.038/1 aho bata bhavāny etat prajānāṃ paśya vaiśasam
analyzed: aho bata bhavāni etat prajānām paśya vaiśasam
kṣīroda mathana udbhūtāt kālakūṭāt upasthitam

original: BhP_08.07.039/1 āsāṃ prāṇaparīpsūnāṃ vidheyamabhayaṃ hi me
analyzed: āsām prāṇa parīpsūnām vidheyam abhayam hi me
etāvān hi prabhoḥ arthaḥ yat dīna paripālanam

original: BhP_08.07.040/1 prāṇaiḥ svaiḥ prāṇinaḥ pānti sādhavaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅguraiḥ
analyzed: prāṇaiḥ svaiḥ prāṇinaḥ pānti sādhavaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅguraiḥ
baddha vaireṣu bhūteṣu mohiteṣu ātma māyayā

original: BhP_08.07.041/1 puṃsaḥ kṛpayato bhadre sarvātmā prīyate hariḥ
analyzed: puṃsaḥ kṛpayataḥ bhadre sarvātmā prīyate hariḥ

original: BhP_08.07.041/3 prīte harau bhagavati prīye 'haṃ sacarācaraḥ
analyzed: prīte harau bhagavati prīye ham sacarācaraḥ

original: BhP_08.07.041/5 tasmādidaṃ garaṃ bhuñje prajānāṃ svastirastu me
analyzed: tasmāt idam garam bhuñje prajānām svastiḥ astu me
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
evam āmantrya bhagavān bhavānīm viśvabhāvanaḥ
tat viṣam jagdhum ārebhe prabhāva jñā anvamodata

original: BhP_08.07.043/1 tataḥ karatalīkṛtya vyāpi hālāhalaṃ viṣam
analyzed: tatas vyāpi hālāhalam viṣam
abhakṣayat mahādevaḥ kṛpayā bhūtabhāvanaḥ
tasya api darśayāmāsa sva vīryam jalakalmaṣaḥ

original: BhP_08.07.044/3 yac cakāra gale nīlaṃ tac ca sādhorvibhūṣaṇam
analyzed: yat cakāra gale nīlam tat ca sādhoḥ vibhūṣaṇam

original: BhP_08.07.045/1 tapyante lokatāpena sādhavaḥ prāyaśo janāḥ
analyzed: tapyante loka tāpena sādhavaḥ prāyaśas janāḥ
parama ārādhanam tat hi puruṣasya akhilātmanaḥ

original: BhP_08.07.046/1 niśamya karma tac chambhordevadevasya mīḍhuṣaḥ
analyzed: niśamya karma tat śambhoḥ devadevasya mīḍhuṣaḥ

original: BhP_08.07.046/3 prajā dākṣāyaṇī brahmā vaikuṇṭhaśca śaśaṃsire
analyzed: prajāḥ dākṣāyaṇī brahmā vaikuṇṭhaḥ ca śaśaṃsire

original: BhP_08.07.047/1 praskannaṃ pibataḥ pāṇeryat kiñcij jagṛhuḥ sma tat
analyzed: praskannam pibataḥ pāṇeḥ yat kiñcid jagṛhuḥ sma tat
vṛścika ahi viṣa oṣadhyaḥ dandaśūkāḥ ca ye pare
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
pīte gare vṛṣāṅkeṇa prītāḥ te mara dānavāḥ
mamanthuḥ tarasā sindhum havirdhānī tatas bhavat
tām agnihotrīm ṛṣayaḥ jagṛhuḥ brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_08.08.002/3 yajñasya devayānasya medhyāya haviṣe nṛpa
analyzed: yajñasya deva yānasya medhyāya haviṣe nṛpa

original: BhP_08.08.003/1 tata uccaiḥśravā nāma hayo 'bhūc candrapāṇḍuraḥ
analyzed: tatas uccaiḥśravāḥ nāma hayaḥ bhūt candra pāṇḍuraḥ

original: BhP_08.08.003/3 tasmin baliḥ spṛhāṃ cakre nendra īśvaraśikṣayā
analyzed: tasmin baliḥ spṛhām cakre na indraḥ īśvara śikṣayā

original: BhP_08.08.004/1 tata airāvato nāma vāraṇendro vinirgataḥ
analyzed: tata airāvataḥ nāma vāraṇa indraḥ vinirgataḥ
dantaiḥ caturbhiḥ śvetādreḥ haran bhagavataḥ mahim
airāvaṇa ādayaḥ tu aṣṭau diggajāḥ abhavan tatas
abhramu prabhṛtayaḥ ṣṭau ca kariṇyaḥ tu abhavan nṛpa
kaustubha ākhyam abhūt ratnam padmarāgaḥ mahodadheḥ

original: BhP_08.08.006/3 tasmin maṇau spṛhāṃ cakre vakṣo 'laṅkaraṇe hariḥ
analyzed: tasmin maṇau spṛhām cakre vakṣaḥ laṅkaraṇe hariḥ
tatas bhavat pārijātaḥ sura loka vibhūṣaṇam

original: BhP_08.08.007/3 pūrayaty arthino yo 'rthaiḥ śaśvadbhuvi yathā bhavān
analyzed: pūrayati arthinaḥ yaḥ rthaiḥ śaśvat bhuvi yathā bhavān
tatas ca apsarasaḥ jātāḥ niṣka kaṇṭhyaḥ su vāsasaḥ
ramaṇyaḥ svargiṇām valgu gati līlā avalokanaiḥ

original: BhP_08.08.009/1 tataścāvirabhūt sākṣāc chrī ramā bhagavatparā
analyzed: tatas ca āvirabhūt sākṣāt śrī ramā bhagavat parā

original: BhP_08.08.009/3 rañjayantī diśaḥ kāntyā vidyut saudāmanī yathā
analyzed: rañjayantī diśaḥ kāntyā vidyut saudāmanī yathā

original: BhP_08.08.010/1 tasyāṃ cakruḥ spṛhāṃ sarve sasurāsuramānavāḥ
analyzed: tasyām cakruḥ spṛhām sarve sa sura asura mānavāḥ
rūpa audārya vayaḥ varṇa mahima ākṣipta cetasaḥ
tasyāḥ āsanam āninye mahā indraḥ mahat adbhutam
mūrtimatyaḥ sarit śreṣṭhāḥ hema kumbhaiḥ jalam śuci
ābhiṣecanikā bhūmiḥ āharat sakala oṣadhīḥ

original: BhP_08.08.012/3 gāvaḥ pañca pavitrāṇi vasanto madhumādhavau
analyzed: gāvaḥ pañca pavitrāṇi vasantaḥ madhu mādhavau
ṛṣayaḥ cakruḥ ā abhiṣekam yathāvidhi
jaguḥ bhadrāṇi gandharvāḥ naṭyaḥ ca nanṛtuḥ jaguḥ
meghāḥ mṛdaṅga paṇava muraja ānaka gomukhān
vyanādayan śaṅkha veṇu vīṇāḥ tumula niḥsvanān
tatas bhiṣiṣicuḥ devīm śriyam padma karām satīm
diś ibhāḥ pūrṇa kalaśaiḥ sūkta vākyaiḥ dvija īritaiḥ
samudraḥ pītakauśeya vāsasī samupāharat

original: BhP_08.08.016/3 varuṇaḥ srajaṃ vaijayantīṃ madhunā mattaṣaṭpadām
analyzed: varuṇaḥ srajam vaijayantīm madhunā matta ṣaṭpadām
bhūṣaṇāni vicitrāṇi viśvakarmā prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_08.08.017/3 hāraṃ sarasvatī padmamajo nāgāśca kuṇḍale
analyzed: hāram sarasvatī padmam ajaḥ nāgāḥ ca kuṇḍale

original: BhP_08.08.018/1 tataḥ kṛtasvastyayanotpalasrajaṃ nadaddvirephāṃ parigṛhya pāṇinā
analyzed: tatas kṛta svastyayana utpala srajam nadat dvirephām parigṛhya pāṇinā

original: BhP_08.08.018/3 cacāla vaktraṃ sukapolakuṇḍalaṃ savrīḍahāsaṃ dadhatī suśobhanam
analyzed: cacāla vaktram su kapola kuṇḍalam sa vrīḍa hāsam dadhatī su śobhanam

original: BhP_08.08.019/1 stanadvayaṃ cātikṛśodarī samaṃ nirantaraṃ candanakuṅkumokṣitam
analyzed: stana dvayam ca ati kṛśa udarī samam nirantaram candana kuṅkuma ukṣitam

original: BhP_08.08.019/3 tatastato nūpuravalgu śiñjitair visarpatī hemalateva sā babhau
analyzed: tatas tatas nūpura valgu śiñjitaiḥ visarpatī hema latā iva sā babhau

original: BhP_08.08.020/1 vilokayantī niravadyamātmanaḥ padaṃ dhruvaṃ cāvyabhicārisadguṇam
analyzed: vilokayantī niravadyam ātmanaḥ padam dhruvam ca avyabhicāri sat guṇam
gandharva siddha asura yakṣa cāraṇa traipiṣṭapeya ādiṣu na anvavindata

original: BhP_08.08.021/1 nūnaṃ tapo yasya na manyunirjayo jñānaṃ kvacit tac ca na saṅgavarjitam
analyzed: nūnam tapaḥ yasya na manyu nirjayaḥ jñānam kvacid tat ca na saṅga varjitam

original: BhP_08.08.021/3 kaścin mahāṃstasya na kāmanirjayaḥ sa īśvaraḥ kiṃ parato vyapāśrayaḥ
analyzed: kaścid mahān tasya na kāma nirjayaḥ saḥ īśvaraḥ kim paratas vyapāśrayaḥ

original: BhP_08.08.022/1 dharmaḥ kvacit tatra na bhūtasauhṛdaṃ tyāgaḥ kvacit tatra na muktikāraṇam
analyzed: dharmaḥ kvacid tatra na bhūta sauhṛdam tyāgaḥ kvacid tatra na mukti kāraṇam

original: BhP_08.08.022/3 vīryaṃ na puṃso 'sty ajaveganiṣkṛtaṃ na hi dvitīyo guṇasaṅgavarjitaḥ
analyzed: vīryam na puṃsaḥ sti aja vega niṣkṛtam na hi dvitīyaḥ guṇa saṅga varjitaḥ

original: BhP_08.08.023/1 kvacic cirāyurna hi śīlamaṅgalaṃ kvacit tadapy asti na vedyamāyuṣaḥ
analyzed: kvacid cira āyuḥ na hi śīla maṅgalam kvacid tat api asti na vedyam āyuṣaḥ

original: BhP_08.08.023/3 yatrobhayaṃ kutra ca so 'py amaṅgalaḥ sumaṅgalaḥ kaśca na kāṅkṣate hi mām
analyzed: yatra ubhayam kutra ca saḥ pi amaṅgalaḥ su maṅgalaḥ kaḥ ca na kāṅkṣate hi mām
evam vimṛśya avyabhicāri sat guṇaiḥ varam nija eka āśraya tayā a guṇa āśrayam

original: BhP_08.08.024/3 vavre varaṃ sarvaguṇairapekṣitaṃ ramā mukundaṃ nirapekṣamīpsitam
analyzed: vavre varam sarva guṇaiḥ apekṣitam ramā mukundam nirapekṣam īpsitam
tasya aṃsa deśe uśatīm nava kañja mālām
mādyat madhu vrata varūtha girā upaghuṣṭām

original: BhP_08.08.025/3 tasthau nidhāya nikaṭe taduraḥ svadhāma
analyzed: tasthau nidhāya nikaṭe tad uraḥ sva dhāma
sa vrīḍa hāsa vikasat nayanena yātā
tasyāḥ śriyaḥ trijagataḥ janakaḥ jananyā
vakṣaḥ nivāsam akarot paramam vibhūteḥ

original: BhP_08.08.026/3 śrīḥ svāḥ prajāḥ sakaruṇena nirīkṣaṇena
analyzed: śrīḥ svāḥ prajāḥ sa karuṇena nirīkṣaṇena
yatra sthitā aidhayata sā adhipatīn tri lokān
śaṅkha tūrya mṛdaṅgānām vāditrāṇām pṛthuḥ svanaḥ
deva anugānām sa strīṇām nṛtyatām gāyatām abhūt
brahma rudra aṅgiraḥ mukhyāḥ sarve viśvasṛjaḥ vibhum
īḍire vitathaiḥ mantraiḥ tad liṅgaiḥ puṣpa varṣiṇaḥ
śriyā avalokitāḥ devāḥ sa prajāpatayaḥ prajāḥ
śīla ādi guṇa sampannāḥ lebhire nirvṛtim parām

original: BhP_08.08.030/1 niḥsattvā lolupā rājan nirudyogā gatatrapāḥ
analyzed: niḥsattvāḥ lolupāḥ rājan nirudyogāḥ gata trapāḥ
yadā ca upekṣitāḥ lakṣmyā babhūvuḥ daitya dānavāḥ
atha āsīt vāruṇī devī kanyā kamala locanā

original: BhP_08.08.031/3 asurā jagṛhustāṃ vai hareranumatena te
analyzed: asurāḥ jagṛhuḥ tām vai hareḥ anumatena te
atha udadheḥ mathyamānāt kāśyapaiḥ amṛta arthibhiḥ
udatiṣṭhat mahā rāja puruṣaḥ parama adbhutaḥ
śyāmalaḥ taruṇaḥ sragvī sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
pīta vāsāḥ mahā uraskaḥ sumṛṣṭa maṇi kuṇḍalaḥ
amṛta āpūrṇa kalasam bibhrat valaya bhūṣitaḥ
sa vai bhagavataḥ sākṣāt viṣṇoḥ aṃśa aṃśa sambhavaḥ
dhanvantariḥ iti khyātaḥ āyurveda dṛś ijya bhāj
tam ālokya asurāḥ sarve kalasam ca amṛta ābhṛtam
lipsantaḥ sarva vastūni kalasam tarasā aharan
nīyamāne suraiḥ tasmin kalase mṛta bhājane
viṣaṇṇa manasaḥ devāḥ harim śaraṇam āyayuḥ
iti tat dainyam ālokya bhagavān bhṛtya kāma kṛt

original: BhP_08.08.038/5 mā khidyata mitho 'rthaṃ vaḥ sādhayiṣye svamāyayā
analyzed: mā khidyata mithas rtham vaḥ sādhayiṣye sva māyayā

original: BhP_08.08.039/1 mithaḥ kalirabhūt teṣāṃ tadarthe tarṣacetasām
analyzed: mithas kaliḥ abhūt teṣām tad arthe tarṣa cetasām

original: BhP_08.08.039/3 ahaṃ pūrvamahaṃ pūrvaṃ na tvaṃ na tvamiti prabho
analyzed: aham pūrvam aham pūrvam na tvam na tvam iti prabho

original: BhP_08.08.040/1 devāḥ svaṃ bhāgamarhanti ye tulyāyāsahetavaḥ
analyzed: devāḥ svam bhāgam arhanti ye tulya āyāsa hetavaḥ
satra yāge iva etasmin eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: BhP_08.08.041/1 iti svān pratyaṣedhan vai daiteyā jātamatsarāḥ
analyzed: iti svān pratyaṣedhan vai daiteyāḥ jāta matsarāḥ

original: BhP_08.08.041/3 durbalāḥ prabalān rājan gṛhītakalasān muhuḥ
analyzed: durbalāḥ prabalān rājan gṛhīta kalasān muhur
etasmin antare viṣṇuḥ sarva upāya vid īśvaraḥ
yoṣit rūpam anirdeśyam dadhāra parama adbhutam
prekṣaṇīya utpala śyāmam sarva avayava sundaram
samāna karṇa ābharaṇam su kapola unnasa ānanam
nava yauvana nirvṛtta stana bhāra kṛśa udaram
mukha āmoda anurakta ali jhaṅkāra udvigna locanam
bibhrat su keśa bhāreṇa mālām utphulla mallikām
sugrīva kaṇṭha ābharaṇam su bhuja aṅgada bhūṣitam
viraja ambara saṃvīta nitamba dvīpa śobhayā
kāñcyā pravilasat valgu calat caraṇa nūpuram
bhrū vilāsa avalokanaiḥ
daitya yūthapa cetaḥsu kāmam uddīpayan muhur
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
te surāḥ pātram harantaḥ tyakta sauhṛdāḥ

original: BhP_08.09.001/3 kṣipanto dasyudharmāṇa āyāntīṃ dadṛśuḥ striyam
analyzed: kṣipantaḥ dasyu dharmāṇaḥ āyāntīm dadṛśuḥ striyam

original: BhP_08.09.002/1 aho rūpamaho dhāma aho asyā navaṃ vayaḥ
analyzed: aho rūpam aho dhāma aho asyāḥ navam vayaḥ
iti te tām abhidrutya papracchuḥ jāta hṛcchayāḥ

original: BhP_08.09.003/1 kā tvaṃ kañjapalāśākṣi kuto vā kiṃ cikīrṣasi
analyzed: kā tvam kañja palāśa akṣi kutas vā kim cikīrṣasi

original: BhP_08.09.003/3 kasyāsi vada vāmoru mathnatīva manāṃsi naḥ
analyzed: kasya asi vada vāma ūru mathnatī iva manāṃsi naḥ
na vayam tvā amaraiḥ daityaiḥ siddha gandharva cāraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_08.09.004/3 nāspṛṣṭapūrvāṃ jānīmo lokeśaiśca kuto nṛbhiḥ
analyzed: na a spṛṣṭa pūrvām jānīmaḥ lokeśaiḥ ca kutas nṛbhiḥ

original: BhP_08.09.005/1 nūnaṃ tvaṃ vidhinā subhrūḥ preṣitāsi śarīriṇām
analyzed: nūnam tvam vidhinā subhrūḥ preṣitā asi śarīriṇām
sarva indriya manaḥ prītim vidhātum sa ghṛṇena kim

original: BhP_08.09.006/1 sā tvaṃ naḥ spardhamānānāmekavastuni mānini
analyzed: sā tvam naḥ spardhamānānām eka vastuni mānini

original: BhP_08.09.006/3 jñātīnāṃ baddhavairāṇāṃ śaṃ vidhatsva sumadhyame
analyzed: jñātīnām baddha vairāṇām śam vidhatsva sumadhyame
vayam kaśyapa dāyādāḥ bhrātaraḥ kṛta pauruṣāḥ

original: BhP_08.09.007/3 vibhajasva yathānyāyaṃ naiva bhedo yathā bhavet
analyzed: vibhajasva yathānyāyam nā eva bhedaḥ yathā bhavet
iti upāmantritaḥ daityaiḥ māyā yoṣit vapuḥ hariḥ
prahasya rucira apāṅgaiḥ nirīkṣan idam abravīt
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_08.09.009/1 kathaṃ kaśyapadāyādāḥ puṃścalyāṃ mayi saṅgatāḥ
analyzed: katham kaśyapa dāyādāḥ puṃścalyām mayi saṅga tāḥ

original: BhP_08.09.009/3 viśvāsaṃ paṇḍito jātu kāminīṣu na yāti hi
analyzed: viśvāsam paṇḍitaḥ jātu kāminīṣu na yāti hi

original: BhP_08.09.010/1 sālāvṛkāṇāṃ strīṇāṃ ca svairiṇīnāṃ suradviṣaḥ
analyzed: sālāvṛkāṇām strīṇām ca svairiṇīnām suradviṣaḥ

original: BhP_08.09.010/3 sakhyāny āhuranityāni nūtnaṃ nūtnaṃ vicinvatām
analyzed: sakhyāni āhuḥ anityāni nūtnam nūtnam vicinvatām
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
iti te kṣvelitaiḥ tasyāḥ āśvasta manasaḥ surāḥ
jahasuḥ bhāvagambhīram daduḥ ca amṛta bhājanam

original: BhP_08.09.012/1 tato gṛhītvāmṛtabhājanaṃ harir babhāṣa īṣatsmitaśobhayā girā
analyzed: tatas gṛhītvā amṛta bhājanam hariḥ babhāṣa īṣat smita śobhayā girā

original: BhP_08.09.012/3 yady abhyupetaṃ kva ca sādhvasādhu vā kṛtaṃ mayā vo vibhaje sudhāmimām
analyzed: yadi abhyupetam kva ca sādhu asādhu vā kṛtam mayā vaḥ vibhaje sudhām imām
iti abhivyāhṛtam tasyāḥ ākarṇya asura puṅgavāḥ
a pramāṇa vidaḥ tasyāḥ tat tathā iti anvamaṃsata

original: BhP_08.09.014/1 athopoṣya kṛtasnānā hutvā ca haviṣānalam
analyzed: athā upoṣya kṛta snānā hutvā ca haviṣā analam
dattvā go vipra bhūtebhyaḥ kṛta svastyayanā dvijaiḥ
yathopajoṣam vāsāṃsi paridhāya ahatāni te
kuśeṣu prāviśan sarve prāc agreṣu abhibhūṣitāḥ
prāc mukheṣu upaviṣṭeṣu sureṣu ditijeṣu ca
dhūpa āmodita śālāyām juṣṭāyām mālya dīpakaiḥ
tasyām narendra karabha ūru ruśat dukūla śroṇī taṭa alasa gatiḥ mada vihvala akṣī

original: BhP_08.09.017/3 sā kūjatī kanakanūpuraśiñjitena kumbhastanī kalasapāṇirathāviveśa
analyzed: sā kūjatī kanaka nūpura śiñjitena kumbha stanī kalasa pāṇiḥ atha āviveśa

original: BhP_08.09.018/1 tāṃ śrīsakhīṃ kanakakuṇḍalacārukarṇa nāsākapolavadanāṃ paradevatākhyām
analyzed: tām śrī sakhīm kanaka kuṇḍala cāru karṇa nāsā kapola vadanām para devatā ākhyām
saṃvīkṣya sammumuhuḥ utsmita vīkṣaṇena deva asurāḥ vigalita stana paṭṭi kāntām
asurāṇām sudhā dānam sarpāṇām iva durnayam

original: BhP_08.09.019/3 matvā jātinṛśaṃsānāṃ na tāṃ vyabhajadacyutaḥ
analyzed: matvā jāti nṛśaṃsānām na tām vyabhajat acyutaḥ
kalpayitvā pṛthak paṅktīḥ ubhayeṣām jagatpatiḥ

original: BhP_08.09.020/3 tāṃścopaveśayāmāsa sveṣu sveṣu ca paṅktiṣu
analyzed: tān ca upaveśayāmāsa sveṣu sveṣu ca paṅktiṣu
daityān gṛhīta kalasaḥ vañcayan upasañcaraiḥ
dūra sthān pāyayāmāsa jarā mṛtyu harām sudhām

original: BhP_08.09.022/1 te pālayantaḥ samayamasurāḥ svakṛtaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: te pālayantaḥ samayam asurāḥ sva kṛtam nṛpa
tūṣṇīm āsan kṛta snehāḥ strī vivāda jugupsayā
tasyām kṛta ati praṇayāḥ praṇaya apāya kātarāḥ

original: BhP_08.09.023/3 bahumānena cābaddhā nocuḥ kiñcana vipriyam
analyzed: bahu mānena ca ābaddhāḥ na ūcuḥ kiñcana vipriyam
deva liṅga praticchannaḥ svarbhānuḥ deva saṃsadi

original: BhP_08.09.024/3 praviṣṭaḥ somamapibac candrārkābhyāṃ ca sūcitaḥ
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ somam apibat candra arkābhyām ca sūcitaḥ

original: BhP_08.09.025/1 cakreṇa kṣuradhāreṇa jahāra pibataḥ śiraḥ
analyzed: cakreṇa kṣura dhāreṇa jahāra pibataḥ śiraḥ
hariḥ tasya kabandhaḥ tu sudhayā āplāvitaḥ patat
śiraḥ tu amara tām nītam ajaḥ graham acīkḷpat
yaḥ tu parvaṇi candra arkau abhidhāvati vaira dhīḥ
pīta prāye mṛte devaiḥ bhagavān loka bhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_08.09.027/3 paśyatāmasurendrāṇāṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ jagṛhe hariḥ
analyzed: paśyatām asura indrāṇām svam rūpam jagṛhe hariḥ
evam sura asura gaṇāḥ sama deśa kāla
hetu artha karma matayaḥ pi phale vikalpāḥ
tatra amṛtam sura gaṇāḥ phalam añjasā āpuḥ
yad pāda paṅkaja rajaḥ śrayaṇāt na daityāḥ
yat yujyate su vasu karma manaḥ vacobhiḥ
deha ātmaja ādiṣu nṛbhiḥ tat asat pṛthaktvāt
taiḥ eva sat bhavati yat kriyate pṛthaktvāt
sarvasya tat bhavati mūla niṣecanam yat
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
iti dānava daiteyāḥ na avindan amṛtam nṛpa
yuktāḥ karmaṇi yattāḥ ca vāsudeva parāṅmukhāḥ

original: BhP_08.10.002/1 sādhayitvāmṛtaṃ rājan pāyayitvā svakān surān
analyzed: sādhayitvā amṛtam rājan pāyayitvā svakān surān
paśyatām sarva bhūtānām yayau garuḍa vāhanaḥ

original: BhP_08.10.003/1 sapatnānāṃ parāmṛddhiṃ dṛṣṭvā te ditinandanāḥ
analyzed: sapatnānām parāmṛddhim dṛṣṭvā te diti nandanāḥ
a mṛṣyamāṇāḥ utpetuḥ devān pratyudyata āyudhāḥ

original: BhP_08.10.004/1 tataḥ suragaṇāḥ sarve sudhayā pītayaidhitāḥ
analyzed: tatas sura gaṇāḥ sarve sudhayā pītayā edhitāḥ
pratisaṃyuyudhuḥ śastraiḥ nārāyaṇa pada āśrayāḥ

original: BhP_08.10.005/1 tatra daivāsuro nāma raṇaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ
analyzed: tatra daivāsuraḥ nāma raṇaḥ parama dāruṇaḥ
rodhasi udanvataḥ rājan tumulaḥ roma harṣaṇaḥ
tatra anyonyam sapatnāḥ te saṃrabdha manasaḥ raṇe
samāsādya asibhiḥ bāṇaiḥ nijaghnuḥ vividha āyudhaiḥ
śaṅkha tūrya mṛdaṅgānām bherī iḍamariṇām mahān
hasti aśva ratha pattīnām nadatām nisvanaḥ bhavat

original: BhP_08.10.008/1 rathino rathibhistatra pattibhiḥ saha pattayaḥ
analyzed: rathinaḥ rathibhiḥ tatra pattibhiḥ saha pattayaḥ
hayāḥ hayaiḥ ibhāḥ ca ibhaiḥ samasajjanta saṃyuge

original: BhP_08.10.009/1 uṣṭraiḥ kecidibhaiḥ kecidapare yuyudhuḥ kharaiḥ
analyzed: uṣṭraiḥ kecid ibhaiḥ kecid apare yuyudhuḥ kharaiḥ
kecid gauramukhaiḥ ṛkṣaiḥ dvīpibhiḥ haribhiḥ bhaṭāḥ
gṛdhraiḥ kaṅkaiḥ bakaiḥ anye śyena bhāsaiḥ timiṅgilaiḥ
śarabhaiḥ mahiṣaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ govṛṣaiḥ gavaya aruṇaiḥ
śivābhiḥ ākhubhiḥ kecid kṛkalāsaiḥ śaśaiḥ naraiḥ
bastaiḥ eke kṛṣṇasāraiḥ haṃsaiḥ anye ca sūkaraiḥ
anye jala sthala khagaiḥ sattvaiḥ vikṛta vigrahaiḥ
senayoḥ ubhayoḥ rājan viviśuḥ te gratas gratas
rājan ātapatraiḥ sita amalaiḥ
mahādhanaiḥ vajra daṇḍaiḥ vyajanaiḥ bārha cāmaraiḥ
vāta uddhūta uttara uṣṇīṣaiḥ arcirbhiḥ varma bhūṣaṇaiḥ
sphuradbhiḥ viśadaiḥ śastraiḥ sutarām sūrya raśmibhiḥ
deva dānava vīrāṇām dhvajinyau pāṇḍu nandana
rejatuḥ vīra mālābhiḥ yādasām iva sāgarau

original: BhP_08.10.016/1 vairocano baliḥ saṅkhye so 'surāṇāṃ camūpatiḥ
analyzed: vairocanaḥ baliḥ saṅkhye saḥ surāṇām camūpatiḥ

original: BhP_08.10.016/3 yānaṃ vaihāyasaṃ nāma kāmagaṃ mayanirmitam
analyzed: yānam vaihāyasam nāma kāma gam maya nirmitam
sarva sāṅgrāmika upetam sarva āścarya mayam prabho
apratarkyam anirdeśyam dṛśyamānam adarśanam
āsthitaḥ tat vimāna agryam sarva anīka adhipaiḥ vṛtaḥ
bāla vyajana chatra agryaiḥ reje candraḥ iva udaye
tasya āsan sarvatas yānaiḥ yūthānām patayaḥ surāḥ
dvimūrdhā prahetiḥ hetiḥ ilvalaḥ

original: BhP_08.10.021/3 tārakaścakradṛk śumbho niśumbho jambha utkalaḥ

analyzed: ariṣṭaḥ riṣṭanemiḥ ca mayaḥ ca tripurādhipaḥ
anye pauloma kāleyāḥ nivāta kavaca ādayaḥ
a labdha bhāgāḥ somasya kevalam kleśa bhāginaḥ

original: BhP_08.10.023/3 sarva ete raṇamukhe bahuśo nirjitāmarāḥ
analyzed: sarve ete raṇa mukhe bahuśas nirjita amarāḥ
siṃhanādān vimuñcantaḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ mahā ravān

original: BhP_08.10.024/3 dṛṣṭvā sapatnān utsiktān balabhit kupito bhṛśam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sapatnān utsiktān balabhid kupitaḥ bhṛśam
airāvatam dikkariṇam ārūḍhaḥ śuśubhe svarāj
yathā sravat prasravaṇam udayādri maharpatiḥ
tasya āsan sarvatas devāḥ nānā vāha dhvaja āyudhāḥ
lokapālāḥ saha gaṇaiḥ vāyu agni varuṇa ādayaḥ
te nyonyam abhisaṃsṛtya kṣipantaḥ marmabhiḥ mithas
āhvayantaḥ viśantaḥ gre yuyudhuḥ dvandva yodhinaḥ
yuyodha baliḥ indreṇa tārakeṇa guho syata

original: BhP_08.10.028/3 varuṇo hetināyudhyan mitro rājan prahetinā
analyzed: varuṇaḥ hetinā ayudhyat mitraḥ rājan prahetinā

original: BhP_08.10.029/1 yamastu kālanābhena viśvakarmā mayena vai
analyzed: yamaḥ tu kālanābhena viśvakarmā mayena vai

original: BhP_08.10.029/3 śambaro yuyudhe tvaṣṭrā savitrā tu virocanaḥ
analyzed: śambaraḥ yuyudhe tvaṣṭrā savitrā tu virocanaḥ
aparājitena namuciḥ aśvinau vṛṣaparvaṇā

original: BhP_08.10.030/3 sūryo balisutairdevo bāṇajyeṣṭhaiḥ śatena ca
analyzed: sūryaḥ bali sutaiḥ devaḥ bāṇa jyeṣṭhaiḥ śatena ca

original: BhP_08.10.031/1 rāhuṇā ca tathā somaḥ pulomnā yuyudhe 'nilaḥ
analyzed: rāhuṇā ca tathā somaḥ pulomnā yuyudhe nilaḥ
niśumbha śumbhayoḥ devī bhadrakālī tarasvinī
vṛṣākapiḥ tu jambhena mahiṣeṇa vibhāvasuḥ
ilvalaḥ saha vātāpiḥ brahma putraiḥ arindama

original: BhP_08.10.033/1 kāmadevena durmarṣa utkalo mātṛbhiḥ saha
analyzed: kāmadevena durmarṣaḥ utkalaḥ mātṛbhiḥ saha
bṛhaspatiḥ ca uśanasā narakeṇa śanaiścaraḥ
marutaḥ nivāta kavacaiḥ kāleyaiḥ vasavaḥ marāḥ

original: BhP_08.10.034/3 viśvedevāstu paulomai rudrāḥ krodhavaśaiḥ saha
analyzed: viśvedevāḥ tu paulomaiḥ rudrāḥ krodha vaśaiḥ saha

original: BhP_08.10.035/1 ta evamājāvasurāḥ surendrā dvandvena saṃhatya ca yudhyamānāḥ
analyzed: te evam ājau asurāḥ sura indrāḥ dvandvena saṃhatya ca yudhyamānāḥ
anyonyam āsādya nijaghnuḥ ojasā jigīṣavaḥ tīkṣṇa śara asi tomaraiḥ
bhuśuṇḍibhiḥ cakra gada ṛṣṭi paṭṭiśaiḥ śakti ulmukaiḥ prāsa paraśvadhaiḥ api

original: BhP_08.10.036/3 nistriṃśabhallaiḥ parighaiḥ samudgaraiḥ sabhindipālaiśca śirāṃsi cicchiduḥ
analyzed: nistriṃśa bhallaiḥ parighaiḥ sa mudgaraiḥ sa bhindipālaiḥ ca śirāṃsi cicchiduḥ

original: BhP_08.10.037/1 gajāsturaṅgāḥ sarathāḥ padātayaḥ sārohavāhā vividhā vikhaṇḍitāḥ
analyzed: gajāḥ turaṅgāḥ sa rathāḥ padātayaḥ sa āroha vāhāḥ vividhāḥ vikhaṇḍitāḥ
nikṛtta bāhu ūru śirodharā aṅghrayaḥ chinna dhvaja iṣvāsa tanutra bhūṣaṇāḥ
teṣām pada āghāta rathāṅga cūrṇitāt āyodhanāt ulbaṇaḥ utthitaḥ tadā

original: BhP_08.10.038/3 reṇurdiśaḥ khaṃ dyumaṇiṃ ca chādayan nyavartatāsṛksrutibhiḥ pariplutāt
analyzed: reṇuḥ diśaḥ kham dyumaṇim ca chādayan nyavartata asṛj srutibhiḥ pariplutāt
śirobhiḥ uddhūta kirīṭa kuṇḍalaiḥ saṃrambha dṛgbhiḥ paridaṣṭa dacchadaiḥ

original: BhP_08.10.039/3 mahābhujaiḥ sābharaṇaiḥ sahāyudhaiḥ sā prāstṛtā bhūḥ karabhorubhirbabhau
analyzed: mahā bhujaiḥ sa ābharaṇaiḥ saha āyudhaiḥ sā prāstṛtā bhūḥ karabha ūrubhiḥ babhau
kabandhāḥ tatra ca utpetuḥ patita sva śiraḥ kṣibhiḥ
udyata āyudha dos daṇḍaiḥ ādhāvantaḥ bhaṭān mṛdhe
baliḥ mahā indram daśabhiḥ tribhiḥ airāvatam śaraiḥ
caturbhiḥ caturaḥ vāhān ekena āroham ārcchayat

original: BhP_08.10.042/1 sa tān āpatataḥ śakrastāvadbhiḥ śīghravikramaḥ
analyzed: sa tān āpatataḥ śakraḥ tāvadbhiḥ śīghra vikramaḥ
ciccheda niśitaiḥ bhallaiḥ asamprāptān hasan iva

original: BhP_08.10.043/1 tasya karmottamaṃ vīkṣya durmarṣaḥ śaktimādade
analyzed: tasya karma uttamam vīkṣya durmarṣaḥ śaktim ādade
tām jvalantīm mahā ulkā ābhām hasta sthām acchinat hariḥ

original: BhP_08.10.044/1 tataḥ śūlaṃ tataḥ prāsaṃ tatastomaramṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: tatas śūlam tatas prāsam tatas tomara mṛṣṭayaḥ

original: BhP_08.10.044/3 yadyac chastraṃ samādadyāt sarvaṃ tadacchinadvibhuḥ
analyzed: yat yat śastram samādadyāt sarvam tat acchinat vibhuḥ
sasarja atha āsurīm māyām antardhāna gataḥ suraḥ

original: BhP_08.10.045/3 tataḥ prādurabhūc chailaḥ surānīkopari prabho
analyzed: tatas prādurabhūt śailaḥ sura anīka upari prabho
tatas nipetuḥ taravaḥ dahyamānāḥ dava agninā
śilāḥ sa ṭaṅka śikharāḥ cūrṇayantyaḥ dviṣat balam
mahā uragāḥ samutpetuḥ dandaśūkāḥ sa vṛścikāḥ
siṃha vyāghra varāhāḥ ca mardayantaḥ mahā gajāḥ
yātudhānyaḥ ca śataśas śūla hastāḥ vivāsasaḥ

original: BhP_08.10.048/3 chindhi bhindhīti vādinyastathā rakṣogaṇāḥ prabho
analyzed: chindhi bhindhi iti vādinyaḥ tathā rakṣaḥ gaṇāḥ prabho
tatas mahā ghanāḥ vyomni gambhīra paruṣa svanāḥ
aṅgārān mumucuḥ vātaiḥ āhatāḥ stanayitnavaḥ

original: BhP_08.10.050/1 sṛṣṭo daityena sumahān vahniḥ śvasanasārathiḥ
analyzed: sṛṣṭaḥ daityena su mahān vahniḥ śvasana sārathiḥ
sāṃvartakaḥ iva ati ugraḥ vibudha dhvajinīm adhāk

original: BhP_08.10.051/1 tataḥ samudra udvelaḥ sarvataḥ pratyadṛśyata
analyzed: tatas samudraḥ udvelaḥ sarvatas pratyadṛśyata
pracaṇḍa vātaiḥ uddhūta taraṅga āvarta bhīṣaṇaḥ
evam daityaiḥ mahā māyaiḥ alakṣya gatibhiḥ raṇe
sṛjyamānāsu māyāsu viṣeduḥ sura sainikāḥ

original: BhP_08.10.053/1 na tatpratividhiṃ yatra vidurindrādayo nṛpa
analyzed: na tad pratividhim yatra viduḥ indra ādayaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_08.10.053/3 dhyātaḥ prādurabhūt tatra bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ
analyzed: dhyātaḥ prādurabhūt tatra bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ
tatas suparṇa aṃsa kṛta aṅghri pallavaḥ piśaṅga vāsāḥ nava kañja locanaḥ
adṛśyata aṣṭa āyudha bāhuḥ ullasat śrī kaustubha anarghya kirīṭa kuṇḍalaḥ

original: BhP_08.10.055/1 tasmin praviṣṭe 'surakūṭakarmajā māyā vineśurmahinā mahīyasaḥ
analyzed: tasmin praviṣṭe surakūṭa karma jāḥ māyāḥ vineśuḥ mahinā mahīyasaḥ

original: BhP_08.10.055/3 svapno yathā hi pratibodha āgate harismṛtiḥ sarvavipadvimokṣaṇam
analyzed: svapnaḥ yathā hi pratibodhe āgate hari smṛtiḥ sarva vipad vimokṣaṇam

original: BhP_08.10.056/1 dṛṣṭvā mṛdhe garuḍavāhamibhārivāha āvidhya śūlamahinodatha kālanemiḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā mṛdhe āvidhya śūlam ahinā udatha kālanemiḥ

original: BhP_08.10.056/3 tal līlayā garuḍamūrdhni patadgṛhītvā tenāhanan nṛpa savāhamariṃ tryadhīśaḥ
analyzed: tat līlayā garuḍa mūrdhni patat gṛhītvā tena ahanat nṛpa sa vāham arim tryadhīśaḥ

original: BhP_08.10.057/1 mālī sumāly atibalau yudhi petaturyac cakreṇa kṛttaśirasāvatha mālyavāṃstam
analyzed: mālī sumālī ati balau yudhi petatuḥ yat cakreṇa kṛtta śirasau atha mālyavān tam
āhatya tigma gadayā āhanat aṇḍaja indram tāvat śiraḥ chinat areḥ nadataḥ riṇāt yaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.11.001/1 atho surāḥ pratyupalabdhacetasaḥ parasya puṃsaḥ parayānukampayā
analyzed: atho surāḥ pratyupalabdha cetasaḥ parasya puṃsaḥ parayā anukampayā

original: BhP_08.11.001/3 jaghnurbhṛśaṃ śakrasamīraṇādayas tāṃstān raṇe yairabhisaṃhatāḥ purā
analyzed: jaghnuḥ bhṛśam śakra samīraṇa ādayaḥ tān tān raṇe yaiḥ abhisaṃhatāḥ purā
vairocanāya saṃrabdhaḥ bhagavān pākaśāsanaḥ

original: BhP_08.11.002/3 udayacchadyadā vajraṃ prajā hā heti cukruśuḥ
analyzed: udayacchat yadā vajram prajāḥ hā hā iti cukruśuḥ
vajrapāṇiḥ tam āha idam tiraskṛtya puras sthitam
manasvinam su sampannam vicarantam mahā mṛdhe

original: BhP_08.11.004/1 naṭavan mūḍha māyābhirmāyeśān no jigīṣasi
analyzed: naṭa vat mūḍha māyābhiḥ māyā īśān naḥ jigīṣasi

original: BhP_08.11.004/3 jitvā bālān nibaddhākṣān naṭo harati taddhanam
analyzed: jitvā bālān nibaddha akṣān naṭaḥ harati tat dhanam
ārurukṣanti māyābhiḥ utsisṛpsanti ye divam

original: BhP_08.11.005/3 tān dasyūn vidhunomy ajñān pūrvasmāc ca padādadhaḥ
analyzed: tān dasyūn vidhunomi ajñān pūrvasmāt ca padāt adhas
saḥ ham durmāyinaḥ te vajreṇa śata parvaṇā

original: BhP_08.11.006/3 śiro hariṣye mandātmanghaṭasva jñātibhiḥ saha
analyzed: śiraḥ hariṣye manda ātman ghaṭasva jñātibhiḥ saha
śrī baliḥ uvāca
saṅgrāme vartamānānām kāla codita karmaṇām
kīrtiḥ jayaḥ jayaḥ mṛtyuḥ sarveṣām syuḥ anukramāt

original: BhP_08.11.008/1 tadidaṃ kālaraśanaṃ jagat paśyanti sūrayaḥ
analyzed: tat idam kālaraśanam jagat paśyanti sūrayaḥ

original: BhP_08.11.008/3 na hṛṣyanti na śocanti tatra yūyamapaṇḍitāḥ
analyzed: na hṛṣyanti na śocanti tatra yūyam apaṇḍitāḥ

original: BhP_08.11.009/1 na vayaṃ manyamānānāmātmānaṃ tatra sādhanam
analyzed: na vayam manyamānānām ātmānam tatra sādhanam

original: BhP_08.11.009/3 giro vaḥ sādhuśocyānāṃ gṛhṇīmo marmatāḍanāḥ
analyzed: giraḥ vaḥ sādhu śocyānām gṛhṇīmaḥ marma tāḍanāḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.11.010/1 ity ākṣipya vibhuṃ vīro nārācairvīramardanaḥ
analyzed: iti ākṣipya vibhum vīraḥ nārācaiḥ vīra mardanaḥ
ākarṇapūrṇaiḥ ahanad ākṣepaiḥ āha tam punar

original: BhP_08.11.011/1 evaṃ nirākṛto devo vairiṇā tathyavādinā
analyzed: evam nirākṛtaḥ devaḥ vairiṇā tathya vādinā

original: BhP_08.11.011/3 nāmṛṣyat tadadhikṣepaṃ totrāhata iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: na amṛṣyat tad adhikṣepam totra āhataḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: BhP_08.11.012/1 prāharat kuliśaṃ tasmā amoghaṃ paramardanaḥ
analyzed: prāharat kuliśam tasmai amogham para mardanaḥ
sa yānaḥ nyapatat bhūmau chinna pakṣaḥ iva acalaḥ

original: BhP_08.11.013/1 sakhāyaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā jambho balisakhaḥ suhṛt
analyzed: sakhāyam patitam dṛṣṭvā jambhaḥ bali sakhaḥ suhṛd
abhyayāt sauhṛdam sakhyuḥ hatasya api samācaran

original: BhP_08.11.014/1 sa siṃhavāha āsādya gadāmudyamya raṃhasā
analyzed: sa siṃhavāhaḥ āsādya gadām udyamya raṃhasā

original: BhP_08.11.014/3 jatrāvatāḍayac chakraṃ gajaṃ ca sumahābalaḥ
analyzed: jatrā avatāḍayat śakram gajam ca su mahā balaḥ
gadā prahāra vyathitaḥ bhṛśam vihvalitaḥ gajaḥ

original: BhP_08.11.015/3 jānubhyāṃ dharaṇīṃ spṛṣṭvā kaśmalaṃ paramaṃ yayau
