analyzed: jānubhyām dharaṇīm spṛṣṭvā kaśmalam paramam yayau
tatas rathaḥ mātalinā haribhiḥ daśa śataiḥ vṛtaḥ
ānītaḥ dvipam utsṛjya ratham āruruhe vibhuḥ

original: BhP_08.11.017/1 tasya tat pūjayan karma yanturdānavasattamaḥ
analyzed: tasya tat pūjayan karma yantuḥ dānava sattamaḥ

original: BhP_08.11.017/3 śūlena jvalatā taṃ tu smayamāno 'hanan mṛdhe
analyzed: śūlena jvalatā tam tu smayamānaḥ hanat mṛdhe

original: BhP_08.11.018/1 sehe rujaṃ sudurmarṣāṃ sattvamālambya mātaliḥ
analyzed: sehe rujam su durmarṣām sattvam ālambya mātaliḥ

original: BhP_08.11.018/3 indro jambhasya saṅkruddho vajreṇāpāharac chiraḥ
analyzed: indraḥ jambhasya saṅkruddhaḥ vajreṇa apāharat śiraḥ

original: BhP_08.11.019/1 jambhaṃ śrutvā hataṃ tasya jñātayo nāradādṛṣeḥ
analyzed: jambham śrutvā hatam tasya jñātayaḥ nāradāt ṛṣeḥ
namuciḥ ca balaḥ pākaḥ tatra apetuḥ tvarā anvitāḥ
vacobhiḥ paruṣaiḥ indram ardayantaḥ sya marmasu
śaraiḥ avākiran meghāḥ dhārābhiḥ iva parvatam

original: BhP_08.11.021/1 harīn daśaśatāny ājau haryaśvasya balaḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: harīn daśa śatāni ājau haryaśvasya balaḥ śaraiḥ
tāvadbhiḥ ardayāmāsa yugapad laghu hastavān

original: BhP_08.11.022/1 śatābhyāṃ mātaliṃ pāko rathaṃ sāvayavaṃ pṛthak
analyzed: śatābhyām mātalim pākaḥ ratham sa avayavam pṛthak
sakṛt sandhāna mokṣeṇa tat adbhutam abhūt raṇe
namuciḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ svarṇa puṅkhaiḥ mahā iṣubhiḥ

original: BhP_08.11.023/3 āhatya vyanadat saṅkhye satoya iva toyadaḥ
analyzed: āhatya vyanadat saṅkhye sa toyaḥ iva toyadaḥ
sarvatas śara kūṭena śakram sa ratha sārathim
chādayāmāsuḥ asurāḥ prāvṛṣ sūryam iva ambudāḥ
a lakṣayantaḥ tam atīva vihvalāḥ vicukruśuḥ deva gaṇāḥ saha anugāḥ

original: BhP_08.11.025/3 anāyakāḥ śatrubalena nirjitā vaṇikpathā bhinnanavo yathārṇave
analyzed: anāyakāḥ śatru balena nirjitāḥ vaṇikpathā bhinna navaḥ yathā arṇave
tatas turāṣāh iṣu baddha pañjarāt vinirgataḥ sa aśva ratha dhvaja agraṇīḥ

original: BhP_08.11.026/3 babhau diśaḥ khaṃ pṛthivīṃ ca rocayan svatejasā sūrya iva kṣapātyaye
analyzed: babhau diśaḥ kham pṛthivīm ca rocayan sva tejasā sūryaḥ iva kṣapā atyaye

original: BhP_08.11.027/1 nirīkṣya pṛtanāṃ devaḥ parairabhyarditāṃ raṇe
analyzed: nirīkṣya pṛtanām devaḥ paraiḥ abhyarditām raṇe

original: BhP_08.11.027/3 udayacchadripuṃ hantuṃ vajraṃ vajradharo ruṣā
analyzed: udayacchat ripum hantum vajram vajradharaḥ ruṣā
sa tena eva aṣṭa dhāreṇa śirasī bala pākayoḥ

original: BhP_08.11.028/3 jñātīnāṃ paśyatāṃ rājan jahāra janayan bhayam
analyzed: jñātīnām paśyatām rājan jahāra janayan bhayam
namuciḥ tad vadham dṛṣṭvā śoka amarṣa ruṣā anvitaḥ
jighāṃsuḥ indram nṛpate cakāra parama udyamam
aśmasāra mayam śūlam ghaṇṭā vat hema bhūṣaṇam
pragṛhya abhyadravat kruddhaḥ hataḥ sīti vitarjayan
prāhiṇot devarājāya ninadan mṛgarāj iva

original: BhP_08.11.031/1 tadāpatadgaganatale mahājavaṃ vicicchide haririṣubhiḥ sahasradhā
analyzed: tadā apatat gagana tale mahā javam vicicchide hariḥ iṣubhiḥ sahasradhā

original: BhP_08.11.031/3 tamāhanan nṛpa kuliśena kandhare ruṣānvitastridaśapatiḥ śiro haran
analyzed: tam āhanat nṛpa kuliśena kandhare ruṣā anvitaḥ tridaśa patiḥ śiraḥ haran

original: BhP_08.11.032/1 na tasya hi tvacamapi vajra ūrjito bibheda yaḥ surapatinaujaseritaḥ
analyzed: na tasya hi tvacam api vajraḥ ūrjitaḥ bibheda yaḥ surapatinā ojasā īritaḥ
tat adbhutam param ati vīrya vṛtra bhid tiraskṛtaḥ namuci śirodhara tvacā
tasmāt indraḥ bibhet śatroḥ vajraḥ pratihataḥ yatas
kim idam daiva yogena bhūtam loka vimohanam

original: BhP_08.11.034/1 yena me pūrvamadrīṇāṃ pakṣacchedaḥ prajātyaye
analyzed: yena me pūrvam adrīṇām pakṣacchedaḥ prajā atyaye

original: BhP_08.11.034/3 kṛto niviśatāṃ bhāraiḥ patattraiḥ patatāṃ bhuvi
analyzed: kṛtaḥ niviśatām bhāraiḥ patattraiḥ patatām bhuvi

original: BhP_08.11.035/1 tapaḥsāramayaṃ tvāṣṭraṃ vṛtro yena vipāṭitaḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ sāra mayam tvāṣṭram vṛtraḥ yena vipāṭitaḥ
anye ca api bala upetāḥ sarva astraiḥ akṣata tvacaḥ

original: BhP_08.11.036/1 so 'yaṃ pratihato vajro mayā mukto 'sure 'lpake
analyzed: saḥ yam pratihataḥ vajraḥ mayā muktaḥ sure lpake

original: BhP_08.11.036/3 nāhaṃ tadādade daṇḍaṃ brahmatejo 'py akāraṇam
analyzed: na aham tadā ādade daṇḍam brahma tejaḥ pi akāraṇam

original: BhP_08.11.037/1 iti śakraṃ viṣīdantamāha vāg aśarīriṇī
analyzed: iti śakram viṣīdantam āha vāc aśarīriṇī
na ayam śuṣkaiḥ atho na ārdraiḥ vadham arhati dānavaḥ
mayā asmai yat varaḥ dattaḥ mṛtyuḥ na eva ārdra śuṣkayoḥ
atas upāyaḥ maghavan ripoḥ

original: BhP_08.11.039/1 tāṃ daivīṃ giramākarṇya maghavān susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: tām daivīm giram ākarṇya maghavān su samāhitaḥ
dhyāyan phenam athā apaśyat upāyam ubhaya ātmakam

original: BhP_08.11.040/1 na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa jahāra namuceḥ śiraḥ
analyzed: na śuṣkeṇa na ca ārdreṇa jahāra namuceḥ śiraḥ
tam tuṣṭuvuḥ muni gaṇāḥ mālyaiḥ ca avākiran vibhum
gandharva mukhyau jagatuḥ viśvāvasu parāvasū
deva dundubhayaḥ neduḥ nartakyaḥ nanṛtuḥ mudā
anye pi evam pratidvandvān vāyu agni varuṇa ādayaḥ
sūdayāmāsuḥ asurān mṛgān kesariṇaḥ yathā

original: BhP_08.11.043/1 brahmaṇā preṣito devān devarṣirnārado nṛpa
analyzed: brahmaṇā preṣitaḥ devān deva ṛṣiḥ nāradaḥ nṛpa
vārayāmāsa vibudhān dṛṣṭvā dānava saṅkṣayam
uvāca
bhavadbhiḥ amṛtam prāptam nārāyaṇa bhuja āśrayaiḥ

original: BhP_08.11.044/3 śriyā samedhitāḥ sarva upāramata vigrahāt
analyzed: śriyā samedhitāḥ sarve upāramata vigrahāt
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
saṃyamya manyu saṃrambham mānayantaḥ muneḥ vacaḥ
upagīyamāna anucaraiḥ yayuḥ sarve triviṣṭapam

original: BhP_08.11.046/1 ye 'vaśiṣṭā raṇe tasmin nāradānumatena te
analyzed: ye vaśiṣṭāḥ raṇe tasmin nārada anumatena te
balim vipannam ādāya astam girim upāgaman
tatra a vinaṣṭa avayavān vidyamāna śirodharān
uśanāḥ jīvayāmāsa saṃjīvanyā sva vidyayā
baliḥ ca uśanasā spṛṣṭaḥ pratyāpanna indriya smṛtiḥ
parājitaḥ pi na akhidyat loka tattva vicakṣaṇaḥ
śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca
vṛṣadhvajaḥ niśamya idam yoṣit rūpeṇa dānavān
mohayitvā sura gaṇān hariḥ somam apāyayat
vṛṣam āruhya giriśaḥ sarva bhūta gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_08.12.002/3 saha devyā yayau draṣṭuṃ yatrāste madhusūdanaḥ
analyzed: saha devyā yayau draṣṭum yatra āste madhusūdanaḥ

original: BhP_08.12.003/1 sabhājito bhagavatā sādaraṃ somayā bhavaḥ
analyzed: sabhājitaḥ bhagavatā sa ādaram somayā bhavaḥ

original: BhP_08.12.003/3 sūpaviṣṭa uvācedaṃ pratipūjya smayan harim
analyzed: su upaviṣṭaḥ uvāca idam pratipūjya smayan harim
śrī mahādevaḥ uvāca
sarveṣām api bhāvānām tvam ātmā hetuḥ īśvaraḥ
ādi antau asya yat madhyam idam anyat aham bahis

original: BhP_08.12.005/3 yato 'vyayasya naitāni tat satyaṃ brahma cidbhavān
analyzed: yatas vyayasya na etāni tat satyam brahma cit bhavān
tava eva caraṇa ambhojam śreyaskāmāḥ
visṛjya ubhayatas saṅgam munayaḥ samupāsate

original: BhP_08.12.007/1 tvaṃ brahma pūrṇamamṛtaṃ viguṇaṃ viśokam
analyzed: tvam brahma pūrṇam amṛtam viguṇam viśokam
ānanda mātram avikāram ananya anyat
viśvasya hetuḥ udaya sthiti saṃyamānām
ātma īśvaraḥ ca tad apekṣa tayā anapekṣaḥ
ekaḥ tvam eva sat asat dvayam advayam ca
svarṇam kṛta akṛtam iva iha na vastu bhedaḥ
ajñānataḥ tvayi janaiḥ vihitaḥ
yasmāt guṇa vyatikaraḥ nirupādhikasya

original: BhP_08.12.011/1 tvāṃ brahma kecidavayanty uta dharmameke
analyzed: tvām brahma kecid avayanti uta dharmam eke

original: BhP_08.12.011/3 eke paraṃ sadasatoḥ puruṣaṃ pareśam
analyzed: eke param sat asatoḥ puruṣam para īśam
anye vayanti nava śakti yutam param tvām
kecid mahāpuruṣam avyayam ātmatantram
na aham parāyuḥ ṛṣayaḥ na marīci mukhyā
jānanti yat viracitam khalu sattva sargāḥ
yad māyayā muṣita cetasaḥ īśa daitya
martya ādayaḥ kim uta śaśvat abhadra vṛttāḥ
sa tvam samīhita madaḥ sthiti janma nāśam
bhūta īhitam ca jagataḥ bhava bandha mokṣau

original: BhP_08.12.001/1 vāyuryathā viśati khaṃ ca carācarākhyaṃ
analyzed: vāyuḥ yathā viśati kham ca carācara ākhyam
sarvam tad ātmaka tayā avagamaḥ varuntse

original: BhP_08.12.001/1 avatārā mayā dṛṣṭā ramamāṇasya te guṇaiḥ
analyzed: avatārāḥ mayā dṛṣṭāḥ ramamāṇasya te guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_08.12.001/1 so 'haṃ taddraṣṭumicchāmi yat te yoṣidvapurdhṛtam
analyzed: saḥ ham tat draṣṭum icchāmi yat te yoṣit vapuḥ dhṛtam

original: BhP_08.12.001/1 yena sammohitā daityāḥ pāyitāścāmṛtaṃ surāḥ
analyzed: yena sammohitāḥ daityāḥ pāyitāḥ ca amṛtam surāḥ

original: BhP_08.12.001/1 taddidṛkṣava āyātāḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ
analyzed: tad didṛkṣavaḥ āyātāḥ param kautūhalam hi naḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
evam abhyarthitaḥ viṣṇuḥ bhagavān śūlapāṇinā
prahasya bhāva gambhīram giriśam pratyabhāṣata
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_08.12.015/1 kautūhalāya daityānāṃ yoṣidveṣo mayā dhṛtaḥ
analyzed: kautūhalāya daityānām yoṣit veṣaḥ mayā dhṛtaḥ
paśyatā sura kāryāṇi gate pīyūṣa bhājane

original: BhP_08.12.016/1 tat te 'haṃ darśayiṣyāmi didṛkṣoḥ surasattama
analyzed: tat te ham darśayiṣyāmi didṛkṣoḥ sura sattama
kāminām bahu mantavyam saṅkalpa prabhava udayam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
iti bruvāṇaḥ bhagavān tatra eva antaradhīyata
sarvatas cārayan cakṣuḥ bhavaḥ āste saha umayā
tatas dadarśa upavane vara striyam vicitra puṣpa aruṇa pallava drume
vikrīḍatīm kanduka līlayā lasat dukūla paryasta nitamba mekhalām
āvartana udvartana kampita stana prakṛṣṭa hāra ūru bharaiḥ pade pade

original: BhP_08.12.019/3 prabhajyamānāmiva madhyataścalat padapravālaṃ nayatīṃ tatastataḥ
analyzed: prabhajyamānām iva madhyatas calat pada pravālam nayatīm tatas tatas
dikṣu bhramat kanduka cāpalaiḥ bhṛśam prodvigna tārā āyata lola locanām
sva karṇa vibhrājita kuṇḍala ullasat kapola nīla alaka maṇḍita ānanām

original: BhP_08.12.021/1 ślathaddukūlaṃ kabarīṃ ca vicyutāṃ sannahyatīṃ vāmakareṇa valgunā
analyzed: ślathat dukūlam kavarīm ca vicyutām sannahyatīm vāma kareṇa valgunā
vinighnatīm anya kareṇa kandukam vimohayantīm jagat ātma māyayā

original: BhP_08.12.022/1 tāṃ vīkṣya deva iti kandukalīlayeṣad vrīḍāsphuṭasmitavisṛṣṭakaṭākṣamuṣṭaḥ
analyzed: tām vīkṣya devaḥ iti kanduka līlayā īṣat vrīḍā sphuṭa smita visṛṣṭa kaṭākṣa muṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_08.12.022/3 strīprekṣaṇapratisamīkṣaṇavihvalātmā nātmānamantika umāṃ svagaṇāṃśca veda
analyzed: strī prekṣaṇa pratisamīkṣaṇa vihvala ātmā na ātmānam antike umām sva gaṇān ca veda

original: BhP_08.12.023/1 tasyāḥ karāgrāt sa tu kanduko yadā gato vidūraṃ tamanuvrajatstriyāḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ kara agrāt sa tu kandukaḥ yadā gataḥ vidūram tam anuvrajat striyāḥ

original: BhP_08.12.023/3 vāsaḥ sasūtraṃ laghu māruto 'harad bhavasya devasya kilānupaśyataḥ
analyzed: vāsaḥ sa sūtram laghu mārutaḥ harat bhavasya devasya kila anupaśyataḥ

original: BhP_08.12.024/1 evaṃ tāṃ rucirāpāṅgīṃ darśanīyāṃ manoramām
analyzed: evam tām rucira apāṅgīm darśanīyām manoramām

original: BhP_08.12.024/3 dṛṣṭvā tasyāṃ manaścakre viṣajjantyāṃ bhavaḥ kila
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tasyām manaḥ cakre viṣajjantyām bhavaḥ kila
tayā apahṛta vijñānaḥ tad kṛta smara vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_08.12.025/3 bhavānyā api paśyantyā gatahrīstatpadaṃ yayau
analyzed: bhavānyāḥ api paśyantyāḥ gata hrīḥ tat padam yayau

original: BhP_08.12.026/1 sā tamāyāntamālokya vivastrā vrīḍitā bhṛśam
analyzed: sā tam āyāntam ālokya vivastrā vrīḍitā bhṛśam
nilīyamānā vṛkṣeṣu hasantī na anvatiṣṭhata
tām anvagacchat bhagavān bhavaḥ pramuṣita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_08.12.027/3 kāmasya ca vaśaṃ nītaḥ kareṇumiva yūthapaḥ
analyzed: kāmasya ca vaśam nītaḥ kareṇum iva yūthapaḥ
saḥ nuvrajya ativegena gṛhītvā an icchatīm striyam
keśa bandhe upānīya bāhubhyām pariṣasvaje

original: BhP_08.12.029/1 sopagūḍhā bhagavatā kariṇā kariṇī yathā
analyzed: sā upagūḍhā bhagavatā kariṇā kariṇī yathā
itas tatas prasarpantī viprakīrṇa śiroruhā
ātmānam mocayitvā aṅga sura ṛṣabha bhujāntarāt

original: BhP_08.12.030/3 prādravat sā pṛthuśroṇī māyā devavinirmitā
analyzed: prādravat sā pṛthu śroṇī māyā deva vinirmitā
tasya asau padavīm rudraḥ viṣṇoḥ adbhuta karmaṇaḥ
pratyapadyata kāmena vairiṇā iva vinirjitaḥ
tasya anudhāvataḥ retaḥ caskanda amogha retasaḥ
śuṣmiṇaḥ yūthapasya iva vāsi tām anudhāvataḥ

original: BhP_08.12.033/1 yatra yatrāpatan mahyāṃ retastasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: yatra yatra apatat mahyām retaḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_08.12.033/3 tāni rūpyasya hemnaśca kṣetrāṇy āsan mahīpate
analyzed: tāni rūpyasya hemnaḥ ca kṣetrāṇi āsan mahīpate
sarit saraḥsu śaileṣu vaneṣu upavaneṣu ca

original: BhP_08.12.034/3 yatra kva cāsannṛṣayastatra sannihito haraḥ
analyzed: yatra kva ca āsan ṛṣayaḥ tatra sannihitaḥ haraḥ
skanne retasi saḥ paśyat ātmānam deva māyayā
jaḍīkṛtam nṛpa śreṣṭha sat nyavartata kaśmalāt
atha avagata māhātmyaḥ ātmanaḥ jagadātmanaḥ

original: BhP_08.12.036/3 aparijñeyavīryasya na mene tadu hādbhutam
analyzed: a parijñeya vīryasya na mene tat u ha adbhutam
tam aviklavam avrīḍam ālakṣya madhusūdanaḥ

original: BhP_08.12.037/3 uvāca paramaprīto bibhrat svāṃ pauruṣīṃ tanum
analyzed: uvāca parama prītaḥ bibhrat svām pauruṣīm tanum
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_08.12.038/1 diṣṭyā tvaṃ vibudhaśreṣṭha svāṃ niṣṭhāmātmanā sthitaḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā tvam vibudha śreṣṭha svām niṣṭhām ātmanā sthitaḥ

original: BhP_08.12.038/3 yan me strīrūpayā svairaṃ mohito 'py aṅga māyayā
analyzed: yat me strī rūpayā svairam aṅga māyayā

original: BhP_08.12.039/1 ko nu me 'titaren māyāṃ viṣaktastvadṛte pumān
analyzed: kaḥ nu me titaret māyām viṣaktaḥ tvat ṛte pumān
tān tān visṛjatīm bhāvān dustarām akṛtātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_08.12.040/1 seyaṃ guṇamayī māyā na tvāmabhibhaviṣyati
analyzed: sā iyam guṇa mayī māyā na tvām abhibhaviṣyati

original: BhP_08.12.040/3 mayā sametā kālena kālarūpeṇa bhāgaśaḥ
analyzed: mayā sametā kālena kāla rūpeṇa bhāgaśas
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.12.041/1 evaṃ bhagavatā rājan śrīvatsāṅkena satkṛtaḥ
analyzed: evam bhagavatā rājan śrīvatsa aṅkena satkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_08.12.041/3 āmantrya taṃ parikramya sagaṇaḥ svālayaṃ yayau
analyzed: āmantrya tam parikramya sa gaṇaḥ sva ālayam yayau

original: BhP_08.12.042/1 ātmāṃśabhūtāṃ tāṃ māyāṃ bhavānīṃ bhagavān bhavaḥ
analyzed: ātma aṃśa bhūtām tām māyām bhavānīm bhagavān bhavaḥ
sammatām ṛṣi mukhyānām prītyā ācaṣṭa atha bhārata

original: BhP_08.12.043/1 ayi vyapaśyastvamajasya māyāṃ parasya puṃsaḥ paradevatāyāḥ
analyzed: ayi vyapaśyaḥ tvam ajasya māyām parasya puṃsaḥ para devatāyāḥ

original: BhP_08.12.043/3 ahaṃ kalānāmṛṣabho 'pi muhye yayāvaśo 'nye kimutāsvatantrāḥ
analyzed: aham kalānām ṛṣabhaḥ muhye nye kim uta asvatantrāḥ

original: BhP_08.12.044/1 yaṃ māmapṛcchastvamupetya yogāt samāsahasrānta upārataṃ vai
analyzed: yam mām apṛcchaḥ tvam upetya yogāt samā sahasra ante upāratam vai

original: BhP_08.12.044/3 sa eṣa sākṣāt puruṣaḥ purāṇo na yatra kālo viśate na vedaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣa sākṣāt puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ na yatra kālaḥ viśate na vedaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
iti te bhihitaḥ tāta vikramaḥ śārṅgadhanvanaḥ

original: BhP_08.12.045/3 sindhornirmathane yena dhṛtaḥ pṛṣṭhe mahācalaḥ
analyzed: sindhoḥ nirmathane yena dhṛtaḥ pṛṣṭhe mahā acalaḥ

original: BhP_08.12.046/1 etan muhuḥ kīrtayato 'nuśṛṇvato na riṣyate jātu samudyamaḥ kvacit
analyzed: etat muhur kīrtayataḥ nu śṛṇvataḥ na riṣyate jātu samudyamaḥ kvacid
yat uttamaśloka guṇa anuvarṇanam samasta saṃsāra pariśrama apaham
asat aviṣayam aṅghrim bhāva gamyam prapannān
amṛtam amara varyān āśayat sindhu mathyam
tam aham upasṛtānām kāma pūram nataḥ smi
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.13.001/1 manurvivasvataḥ putraḥ śrāddhadeva iti śrutaḥ
analyzed: manuḥ vivasvataḥ putraḥ śrāddhadevaḥ iti śrutaḥ

original: BhP_08.13.001/3 saptamo vartamāno yastadapatyāni me śṛṇu
analyzed: saptamaḥ vartamānaḥ yaḥ tad apatyāni me śṛṇu
ikṣvākuḥ nabhagaḥ ca eva dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātiḥ eva ca

original: BhP_08.13.002/3 nariṣyanto 'tha nābhāgaḥ saptamo diṣṭa ucyate
analyzed: nariṣyantaḥ nābhāgaḥ saptamaḥ diṣṭaḥ ucyate

original: BhP_08.13.003/1 tarūṣaśca pṛṣadhraśca daśamo vasumān smṛtaḥ
analyzed: tarūṣaḥ ca pṛṣadhraḥ ca daśamaḥ vasumān smṛtaḥ
manoḥ vaivasvatasya ete daśa putrāḥ parantapa

original: BhP_08.13.004/1 ādityā vasavo rudrā viśvedevā marudgaṇāḥ
analyzed: ādityāḥ vasavaḥ rudrāḥ viśvedevāḥ marut gaṇāḥ
aśvinau ṛbhavaḥ rājan indraḥ teṣām purandaraḥ
tris vasiṣṭhaḥ ca viśvāmitraḥ gautamaḥ
jamadagniḥ bharadvājaḥ iti saptarṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ
atrā api bhagavat janma kaśyapāt aditeḥ abhūt
ādityānām avarajaḥ viṣṇuḥ vāmana rūpadhṛk
saṅkṣepataḥ mayā uktāni sapta manvantarāṇi te

original: BhP_08.13.007/3 bhaviṣyāṇy atha vakṣyāmi viṣṇoḥ śaktyānvitāni ca
analyzed: bhaviṣyāṇi atha vakṣyāmi viṣṇoḥ śaktyā anvitāni ca

original: BhP_08.13.008/1 vivasvataśca dve jāye viśvakarmasute ubhe
analyzed: vivasvataḥ ca dve jāye viśvakarma sute ubhe

original: BhP_08.13.008/3 saṃjñā chāyā ca rājendra ye prāg abhihite tava
analyzed: saṃjñā chāyā ca rāja indra ye prāk abhihite tava
tṛtīyām vaḍavām eke tāsām saṃjñāsutāḥ trayaḥ

original: BhP_08.13.009/3 yamo yamī śrāddhadevaśchāyāyāśca sutān chṛṇu
analyzed: yamaḥ yamī śrāddhadevaḥ chāyāyāḥ ca sutān śṛṇu

original: BhP_08.13.010/1 sāvarṇistapatī kanyā bhāryā saṃvaraṇasya yā
analyzed: sāvarṇiḥ tapatī kanyā bhāryā saṃvaraṇasya yā
śanaiścaraḥ tṛtīyaḥ bhūt aśvinau vaḍavātmajau
aṣṭame ntare āyāte sāvarṇiḥ bhavitā manuḥ
nirmoka virajaska ādyāḥ sāvarṇi tanayāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_08.13.012/1 tatra devāḥ sutapaso virajā amṛtaprabhāḥ
analyzed: tatra devāḥ su tapasaḥ virajāḥ amṛta prabhāḥ
teṣām virocana sutaḥ baliḥ indraḥ bhaviṣyati

original: BhP_08.13.013/1 dattvemāṃ yācamānāya viṣṇave yaḥ padatrayam
analyzed: dattvā imām yācamānāya viṣṇave yaḥ pada trayam
rāddham indra padam hitvā tatas siddhim avāpsyati

original: BhP_08.13.014/1 yo 'sau bhagavatā baddhaḥ prītena sutale punaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sau bhagavatā baddhaḥ prītena su tale punar
niveśitaḥ dhike svargāt adhunā āste svarāj iva

original: BhP_08.13.015/1 gālavo dīptimān rāmo droṇaputraḥ kṛpastathā
analyzed: gālavaḥ dīptimān rāmaḥ droṇaputraḥ kṛpaḥ tathā
ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ pitā asmākam bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ
ime saptarṣayaḥ tatra bhaviṣyanti sva yogataḥ

original: BhP_08.13.016/3 idānīmāsate rājan sve sva āśramamaṇḍale
analyzed: idānīm āsate rājan sve sve āśrama maṇḍale

original: BhP_08.13.017/1 devaguhyāt sarasvatyāṃ sārvabhauma iti prabhuḥ
analyzed: devaguhyāt sarasvatyām sārvabhaumaḥ iti prabhuḥ
sthānam purandarāt hṛtvā balaye dāsyati īśvaraḥ
navamaḥ dakṣasāvarṇiḥ manuḥ varuṇa sambhavaḥ
bhūtaketuḥ dīptaketuḥ iti ādyāḥ tad sutāḥ nṛpa
dyutimat pramukhāḥ tatra bhaviṣyanti ṛṣayaḥ tatas
āyuṣmataḥ mbu dhārāyām ṛṣabhaḥ bhagavat kalā

original: BhP_08.13.020/3 bhavitā yena saṃrāddhāṃ trilokīṃ bhokṣyate 'dbhutaḥ
analyzed: bhavitā yena saṃrāddhām trilokīm bhokṣyate dbhutaḥ
daśamaḥ brahmasāvarṇiḥ upaśloka sutaḥ manuḥ

original: BhP_08.13.021/3 tatsutā bhūriṣeṇādyā haviṣmat pramukhā dvijāḥ
analyzed: tad sutāḥ bhūriṣeṇa ādyāḥ haviṣmat pramukhāḥ dvijāḥ

original: BhP_08.13.022/1 haviṣmān sukṛtaḥ satyo jayo mūrtistadā dvijāḥ
analyzed: haviṣmān sukṛtaḥ satyaḥ jayaḥ mūrtiḥ tadā dvijāḥ

original: BhP_08.13.023/1 viṣvakseno viṣūcyāṃ tu śambhoḥ sakhyaṃ kariṣyati
analyzed: viṣvaksenaḥ viṣūcyām tu śambhoḥ sakhyam kariṣyati

original: BhP_08.13.023/3 jātaḥ svāṃśena bhagavān gṛhe viśvasṛjo vibhuḥ
analyzed: jātaḥ sva aṃśena bhagavān gṛhe viśvasṛjaḥ vibhuḥ
manuḥ vai dharmasāvarṇiḥ ekādaśamaḥ ātmavān
anāgatāḥ tad sutāḥ ca satyadharma ādayaḥ daśa
vihaṅgamāḥ kāmagamāḥ nirvāṇa rucayaḥ surāḥ
indraḥ ca vaidhṛtaḥ teṣām ṛṣayaḥ ca aruṇa ādayaḥ
āryakasya sutaḥ tatra dharmasetuḥ iti smṛtaḥ
vaidhṛtāyām hareḥ aṃśaḥ trilokīm dhārayiṣyati

original: BhP_08.13.027/1 bhavitā rudrasāvarṇī rājan dvādaśamo manuḥ
analyzed: bhavitā rudrasāvarṇiḥ rājan dvādaśamaḥ manuḥ
devavān upadevaḥ ca devaśreṣṭha ādayaḥ sutāḥ

original: BhP_08.13.028/1 ṛtadhāmā ca tatrendro devāśca haritādayaḥ
analyzed: ṛtadhāmā ca tatra indraḥ devāḥ ca harita ādayaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ca tapomūrtiḥ tapasvī āgnīdhraka ādayaḥ
svadhām ākhyaḥ hareḥ aṃśaḥ sādhayiṣyati tat manoḥ

original: BhP_08.13.029/3 antaraṃ satyasahasaḥ sunṛtāyāḥ suto vibhuḥ
analyzed: antaram satyasahasaḥ sunṛtāyāḥ sutaḥ vibhuḥ
manuḥ trayodaśaḥ bhāvyaḥ devasāvarṇiḥ ātmavān

original: BhP_08.13.031/1 devāḥ sukarmasutrāma saṃjñā indro divaspatiḥ
analyzed: devāḥ sukarma sutrāma saṃjñāḥ indraḥ divaspatiḥ
nirmoka tattva darśa ādyāḥ bhaviṣyanti ṛṣayaḥ tadā
devahotrasya tanayaḥ upahartā divaspateḥ
yogeśvaraḥ hareḥ aṃśaḥ bṛhatyām sambhaviṣyati
manuḥ vai indrasāvarṇiḥ caturdaśame eṣyati
uru gambhīra budha ādyāḥ indrasāvarṇi vīrya jāḥ
pavitrāḥ cākṣuṣāḥ devāḥ śuciḥ indraḥ bhaviṣyati
agniḥ bāhuḥ śuciḥ śuddhaḥ māgadha ādyāḥ tapasvinaḥ
satrāyaṇasya tanayaḥ bṛhadbhānuḥ tadā hariḥ
vitānāyām mahā rāja kriyā tantūn vitāyitā
rājan caturdaśa etāni tri kāla anugatāni te
proktāni ebhiḥ mitaḥ kalpaḥ yuga sāhasra paryayaḥ
śrī rājā uvāca
manvantareṣu bhagavan yathā manu ādayaḥ tu ime

original: BhP_08.14.001/3 yasmin karmaṇi ye yena niyuktāstadvadasva me
analyzed: yasmin karmaṇi ye yena niyuktāḥ tat vadasva me
śrī ṛṣiḥ uvāca
manavaḥ manu putrāḥ ca munayaḥ ca mahīpate
indrāḥ sura gaṇāḥ ca eva sarve puruṣa śāsanāḥ

original: BhP_08.14.003/1 yajñādayo yāḥ kathitāḥ pauruṣyastanavo nṛpa
analyzed: yajña ādayaḥ yāḥ kathitāḥ pauruṣyaḥ tanavaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_08.14.003/3 manvādayo jagadyātrāṃ nayanty ābhiḥ pracoditāḥ
analyzed: manu ādayaḥ jagat yātrām nayanti ābhiḥ pracoditāḥ

original: BhP_08.14.004/1 caturyugānte kālena grastān chrutigaṇān yathā
analyzed: caturyuga ante kālena grastān śruti gaṇān yathā

original: BhP_08.14.004/3 tapasā ṛṣayo 'paśyan yato dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: tapasā ṛṣayaḥ paśyan yatas dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: BhP_08.14.005/1 tato dharmaṃ catuṣpādaṃ manavo hariṇoditāḥ
analyzed: tatas dharmam catuṣpādam manavaḥ hariṇā uditāḥ

original: BhP_08.14.005/3 yuktāḥ sañcārayanty addhā sve sve kāle mahīṃ nṛpa
analyzed: yuktāḥ sañcārayanti addhā sve sve kāle mahīm nṛpa
pālayanti prajāpālāḥ yāvat antam vibhāgaśaḥ

original: BhP_08.14.006/3 yajñabhāgabhujo devā ye ca tatrānvitāśca taiḥ
analyzed: yajña bhāga bhujaḥ devāḥ ye ca tatra anvitāḥ ca taiḥ
indraḥ bhagavatā dattām trailokya śriyam ūrjitām

original: BhP_08.14.007/3 bhuñjānaḥ pāti lokāṃstrīn kāmaṃ loke pravarṣati
analyzed: bhuñjānaḥ pāti lokān trīn kāmam loke pravarṣati

original: BhP_08.14.008/1 jñānaṃ cānuyugaṃ brūte hariḥ siddhasvarūpadhṛk
analyzed: jñānam ca anuyugam brūte hariḥ siddha sva rūpa dhṛk
ṛṣi rūpa dharaḥ karma yogam yogeśa rūpa dhṛk

original: BhP_08.14.009/1 sargaṃ prajeśarūpeṇa dasyūn hanyāt svarāḍvapuḥ
analyzed: sargam prajā īśa rūpeṇa dasyūn hanyāt svarāj vapuḥ
kāla rūpeṇa sarveṣām abhāvāya pṛthak guṇaḥ
stūyamānaḥ janaiḥ ebhiḥ māyayā nāma rūpayā
vimohita ātmabhiḥ nānā darśanaiḥ na ca dṛśyate
etat kalpa vikalpasya pramāṇam parikīrtitam
yatra manvantarāṇi āhuḥ caturdaśa purāvidaḥ
śrī rājā uvāca
baleḥ pada trayam bhūmeḥ kasmāt hariḥ ayācata

original: BhP_08.15.001/3 bhūteśvaraḥ kṛpaṇaval labdhārtho 'pi babandha tam
analyzed: bhūteśvaraḥ kṛpaṇa vat labdha arthaḥ pi babandha tam

original: BhP_08.15.002/1 etadveditumicchāmo mahat kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ
analyzed: etat veditum icchāmaḥ mahat kautūhalam hi naḥ

original: BhP_08.15.002/3 yajñeśvarasya pūrṇasya bandhanaṃ cāpy anāgasaḥ
analyzed: yajñeśvarasya pūrṇasya bandhanam ca api anāgasaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.15.003/1 parājitaśrīrasubhiśca hāpito hīndreṇa rājan bhṛgubhiḥ sa jīvitaḥ
analyzed: parājita śrīḥ asubhiḥ ca hāpitaḥ hi indreṇa rājan bhṛgubhiḥ sa jīvitaḥ

original: BhP_08.15.003/3 sarvātmanā tān abhajadbhṛgūn baliḥ śiṣyo mahātmārthanivedanena
analyzed: sarva ātmanā tān abhajat bhṛgūn baliḥ śiṣyaḥ mahātmā artha nivedanena

original: BhP_08.15.004/1 taṃ brāhmaṇā bhṛgavaḥ prīyamāṇā ayājayan viśvajitā triṇākam
analyzed: tam brāhmaṇāḥ bhṛgavaḥ prīyamāṇāḥ ayājayan viśvajitā triṇākam
jigīṣamāṇam vidhinā abhiṣicya mahā abhiṣekeṇa mahā anubhāvāḥ

original: BhP_08.15.005/1 tato rathaḥ kāñcanapaṭṭanaddho hayāśca haryaśvaturaṅgavarṇāḥ
analyzed: tatas rathaḥ kāñcana paṭṭa naddhaḥ hayāḥ ca hari aśva turaṅga varṇāḥ

original: BhP_08.15.005/3 dhvajaśca siṃhena virājamāno hutāśanādāsa havirbhiriṣṭāt
analyzed: dhvajaḥ ca siṃhena virājamānaḥ hutāśanāt āsa havirbhiḥ iṣṭāt

original: BhP_08.15.006/1 dhanuśca divyaṃ puraṭopanaddhaṃ tūṇāvariktau kavacaṃ ca divyam
analyzed: dhanuḥ ca divyam puraṭa upanaddham tūṇa avariktau kavacam ca divyam

original: BhP_08.15.006/3 pitāmahastasya dadau ca mālām amlānapuṣpāṃ jalajaṃ ca śukraḥ
analyzed: pitāmahaḥ tasya dadau ca mālām amlāna puṣpām jalajam ca śukraḥ

original: BhP_08.15.007/1 evaṃ sa viprārjitayodhanārthas taiḥ kalpitasvastyayano 'tha viprān
analyzed: evam sa vipra arjita yodhana arthaḥ taiḥ kalpita svastyayanaḥ viprān
pradakṣiṇīkṛtya kṛta praṇāmaḥ prahrādam āmantrya namaścakāra

original: BhP_08.15.008/1 athāruhya rathaṃ divyaṃ bhṛgudattaṃ mahārathaḥ
analyzed: atha āruhya ratham divyam bhṛgudattam mahā rathaḥ

original: BhP_08.15.008/3 susragdharo 'tha sannahya dhanvī khaḍgī dhṛteṣudhiḥ
analyzed: dhanvī khaḍgī dhṛta iṣudhiḥ

original: BhP_08.15.009/3 rarāja rathamārūḍho dhiṣṇyastha iva havyavāṭ
analyzed: rarāja ratham ārūḍhaḥ dhiṣṇya sthaḥ iva havyavāṭ
tulya aiśvarya bala śrībhiḥ sva yūthaiḥ daitya yūthapaiḥ

original: BhP_08.15.010/3 pibadbhiriva khaṃ dṛgbhirdahadbhiḥ paridhīn iva
analyzed: pibadbhiḥ iva kham dṛgbhiḥ dahadbhiḥ paridhīn iva

original: BhP_08.15.011/1 vṛto vikarṣan mahatīmāsurīṃ dhvajinīṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: vṛtaḥ vikarṣan mahatīm āsurīm dhvajinīm vibhuḥ
yayau indra purīm su ṛddhām kampayan iva rodasī
ramyām upavana udyānaiḥ śrīmadbhiḥ nandana ādibhiḥ
kūjat vihaṅga mithunaiḥ gāyat matta madhu vrataiḥ
pravāla phala puṣpa uru bhāra śākhā amara drumaiḥ

original: BhP_08.15.013/5 nalinyo yatra krīḍanti pramadāḥ surasevitāḥ
analyzed: nalinyaḥ yatra krīḍanti pramadāḥ sura sevitāḥ
ākāśagaṅgayā devyā vṛtām parikha bhūtayā
prākāreṇa agni varṇena sa aṭṭālena unnatena ca
rukma paṭṭa kapāṭaiḥ ca dvāraiḥ sphaṭika gopuraiḥ
juṣṭām vibhakta prapathām viśva karma vinirmitām
sabhā catvara rathyā āḍhyām vimānaiḥ nyarbudaiḥ yutām
śṛṅgāṭakaiḥ maṇi mayaiḥ vajra vidruma vedibhiḥ
yatra nitya vayaḥ rūpāḥ śyāmāḥ viraja vāsasaḥ

original: BhP_08.15.017/3 bhrājante rūpavannāryo hy arcirbhiriva vahnayaḥ
analyzed: bhrājante rūpavat nāryaḥ hi arcirbhiḥ iva vahnayaḥ
yatra āmodam upādāya mārgaḥ āvāti mārutaḥ
hema jāla akṣa nirgacchat dhūmena aguru gandhinā

original: BhP_08.15.019/3 pāṇḍureṇa praticchanna mārge yānti surapriyāḥ
analyzed: pāṇḍureṇa praticchanna mārge yānti sura priyāḥ
muktā vitānaiḥ maṇi hema ketubhiḥ nānā patākā valabhībhiḥ āvṛtām
śikhaṇḍi pārāvata bhṛṅga nāditām vaimānika strī kala gīta maṅgalām
mṛdaṅga śaṅkha ānaka dundubhi svanaiḥ sa tāla vīṇā muraja iṣṭa veṇubhiḥ

original: BhP_08.15.021/3 nṛtyaiḥ savādyairupadevagītakair manoramāṃ svaprabhayā jitaprabhām
analyzed: nṛtyaiḥ sa vādyaiḥ upadeva gītakaiḥ manoramām sva prabhayā jita prabhām

original: BhP_08.15.022/1 yāṃ na vrajanty adharmiṣṭhāḥ khalā bhūtadruhaḥ śaṭhāḥ
analyzed: yām na vrajanti adharmiṣṭhāḥ khalāḥ bhūta druhaḥ śaṭhāḥ

original: BhP_08.15.022/3 māninaḥ kāmino lubdhā ebhirhīnā vrajanti yat
analyzed: māninaḥ kāminaḥ lubdhāḥ ebhiḥ hīnāḥ vrajanti yat

original: BhP_08.15.023/1 tāṃ devadhānīṃ sa varūthinīpatir bahiḥ samantādrurudhe pṛtanyayā
analyzed: tām deva dhānīm sa varūthinīpatiḥ bahis samantāt rurudhe pṛtanyayā

original: BhP_08.15.023/3 ācāryadattaṃ jalajaṃ mahāsvanaṃ dadhmau prayuñjan bhayamindrayoṣitām
analyzed: ācārya dattam jala jam mahā svanam dadhmau prayuñjan bhayam indra yoṣitām
maghavān tam abhipretya baleḥ paramam udyamam
sarva deva gaṇa upetaḥ gurum etat uvāca ha
bhagavan udyamaḥ bhūyān baleḥ naḥ pūrva vairiṇaḥ
aviṣahyam imam manye kena āsīt tejasā ūrjitaḥ

original: BhP_08.15.026/1 nainaṃ kaścit kuto vāpi prativyoḍhumadhīśvaraḥ
analyzed: na enam kaścid kutas vā api prativyoḍhum adhīśvaraḥ

original: BhP_08.15.026/3 pibanniva mukhenedaṃ lihanniva diśo daśa
analyzed: piban iva mukhena idam lihan iva diśaḥ daśa
dahan iva diśaḥ dṛgbhiḥ saṃvarta agniḥ iva utthitaḥ

original: BhP_08.15.027/3 ojaḥ saho balaṃ tejo yata etat samudyamaḥ
analyzed: ojaḥ sahaḥ balam tejaḥ yatas etat samudyamaḥ
śrī guruḥ uvāca
jānāmi maghavan śatroḥ unnateḥ asya kāraṇam
śiṣyāya upabhṛtam tejaḥ bhṛgubhiḥ brahma vādibhiḥ

original: BhP_08.15.029/1 ojasvinaṃ baliṃ jetuṃ na samartho 'sti kaścana
analyzed: ojasvinam balim jetum na samarthaḥ sti kaścana

original: BhP_08.15.029/3 bhavadvidho bhavān vāpi varjayitveśvaraṃ harim
analyzed: bhavadvidhaḥ bhavān vā api varjayitvā īśvaram harim

original: BhP_08.15.030/1 vijeṣyati na ko 'py enaṃ brahmatejaḥsamedhitam
analyzed: vijeṣyati na kaḥ pi enam brahma tejaḥ samedhitam

original: BhP_08.15.030/3 nāsya śaktaḥ puraḥ sthātuṃ kṛtāntasya yathā janāḥ
analyzed: na asya śaktaḥ puras sthātum kṛtāntasya yathā janāḥ

original: BhP_08.15.031/1 tasmān nilayamutsṛjya yūyaṃ sarve triviṣṭapam
analyzed: tasmāt nilayam utsṛjya yūyam sarve triviṣṭapam

original: BhP_08.15.031/3 yāta kālaṃ pratīkṣanto yataḥ śatrorviparyayaḥ
analyzed: yāta kālam pratīkṣantaḥ yatas śatroḥ viparyayaḥ
eṣa vipra bala udarkaḥ samprati ūrjita vikramaḥ
teṣām eva apamānena sa anubandhaḥ vinaṅkṣyati
evam su mantrita arthāḥ te guruṇā artha anudarśinā
hitvā triviṣṭapam jagmuḥ gīrvāṇāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
deveṣu atha nilīneṣu baliḥ vairocanaḥ purīm
deva dhānīm adhiṣṭhāya vaśam ninye jagattrayam

original: BhP_08.15.035/1 taṃ viśvajayinaṃ śiṣyaṃ bhṛgavaḥ śiṣyavatsalāḥ
analyzed: tam viśva jayinam śiṣyam bhṛgavaḥ śiṣya vatsalāḥ
śatena hayamedhānām anuvratam ayājayan
tatas tad anubhāvena bhuvana traya viśrutām

original: BhP_08.15.036/3 kīrtiṃ dikṣuvitanvānaḥ sa reja uḍurāḍ iva
analyzed: kīrtim dikṣu vitanvānaḥ sa reje uḍurāj iva

original: BhP_08.15.037/1 bubhuje ca śriyaṃ svṛddhāṃ dvijadevopalambhitām
analyzed: bubhuje ca śriyam su ṛddhām dvijadeva upalambhitām
kṛtakṛtyam iva ātmānam manyamānaḥ mahā manāḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
evam putreṣu naṣṭeṣu devamātā aditiḥ tadā
hṛte triviṣṭape daityaiḥ paryatapyat anātha vat

original: BhP_08.16.002/1 ekadā kaśyapastasyā āśramaṃ bhagavān agāt
analyzed: ekadā kaśyapaḥ tasyāḥ āśramam bhagavān agāt
nirutsavam nirānandam samādheḥ virataḥ cirāt
sa patnīm dīna vadanām kṛta āsana parigrahaḥ
sabhājitaḥ yathānyāyam idam āha kuru udvaha

original: BhP_08.16.004/1 apy abhadraṃ na viprāṇāṃ bhadre loke 'dhunāgatam
analyzed: api abhadram na viprāṇām bhadre loke dhunā āgatam

original: BhP_08.16.004/3 na dharmasya na lokasya mṛtyośchandānuvartinaḥ
analyzed: na dharmasya na lokasya mṛtyoḥ chanda anuvartinaḥ
api vā akuśalam kiñcid gṛheṣu gṛhamedhini

original: BhP_08.16.005/3 dharmasyārthasya kāmasya yatra yogo hy ayoginām
analyzed: dharmasya arthasya kāmasya yatra yogaḥ hi ayoginām
api vā atithayaḥ bhyetya kuṭumba āsaktayā tvayā

original: BhP_08.16.006/3 gṛhādapūjitā yātāḥ pratyutthānena vā kvacit
analyzed: gṛhāt apūjitāḥ yātāḥ pratyutthānena vā kvacid
gṛheṣu yeṣu atithayaḥ na arcitāḥ salilaiḥ api

original: BhP_08.16.007/3 yadi niryānti te nūnaṃ pherurājagṛhopamāḥ
analyzed: yadi niryānti te nūnam pheru rājagṛha upamāḥ

original: BhP_08.16.008/1 apy agnayastu velāyāṃ na hutā haviṣā sati
analyzed: api agnayaḥ tu velāyām na hutāḥ haviṣā sati

original: BhP_08.16.008/3 tvayodvignadhiyā bhadre proṣite mayi karhicit
analyzed: tvayā udvigna dhiyā bhadre proṣite mayi karhicit

original: BhP_08.16.009/1 yatpūjayā kāmadughān yāti lokān gṛhānvitaḥ
analyzed: yad pūjayā kāmadughān yāti lokān gṛha anvitaḥ

original: BhP_08.16.009/3 brāhmaṇo 'gniśca vai viṣṇoḥ sarvadevātmano mukham
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ gniḥ ca vai viṣṇoḥ sarva deva ātmanaḥ mukham

original: BhP_08.16.010/1 api sarve kuśalinastava putrā manasvini
analyzed: api sarve kuśalinaḥ tava putrāḥ manasvini
lakṣaye svastham ātmānam bhavatyā lakṣaṇaiḥ aham
śrī aditiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.16.011/1 bhadraṃ dvijagavāṃ brahman dharmasyāsya janasya ca
analyzed: bhadram dvija gavām brahman dharmasya asya janasya ca

original: BhP_08.16.011/3 trivargasya paraṃ kṣetraṃ gṛhamedhin gṛhā ime
analyzed: trivargasya param kṣetram gṛhamedhin gṛhāḥ ime

original: BhP_08.16.012/1 agnayo 'tithayo bhṛtyā bhikṣavo ye ca lipsavaḥ
analyzed: agnayaḥ tithayaḥ bhṛtyāḥ bhikṣavaḥ ye ca lipsavaḥ

original: BhP_08.16.012/3 sarvaṃ bhagavato brahmannanudhyānān na riṣyati
analyzed: sarvam bhagavataḥ brahman anudhyānāt na riṣyati

original: BhP_08.16.013/1 ko nu me bhagavan kāmo na sampadyeta mānasaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ nu me bhagavan kāmaḥ na sampadyeta mānasaḥ

original: BhP_08.16.013/3 yasyā bhavān prajādhyakṣa evaṃ dharmān prabhāṣate
analyzed: yasyāḥ bhavān prajādhyakṣaḥ evam dharmān prabhāṣate

original: BhP_08.16.014/1 tavaiva mārīca manaḥśarīrajāḥ prajā imāḥ sattvarajastamojuṣaḥ
analyzed: tava eva mārīca manaḥ śarīra jāḥ prajāḥ imāḥ sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ juṣaḥ

original: BhP_08.16.014/3 samo bhavāṃstāsvasurādiṣu prabho tathāpi bhaktaṃ bhajate maheśvaraḥ
analyzed: samaḥ bhavān tāsu asura ādiṣu prabho tathā api bhaktam bhajate maheśvaraḥ

original: BhP_08.16.015/1 tasmādīśa bhajantyā me śreyaścintaya suvrata
analyzed: tasmāt īśa bhajantyāḥ me śreyaḥ cintaya suvrata

original: BhP_08.16.015/3 hṛtaśriyo hṛtasthānān sapatnaiḥ pāhi naḥ prabho
analyzed: hṛta śriyaḥ hṛta sthānān sapatnaiḥ pāhi naḥ prabho
paraiḥ vivāsitā sā aham magnā vyasana sāgare

original: BhP_08.16.016/3 aiśvaryaṃ śrīryaśaḥ sthānaṃ hṛtāni prabalairmama
analyzed: aiśvaryam śrīḥ yaśaḥ sthānam hṛtāni prabalaiḥ mama

original: BhP_08.16.017/1 yathā tāni punaḥ sādho prapadyeran mamātmajāḥ
analyzed: yathā tāni punar sādho prapadyeran mama ātmajāḥ

original: BhP_08.16.017/3 tathā vidhehi kalyāṇaṃ dhiyā kalyāṇakṛttama
analyzed: tathā vidhehi kalyāṇam dhiyā kalyāṇa kṛttama
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
evam abhyarthitaḥ dityā kaḥ tām āha smayan iva

original: BhP_08.16.018/3 aho māyābalaṃ viṣṇoḥ snehabaddhamidaṃ jagat
analyzed: aho māyā balam viṣṇoḥ sneha baddham idam jagat

original: BhP_08.16.019/1 kva deho bhautiko 'nātmā kva cātmā prakṛteḥ paraḥ
analyzed: kva dehaḥ bhautikaḥ na ātmā kva ca ātmā prakṛteḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_08.16.019/3 kasya ke patiputrādyā moha eva hi kāraṇam
analyzed: kasya ke pati putra ādyāḥ mohaḥ eva hi kāraṇam
upatiṣṭhasva puruṣam bhagavantam janārdanam
sarva bhūta guhā āvāsam vāsudevam jagadgurum

original: BhP_08.16.021/1 sa vidhāsyati te kāmān harirdīnānukampanaḥ
analyzed: sa vidhāsyati te kāmān hariḥ dīna anukampanaḥ
amoghā bhagavat bhaktiḥ na itarā iti matiḥ mama
śrī aditiḥ uvāca
kena aham vidhinā brahman upasthāsye jagatpatim

original: BhP_08.16.022/3 yathā me satyasaṅkalpo vidadhyāt sa manoratham
analyzed: yathā me satya saṅkalpaḥ vidadhyāt sa manoratham

original: BhP_08.16.023/1 ādiśa tvaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha vidhiṃ tadupadhāvanam
analyzed: ādiśa tvam dvijaśreṣṭha vidhim tad upadhāvanam

original: BhP_08.16.023/1 āśu tuṣyati me devaḥ sīdantyāḥ saha putrakaiḥ
analyzed: āśu tuṣyati me devaḥ sīdantyāḥ saha putrakaiḥ
śrī kaśyapaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.16.024/1 etan me bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ prajākāmasya padmajaḥ
analyzed: etat me bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ prajā kāmasya padmajaḥ

original: BhP_08.16.024/3 yadāha te pravakṣyāmi vrataṃ keśavatoṣaṇam
analyzed: yat āha te pravakṣyāmi vratam keśava toṣaṇam
phālgunasya amale pakṣe dvādaśa aham payaḥ vratam
arcayet aravinda akṣam bhaktyā paramayā anvitaḥ
sinīvālyām mṛdā ālipya snāyāt kroḍa vidīrṇayā

original: BhP_08.16.026/3 yadi labhyeta vai srotasy etaṃ mantramudīrayet
analyzed: yadi labhyeta vai srotasi etam mantram udīrayet

original: BhP_08.16.027/1 tvaṃ devy ādivarāheṇa rasāyāḥ sthānamicchatā
analyzed: tvam devī ādivarāheṇa rasāyāḥ sthānam icchatā

original: BhP_08.16.027/3 uddhṛtāsi namastubhyaṃ pāpmānaṃ me praṇāśaya
analyzed: uddhṛtā asi namaḥ tubhyam pāpmānam me praṇāśaya
nirvartita ātma niyamaḥ devam arcet samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_08.16.028/3 arcāyāṃ sthaṇḍile sūrye jale vahnau gurāvapi
analyzed: arcāyām sthaṇḍile sūrye jale vahnau gurau api
namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate puruṣāya mahīyase
sarva bhūta nivāsāya vāsudevāya sākṣiṇe
namaḥ vyaktāya sūkṣmāya pradhāna puruṣāya ca
caturviṃśat guṇa jñāya guṇa saṅkhyāna hetave

original: BhP_08.16.031/1 namo dviśīrṣṇe tripade catuḥśṛṅgāya tantave
analyzed: namaḥ dvi śīrṣṇe tri pade catur śṛṅgāya tantave
sapta hastāya yajñāya trayī vidyā ātmane namaḥ

original: BhP_08.16.032/1 namaḥ śivāya rudrāya namaḥ śaktidharāya ca
analyzed: namaḥ śivāya rudrāya namaḥ śaktidharāya ca
sarva vidyā adhipataye bhūtānām pataye namaḥ
namaḥ hiraṇyagarbhāya prāṇāya jagat ātmane
yoga aiśvarya śarīrāya namaḥ te yoga hetave

original: BhP_08.16.034/1 namasta ādidevāya sākṣibhūtāya te namaḥ
analyzed: namaḥ te ādidevāya sākṣi bhūtāya te namaḥ

original: BhP_08.16.034/3 nārāyaṇāya ṛṣaye narāya haraye namaḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇāya ṛṣaye narāya haraye namaḥ
namaḥ marakata śyāma vapuṣe dhigata śriye
keśavāya namaḥ tubhyam namaḥ te pītavāsase

original: BhP_08.16.036/1 tvaṃ sarvavaradaḥ puṃsāṃ vareṇya varadarṣabha
analyzed: tvam sarva vara daḥ puṃsām vareṇya vara da ṛṣabha
atas te śreyase dhīrāḥ pāda reṇum upāsate

original: BhP_08.16.037/1 anvavartanta yaṃ devāḥ śrīśca tatpādapadmayoḥ
analyzed: anvavartanta yam devāḥ śrīḥ ca tad pāda padmayoḥ

original: BhP_08.16.037/3 spṛhayanta ivāmodaṃ bhagavān me prasīdatām
analyzed: spṛhayantaḥ iva āmodam bhagavān me prasīdatām
etaiḥ mantraiḥ hṛṣīkeśam āvāhana puraskṛtam
arcayet śraddhayā yuktaḥ pādya upasparśana ādibhiḥ
arcitvā gandha mālya ādyaiḥ payasā snapayet vibhum
vastra upavīta ābharaṇa pādya upasparśanaiḥ tatas
gandha dhūpa ādibhiḥ ca arcet dvādaśa akṣara vidyayā

original: BhP_08.16.040/1 śṛtaṃ payasi naivedyaṃ śālyannaṃ vibhave sati
analyzed: śṛtam payasi naivedyam śāli annam vibhave sati

original: BhP_08.16.040/3 sasarpiḥ saguḍaṃ dattvā juhuyān mūlavidyayā
analyzed: sa sarpiḥ sa guḍam dattvā juhuyāt mūlavidyayā

original: BhP_08.16.041/1 niveditaṃ tadbhaktāya dadyādbhuñjīta vā svayam
analyzed: niveditam tat bhaktāya dadyāt bhuñjīta vā svayam
dattvā ācamanam arcitvā tāmbūlam ca nivedayet
japet aṣṭottaraśatam stuvīta stutibhiḥ prabhum

original: BhP_08.16.042/3 kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ bhūmau praṇameddaṇḍavan mudā
analyzed: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam bhūmau praṇamet daṇḍa vat mudā

original: BhP_08.16.043/1 kṛtvā śirasi taccheṣāṃ devamudvāsayet tataḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā śirasi tad śeṣām devam udvāsayet tatas
dvi avarān bhojayet viprān pāyasena yathocitam

original: BhP_08.16.044/1 bhuñjīta tairanujñātaḥ seṣṭaḥ śeṣaṃ sabhājitaiḥ
analyzed: bhuñjīta taiḥ anujñātaḥ sa iṣṭaḥ śeṣam sabhājitaiḥ

original: BhP_08.16.044/3 brahmacāry atha tadrātryāṃ śvo bhūte prathame 'hani
analyzed: brahmacārī atha tad rātryām śvas bhūte prathame hani
snātaḥ śuciḥ yathā uktena vidhinā su samāhitaḥ
payasā snāpayitvā arcet yāvat vrata samāpanam
payaḥ bhakṣaḥ vratam idam caret viṣṇu arcana ādṛtaḥ
pūrvavat juhuyāt agnim brāhmaṇān ca api bhojayet
evam tu aharahar kuryāt dvādaśa aham payaḥ vratam
hareḥ ārādhanam homam arhaṇam dvija tarpaṇam
pratipad dinam ārabhya yāvat śukla trayodaśīm
brahmacaryam adhaḥsvapnam snānam triṣavaṇam caret
varjayet asat ālāpam bhogān uccāvacān tathā
ahiṃsraḥ sarva bhūtānām vāsudeva parāyaṇaḥ
trayodaśyām atho viṣṇoḥ snapanam pañcakaiḥ vibhoḥ
kārayet śāstra dṛṣṭena vidhinā vidhi kovidaiḥ
pūjām ca mahatīm kuryāt vitta śāṭhya vivarjitaḥ

original: BhP_08.16.051/3 caruṃ nirūpya payasi śipiviṣṭāya viṣṇave
analyzed: carum nirūpya payasi śipiviṣṭāya viṣṇave

original: BhP_08.16.052/1 sūktena tena puruṣaṃ yajeta susamāhitaḥ
analyzed: sūktena tena puruṣam yajeta su samāhitaḥ
naivedyam ca atiguṇavat dadyāt puruṣa tuṣṭi dam
ācāryam jñāna sampannam vastra ābharaṇa dhenubhiḥ
toṣayet ṛtvijaḥ ca eva tat viddhi ārādhanam hareḥ

original: BhP_08.16.054/1 bhojayet tān guṇavatā sadannena śucismite
analyzed: bhojayet tān guṇavatā sat annena śuci smite

original: BhP_08.16.054/3 anyāṃśca brāhmaṇān chaktyā ye ca tatra samāgatāḥ
analyzed: anyān ca brāhmaṇān śaktyā ye ca tatra samāgatāḥ
dakṣiṇām gurave dadyāt ṛtvigbhyaḥ ca yathārhataḥ
annādyena aśva pākān ca prīṇayet samupāgatān
bhuktavatsu ca sarveṣu dīna andha kṛpaṇa ādiṣu

original: BhP_08.16.056/3 viṣṇostat prīṇanaṃ vidvān bhuñjīta saha bandhubhiḥ
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ tat prīṇanam vidvān bhuñjīta saha bandhubhiḥ
nṛtya vāditra gītaiḥ ca stutibhiḥ svasti vācakaiḥ
kārayet tad kathābhiḥ ca pūjām bhagavataḥ nu aham

original: BhP_08.16.058/1 etat payovrataṃ nāma puruṣārādhanaṃ param
analyzed: etat payovratam nāma puruṣa ārādhanam param
pitāmahena abhihitam mayā te samudāhṛtam

original: BhP_08.16.059/1 tvaṃ cānena mahābhāge samyak cīrṇena keśavam
analyzed: tvam ca anena mahābhāge samyak cīrṇena keśavam
ātmanā śuddha bhāvena niyata ātmā bhaja avyayam

original: BhP_08.16.060/1 ayaṃ vai sarvayajñākhyaḥ sarvavratamiti smṛtam
analyzed: ayam vai sarva yajña ākhyaḥ sarva vratam iti smṛtam
tapaḥ sāram idam bhadre dānam ca īśvara tarpaṇam

original: BhP_08.16.061/1 ta eva niyamāḥ sākṣāt ta eva ca yamottamāḥ
analyzed: te eva niyamāḥ sākṣāt te eva ca yama uttamāḥ

original: BhP_08.16.061/3 tapo dānaṃ vrataṃ yajño yena tuṣyaty adhokṣajaḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ dānam vratam yajñaḥ yena tuṣyati adhokṣajaḥ
tasmāt etat vratam bhadre prayatā śraddhayā ācara

original: BhP_08.16.062/3 bhagavān parituṣṭaste varān āśu vidhāsyati
analyzed: bhagavān parituṣṭaḥ te varān āśu vidhāsyati
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.17.001/1 ity uktā sāditī rājan svabhartrā kaśyapena vai
analyzed: iti uktā sā aditiḥ rājan sva bhartrā kaśyapena vai
anvatiṣṭhat vratam idam dvādaśa aham atandritā
cintayanti ekayā buddhyā mahāpuruṣam īśvaram
pragṛhya indriya duṣṭa aśvān manasā buddhi sārathiḥ
manaḥ ca ekāgrayā buddhyā bhagavati akhilātmani

original: BhP_08.17.003/3 vāsudeve samādhāya cacāra ha payovratam
analyzed: vāsudeve samādhāya cacāra ha payovratam

original: BhP_08.17.004/1 tasyāḥ prādurabhūt tāta bhagavān ādipuruṣaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ prādurabhūt tāta bhagavān ādipuruṣaḥ
pīta vāsāḥ catur bāhuḥ śaṅkha cakra gadā dharaḥ

original: BhP_08.17.005/1 taṃ netragocaraṃ vīkṣya sahasotthāya sādaram
analyzed: tam netra gocaram vīkṣya sahasā utthāya sa ādaram
nanāma bhuvi kāyena daṇḍa vat prīti vihvalā

original: BhP_08.17.006/1 sotthāya baddhāñjalirīḍituṃ sthitā notseha ānandajalākulekṣaṇā
analyzed: sā utthāya baddhāñjaliḥ īḍitum sthitā na utsehe ānanda jala ākula īkṣaṇā
babhūva tūṣṇīm pulaka ākula ākṛtiḥ tad darśana ati utsava gātra vepathuḥ

original: BhP_08.17.007/1 prītyā śanairgadgadayā girā hariṃ tuṣṭāva sā devy aditiḥ kurūdvaha
analyzed: prītyā śanais gadgadayā girā harim tuṣṭāva sā devī aditiḥ kuru udvaha

original: BhP_08.17.007/3 udvīkṣatī sā pibatīva cakṣuṣā ramāpatiṃ yajñapatiṃ jagatpatim
analyzed: udvīkṣatī sā pibatī iva cakṣuṣā ramāpatim yajñapatim jagatpatim
śrī aditiḥ uvāca
yajñeśa yajñapuruṣa acyuta tīrthapāda
tīrtha śravaḥ śravaṇa maṅgala nāmadheya
āpanna loka vṛjina upaśama udaya adya

original: BhP_08.17.008/4 śaṃ naḥ kṛdhīśa bhagavannasi dīnanāthaḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ kṛdhi īśa bhagavan asi dīna nāthaḥ
viśvāya viśva bhavana sthiti saṃyamāya
svairam gṛhīta puru śakti guṇāya bhūmne
svasthāya śaśvat upabṛṃhita pūrṇa bodha
vyāpādita ātma tamase haraye namaḥ te
āyuḥ param vapuḥ abhīṣṭam atulya lakṣmīḥ

original: BhP_08.17.010/3 jñānaṃ ca kevalamananta bhavanti tuṣṭāt
analyzed: jñānam ca kevalam ananta bhavanti tuṣṭāt
tvattaḥ nṛṇām kimu sapatna jaya ādi rāśīḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.17.011/1 adityaivaṃ stuto rājan bhagavān puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: adityā evam stutaḥ rājan bhagavān puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ
kṣetrajñaḥ sarva bhūtānām iti ha uvāca bhārata
śrī bhagavān uvāca
devamātar bhavatyā me vijñātam cira kāṅkṣitam
yat sapatnaiḥ hṛta śrīṇām cyāvitānām sva dhām atas

original: BhP_08.17.013/1 tān vinirjitya samare durmadān asurarṣabhān
analyzed: tān vinirjitya samare durmadān asura ṛṣabhān
pratilabdha jaya śrībhiḥ putraiḥ icchasi upāsitum
indra jyeṣṭhaiḥ sva tanayaiḥ hatānām yudhi vidviṣām
striyaḥ rudantīḥ āsādya draṣṭum icchasi duḥkhitāḥ
ātmajān su samṛddhān tvam pratyāhṛta yaśaḥ śriyaḥ
nāka pṛṣṭham adhiṣṭhāya krīḍataḥ draṣṭum icchasi

original: BhP_08.17.016/1 prāyo 'dhunā te 'surayūthanāthā apāraṇīyā iti devi me matiḥ
analyzed: prāyas te sura yūtha nāthāḥ apāraṇīyāḥ iti devi me matiḥ

original: BhP_08.17.016/3 yat te 'nukūleśvaravipraguptā na vikramastatra sukhaṃ dadāti
analyzed: yat te nukūla īśvara vipraguptāḥ na vikramaḥ tatra sukham dadāti

original: BhP_08.17.017/1 athāpy upāyo mama devi cintyaḥ santoṣitasya vratacaryayā te
analyzed: athā api upāyaḥ mama devi cintyaḥ santoṣitasya vrata caryayā te

original: BhP_08.17.017/3 mamārcanaṃ nārhati gantumanyathā śraddhānurūpaṃ phalahetukatvāt
analyzed: mama arcanam na arhati gantum anyathā śraddhā anurūpam phala hetuka tvāt
tvayā arcitaḥ ca aham apatya guptaye payovratena anuguṇam samīḍitaḥ

original: BhP_08.17.018/3 svāṃśena putratvamupetya te sutān goptāsmi mārīcatapasy adhiṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: sva aṃśena putra tvam upetya te sutān goptāsmi mārīca tapasi adhiṣṭhitaḥ
upadhāva patim bhadre prajāpatim akalmaṣam

original: BhP_08.17.019/3 māṃ ca bhāvayatī patyāvevaṃ rūpamavasthitam
analyzed: mām ca bhāvayatī patyau evam rūpam avasthitam

original: BhP_08.17.020/1 naitat parasmā ākhyeyaṃ pṛṣṭayāpi kathañcana
analyzed: na etat parasmai ākhyeyam pṛṣṭayā api kathañcana

original: BhP_08.17.020/3 sarvaṃ sampadyate devi devaguhyaṃ susaṃvṛtam
analyzed: sarvam sampadyate devi deva guhyam su saṃvṛtam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
etāvat uktvā bhagavān tatra eva antaradhīyata
aditiḥ durlabham labdhvā hareḥ janma ātmani prabhoḥ

original: BhP_08.17.022/1 upādhāvat patiṃ bhaktyā parayā kṛtakṛtyavat
analyzed: upādhāvat patim bhaktyā parayā kṛtakṛtya vat
sa vai samādhi yogena kaśyapaḥ tat abudhyata
praviṣṭam ātmani hareḥ aṃśam hi avitatha īkṣaṇaḥ
saḥ dityām vīryam ādhatta tapasā cira sambhṛtam

original: BhP_08.17.023/5 amāhitamanā rājan dāruṇy agniṃ yathānilaḥ
analyzed: amāhita manāḥ rājan dāruṇi agnim yathā anilaḥ
aditeḥ adhiṣṭhitam garbham bhagavantam sanātanam
hiraṇyagarbhaḥ vijñāya samīḍe guhya nāmabhiḥ
śrī brahmā uvāca
jaya uru gāya bhagavan urukrama namaḥ stu te

original: BhP_08.17.025/3 namo brahmaṇyadevāya triguṇāya namo namaḥ
analyzed: namaḥ brahmaṇyadevāya triguṇāya namaḥ namaḥ
namaḥ te pṛśni garbhāya veda garbhāya vedhase
tri nābhāya tri pṛṣṭhāya śipiviṣṭāya viṣṇave

original: BhP_08.17.027/1 tvamādiranto bhuvanasya madhyam anantaśaktiṃ puruṣaṃ yamāhuḥ
analyzed: tvam ādiḥ antaḥ bhuvanasya madhyam ananta śaktim puruṣam yam āhuḥ

original: BhP_08.17.027/3 kālo bhavān ākṣipatīśa viśvaṃ sroto yathāntaḥ patitaṃ gabhīram
analyzed: kālaḥ bhavān ākṣipati īśa viśvam srotaḥ yathā antar patitam gabhīram

original: BhP_08.17.028/1 tvaṃ vai prajānāṃ sthirajaṅgamānāṃ prajāpatīnāmasi sambhaviṣṇuḥ
analyzed: tvam vai prajānām sthira jaṅgamānām prajāpatīnām asi sambhaviṣṇuḥ

original: BhP_08.17.028/3 divaukasāṃ deva divaścyutānāṃ parāyaṇaṃ nauriva majjato 'psu
analyzed: divaukasām deva divaḥ cyutānām parāyaṇam nauḥ iva majjataḥ u psu
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
ittham viriñca stuta karma vīryaḥ prādurbabhūva amṛta bhūḥ adityām

original: BhP_08.18.003/1 madhuvrātavratavighuṣṭayā svayā virājitaḥ śrīvanamālayā hariḥ
analyzed: madhu vrāta vrata vighuṣṭayā svayā virājitaḥ śrī vanamālayā hariḥ
prajāpateḥ veśma tamaḥ sva rociṣā vināśayan kaṇṭha niviṣṭa kaustubhaḥ

original: BhP_08.18.004/1 diśaḥ praseduḥ salilāśayāstadā prajāḥ prahṛṣṭā ṛtavo guṇānvitāḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ praseduḥ salilāśayāḥ tadā prajāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ ṛtavaḥ guṇa anvitāḥ

original: BhP_08.18.004/3 dyaurantarīkṣaṃ kṣitiragnijihvā gāvo dvijāḥ sañjahṛṣurnagāśca
analyzed: dyauḥ antarīkṣam kṣitiḥ agni jihvā gāvaḥ dvijāḥ sañjahṛṣuḥ nagāḥ ca
śroṇāyām śravaṇa dvādaśyām muhūrte bhijiti prabhuḥ
sarve nakṣatra tārā ādyāḥ cakruḥ tad janma dakṣiṇam
dvādaśyām savitā atiṣṭhat madhyandina gataḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_08.18.006/3 vijayānāma sā proktā yasyāṃ janma vidurhareḥ
analyzed: vijayā nāma sā proktā yasyām janma viduḥ hareḥ
śaṅkha dundubhayaḥ neduḥ mṛdaṅga paṇava ānakāḥ
citra vāditra tūryāṇām nirghoṣaḥ tumulaḥ bhavat
prītāḥ ca apsarasaḥ nṛtyan gandharva pravarāḥ jaguḥ
tuṣṭuvuḥ munayaḥ devāḥ manavaḥ pitaraḥ gnayaḥ
siddha vidyādhara gaṇāḥ sa kimpuruṣa kinnarāḥ
cāraṇāḥ yakṣa rakṣāṃsi suparṇāḥ bhujaga uttamāḥ
gāyantaḥ nṛtyantaḥ vibudha anugāḥ
adityāḥ āśrama padam kusumaiḥ samavākiran

original: BhP_08.18.011/1 dṛṣṭvāditistaṃ nijagarbhasambhavaṃ paraṃ pumāṃsaṃ mudamāpa vismitā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā aditiḥ tam nija garbha sambhavam param pumāṃsam mudam āpa vismitā

original: BhP_08.18.011/3 gṛhītadehaṃ nijayogamāyayā prajāpatiścāha jayeti vismitaḥ
analyzed: gṛhīta deham nija yoga māyayā prajāpatiḥ ca āha jaya iti vismitaḥ
yat tad vapuḥ bhāti vibhūṣaṇa āyudhaiḥ avyakta cit vyaktam adhārayat hariḥ

original: BhP_08.18.012/3 babhūva tenaiva sa vāmano vaṭuḥ sampaśyatordivyagatiryathā naṭaḥ
analyzed: babhūva tena eva sa vāmanaḥ vaṭuḥ sampaśyatoḥ divya gatiḥ yathā naṭaḥ

original: BhP_08.18.013/1 taṃ vaṭuṃ vāmanaṃ dṛṣṭvā modamānā maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: tam vaṭum vāmanam dṛṣṭvā modamānāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ
karmāṇi kārayāmāsuḥ puraskṛtya prajāpatim
tasya upanīyamānasya sāvitrīm savitā abravīt
bṛhaspatiḥ brahmasūtram mekhalām kaśyapaḥ dadāt

original: BhP_08.18.015/1 dadau kṛṣṇājinaṃ bhūmirdaṇḍaṃ somo vanaspatiḥ
analyzed: dadau kṛṣṇājinam bhūmiḥ daṇḍam somaḥ vanaspatiḥ

original: BhP_08.18.015/3 kaupīnācchādanaṃ mātā dyauśchatraṃ jagataḥ pateḥ
analyzed: kaupīna ācchādanam mātā dyauḥ chatram jagataḥ pateḥ

original: BhP_08.18.016/1 kamaṇḍaluṃ vedagarbhaḥ kuśān saptarṣayo daduḥ
analyzed: kamaṇḍalum vedagarbhaḥ kuśān saptarṣayaḥ daduḥ
akṣamālām mahā rāja sarasvati avyaya ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_08.18.017/1 tasmā ity upanītāya yakṣarāṭ pātrikāmadāt
analyzed: tasmai iti upanītāya yakṣa rāj pātrikām adāt
bhikṣām bhagavatī sākṣāt umā adāt ambikā satī

original: BhP_08.18.018/1 sa brahmavarcasenaivaṃ sabhāṃ sambhāvito vaṭuḥ
analyzed: sa brahmavarcasena evam sabhām sambhāvitaḥ vaṭuḥ
brahmarṣi gaṇa sañjuṣṭām atyarocata māriṣaḥ
samiddham āhitam vahnim kṛtvā parisamūhanam
paristīrya samabhyarcya samidbhiḥ ajuhot dvijaḥ
śrutvā aśvamedhaiḥ yajamānam ūrjitam balim bhṛgūṇām upakalpitaiḥ tatas

original: BhP_08.18.020/3 jagāma tatrākhilasārasambhṛto bhāreṇa gāṃ sannamayan pade pade
analyzed: jagāma tatra akhila sāra sambhṛtaḥ bhāreṇa gām sannamayan pade pade

original: BhP_08.18.021/1 taṃ narmadāyāstaṭa uttare baler ya ṛtvijaste bhṛgukacchasaṃjñake
analyzed: tam narmadāyāḥ taṭe uttare baleḥ ye ṛtvijaḥ te bhṛgukaccha saṃjñake

original: BhP_08.18.021/3 pravartayanto bhṛgavaḥ kratūttamaṃ vyacakṣatārāduditaṃ yathā ravim
analyzed: pravartayantaḥ bhṛgavaḥ kratu uttamam vyacakṣata ārāt uditam yathā ravim

original: BhP_08.18.022/1 te ṛtvijo yajamānaḥ sadasyā hatatviṣo vāmanatejasā nṛpa
analyzed: te ṛtvijaḥ yajamānaḥ sadasyāḥ hata tviṣaḥ vāmana tejasā nṛpa

original: BhP_08.18.022/3 sūryaḥ kilāyāty uta vā vibhāvasuḥ sanatkumāro 'tha didṛkṣayā kratoḥ
analyzed: sūryaḥ kila āyāti uta vā vibhāvasuḥ didṛkṣayā kratoḥ

original: BhP_08.18.023/1 itthaṃ saśiṣyeṣu bhṛguṣvanekadhā vitarkyamāṇo bhagavān sa vāmanaḥ
analyzed: ittham sa śiṣyeṣu bhṛguṣu anekadhā vitarkyamāṇaḥ bhagavān sa vāmanaḥ

original: BhP_08.18.023/3 chatraṃ sadaṇḍaṃ sajalaṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ viveśa bibhraddhayamedhavāṭam
analyzed: chatram sa daṇḍam sa jalam kamaṇḍalum viveśa bibhrat hayamedha vāṭam

original: BhP_08.18.024/3 jaṭilaṃ vāmanaṃ vipraṃ māyāmāṇavakaṃ harim
analyzed: jaṭilam vāmanam vipram māyāmāṇavakam harim

original: BhP_08.18.025/1 praviṣṭaṃ vīkṣya bhṛgavaḥ saśiṣyāste sahāgnibhiḥ
analyzed: praviṣṭam vīkṣya bhṛgavaḥ sa śiṣyāḥ te saha agnibhiḥ
pratyagṛhṇan samutthāya saṅkṣiptāḥ tasya tejasā
yajamānaḥ pramuditaḥ darśanīyam manoramam
rūpa anurūpa avayavam tasmai āsanam āharat
svāgatena abhinandya atha pādau bhagavataḥ baliḥ
avanijya arcayāmāsa mukta saṅga manoramam

original: BhP_08.18.028/1 tatpādaśaucaṃ janakalmaṣāpahaṃ sa dharmavin mūrdhny adadhāt sumaṅgalam
analyzed: tad pāda śaucam jana kalmaṣa apaham sa dharma vid mūrdhni adadhāt su maṅgalam

original: BhP_08.18.028/3 yaddevadevo giriśaścandramaulir dadhāra mūrdhnā parayā ca bhaktyā
analyzed: yat devadevaḥ giriśaḥ candramauliḥ dadhāra mūrdhnā parayā ca bhaktyā
śrī baliḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.18.029/1 svāgataṃ te namastubhyaṃ brahman kiṃ karavāma te
analyzed: svāgatam te namaḥ tubhyam brahman kim karavāma te

original: BhP_08.18.029/3 brahmarṣīṇāṃ tapaḥ sākṣān manye tvārya vapurdharam
analyzed: brahmarṣīṇām tapaḥ sākṣāt manye tvā ārya vapuḥ dharam

original: BhP_08.18.030/1 adya naḥ pitarastṛptā adya naḥ pāvitaṃ kulam
analyzed: adya naḥ pitaraḥ tṛptāḥ adya naḥ pāvitam kulam

original: BhP_08.18.030/3 adya sviṣṭaḥ kraturayaṃ yadbhavān āgato gṛhān
analyzed: adya su iṣṭaḥ kratuḥ ayam yat bhavān āgataḥ gṛhān

original: BhP_08.18.031/1 adyāgnayo me suhutā yathāvidhi dvijātmaja tvaccaraṇāvanejanaiḥ
analyzed: adya agnayaḥ me su hutāḥ yathāvidhi dvija ātmaja tvad caraṇa avanejanaiḥ

original: BhP_08.18.031/3 hatāṃhaso vārbhiriyaṃ ca bhūraho tathā punītā tanubhiḥ padaistava

analyzed: yat yat vaṭaḥ vāñchasi tat pratīccha me tvām arthinam vipra suta anutarkaye

original: BhP_08.18.032/3 gāṃ kāñcanaṃ guṇavaddhāma mṛṣṭaṃ tathānnapeyamuta vā viprakanyām

original: BhP_08.18.032/5 grāmān samṛddhāṃsturagān gajān vā rathāṃstathārhattama sampratīccha
analyzed: grāmān samṛddhān turagān gajān vā rathān tathā arhattama sampratīccha
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.19.001/1 iti vairocanervākyaṃ dharmayuktaṃ sa sūnṛtam
analyzed: iti vairocaneḥ vākyam dharma yuktam sa sūnṛtam
niśamya bhagavān prītaḥ pratinandya idam abravīt
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_08.19.002/1 vacastavaitaj janadeva sūnṛtaṃ kulocitaṃ dharmayutaṃ yaśaskaram
analyzed: vacaḥ tava etat janadeva sūnṛtam kula ucitam dharma yutam yaśaskaram

original: BhP_08.19.002/3 yasya pramāṇaṃ bhṛgavaḥ sāmparāye pitāmahaḥ kulavṛddhaḥ praśāntaḥ
analyzed: yasya pramāṇam bhṛgavaḥ sāmparāye pitāmahaḥ kula vṛddhaḥ praśāntaḥ

original: BhP_08.19.003/3 pratyākhyātā pratiśrutya yo vādātā dvijātaye
analyzed: pratyākhyātā pratiśrutya yaḥ vā adātā dvijātaye

analyzed: na santi tīrthe yudhi ca arthinā arthitāḥ parāṅmukhāḥ ye tva manasvinaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_08.19.004/3 yuṣmatkule yadyaśasāmalena prahrāda udbhāti yathoḍupaḥ khe
analyzed: yuṣmad kule yad yaśasā amalena prahrādaḥ udbhāti yathā uḍupaḥ khe

original: BhP_08.19.005/1 yato jāto hiraṇyākṣaścaranneka imāṃ mahīm

original: BhP_08.19.006/3 ātmānaṃ jayinaṃ mene tadvīryaṃ bhūry anusmaran
analyzed: ātmānam jayinam mene tad vīryam bhūri anusmaran

original: BhP_08.19.007/1 niśamya tadvadhaṃ bhrātā hiraṇyakaśipuḥ purā
analyzed: niśamya tad vadham bhrātā hiraṇyakaśipuḥ purā

original: BhP_08.19.007/3 hantuṃ bhrātṛhaṇaṃ kruddho jagāma nilayaṃ hareḥ
analyzed: hantum bhrātṛ haṇam kruddhaḥ jagāma nilayam hareḥ
tam āyāntam samālokya śūlapāṇim kṛtānta vat
cintayāmāsa kāla jñaḥ viṣṇuḥ māyāvinām varaḥ

original: BhP_08.19.009/1 yato yato 'haṃ tatrāsau mṛtyuḥ prāṇabhṛtāmiva
analyzed: yatas yatas ham tatra asau mṛtyuḥ prāṇabhṛtām iva
atas ham asya hṛdayam pravekṣyāmi parāc dṛśaḥ

original: BhP_08.19.010/1 evaṃ sa niścitya ripoḥ śarīram ādhāvato nirviviśe 'surendra
analyzed: evam sa niścitya ripoḥ śarīram ādhāvataḥ nirviviśe sura indra
