original: BhP_08.19.011/1 sa tanniketaṃ parimṛśya śūnyam apaśyamānaḥ kupito nanāda
analyzed: sa tad niketam parimṛśya śūnyam a paśyamānaḥ kupitaḥ nanāda

original: BhP_08.19.011/3 kṣmāṃ dyāṃ diśaḥ khaṃ vivarān samudrān viṣṇuṃ vicinvan na dadarśa vīraḥ
analyzed: kṣmām dyām diśaḥ kham vivarān samudrān viṣṇum vicinvan na dadarśa vīraḥ
apaśyan iti ha uvāca mayā anviṣṭam idam jagat

original: BhP_08.19.012/3 bhrātṛhā me gato nūnaṃ yato nāvartate pumān
analyzed: bhrātṛ hā me gataḥ nūnam yatas na āvartate pumān
vaira anubandhaḥ etāvān āmṛtyoḥ iha dehinām
ajñāna prabhavaḥ manyuḥ ahaṃmāna upabṛṃhitaḥ
pitā prahrāda putraḥ te tad vidvān dvija vatsalaḥ
svam āyuḥ dvijaliṅgebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ dāt sa yācitaḥ

original: BhP_08.19.015/1 bhavān ācaritān dharmān āsthito gṛhamedhibhiḥ
analyzed: bhavān ācaritān dharmān āsthitaḥ gṛhamedhibhiḥ
brāhmaṇaiḥ pūrvajaiḥ śūraiḥ anyaiḥ ca uddāma kīrtibhiḥ
tasmāt tvattaḥ mahīm īṣat vṛṇe ham vara da ṛṣabhāt

original: BhP_08.19.016/3 padāni trīṇi daityendra sammitāni padā mama
analyzed: padāni trīṇi daitya indra sammitāni padāḥ mama

original: BhP_08.19.017/1 nānyat te kāmaye rājan vadānyāj jagadīśvarāt
analyzed: na anyat te kāmaye rājan vadānyāt jagat īśvarāt

original: BhP_08.19.017/3 nainaḥ prāpnoti vai vidvān yāvadarthapratigrahaḥ
analyzed: na enaḥ prāpnoti vai vidvān yāvat artha pratigrahaḥ
śrī baliḥ uvāca
aho brāhmaṇa dāyāda vācaḥ te vṛddha sammatāḥ

original: BhP_08.19.018/3 tvaṃ bālo bāliśamatiḥ svārthaṃ praty abudho yathā
analyzed: tvam bālaḥ bāliśa matiḥ sva artham prati abudhaḥ yathā
mām vacobhiḥ samārādhya lokānām ekam īśvaram
pada trayam vṛṇīte yaḥ buddhimān

original: BhP_08.19.020/1 na pumān māmupavrajya bhūyo yācitumarhati
analyzed: na pumān mām upavrajya bhūyas yācitum arhati

original: BhP_08.19.020/3 tasmādvṛttikarīṃ bhūmiṃ vaṭo kāmaṃ pratīccha me
analyzed: tasmāt vṛtti karīm bhūmim vaṭo kāmam pratīccha me
śrī bhagavān uvāca
yāvantaḥ viṣayāḥ preṣṭhāḥ trilokyām ajita indriyam

original: BhP_08.19.021/3 na śaknuvanti te sarve pratipūrayituṃ nṛpa
analyzed: na śaknuvanti te sarve pratipūrayitum nṛpa

original: BhP_08.19.022/1 tribhiḥ kramairasantuṣṭo dvīpenāpi na pūryate
analyzed: tribhiḥ kramaiḥ asantuṣṭaḥ dvīpena api na pūryate
saptadvīpā adhipatayaḥ nṛpāḥ vaiṇya gaya ādayaḥ

original: BhP_08.19.023/3 arthaiḥ kāmairgatā nāntaṃ tṛṣṇāyā iti naḥ śrutam
analyzed: arthaiḥ kāmaiḥ gatāḥ na antam tṛṣṇāyāḥ iti naḥ śrutam
yadṛcchayā upapannena santuṣṭaḥ vartate sukham
na a santuṣṭaḥ tribhiḥ lokaiḥ ajita ātma upasāditaiḥ
puṃsaḥ yam saṃsṛteḥ hetuḥ asantoṣaḥ rtha kāmayoḥ
yadṛcchayā upapannena santoṣaḥ muktaye smṛtaḥ
yadṛcchā lābha tuṣṭasya tejaḥ viprasya vardhate
tat praśāmyati a santoṣa ādambha sevā śuśukṣaṇiḥ

original: BhP_08.19.027/1 tasmāt trīṇi padāny eva vṛṇe tvadvaradarṣabhāt
analyzed: tasmāt trīṇi padāni eva vṛṇe tvad vara da ṛṣabhāt

original: BhP_08.19.027/3 etāvataiva siddho 'haṃ vittaṃ yāvat prayojanam
analyzed: etāvatā eva siddhaḥ ham vittam yāvat prayojanam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.19.028/1 ity uktaḥ sa hasannāha vāñchātaḥ pratigṛhyatām
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa hasan āha vāñchātaḥ pratigṛhyatām

original: BhP_08.19.028/3 vāmanāya mahīṃ dātuṃ jagrāha jalabhājanam
analyzed: vāmanāya mahīm dātum jagrāha jala bhājanam
viṣṇave kṣmām pradāsyantam uśanāḥ asura īśvaram

original: BhP_08.19.029/3 jānaṃścikīrṣitaṃ viṣṇoḥ śiṣyaṃ prāha vidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: jānan cikīrṣitam viṣṇoḥ śiṣyam prāha vidām varaḥ
uvāca
eṣa vairocane sākṣāt bhagavān viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ
kaśyapāt aditeḥ jātaḥ devānām kārya sādhakaḥ
pratiśrutam tvayā etasmai yat anartham a jānatā

original: BhP_08.19.031/3 na sādhu manye daityānāṃ mahān upagato 'nayaḥ
analyzed: na sādhu manye daityānām mahān upagataḥ nayaḥ

original: BhP_08.19.032/1 eṣa te sthānamaiśvaryaṃ śriyaṃ tejo yaśaḥ śrutam
analyzed: eṣa te sthānam aiśvaryam śriyam tejaḥ yaśaḥ śrutam

original: BhP_08.19.032/3 dāsyaty ācchidya śakrāya māyāmāṇavako hariḥ
analyzed: dāsyati ācchidya śakrāya māyā māṇavakaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_08.19.033/1 tribhiḥ kramairimāl lokān viśvakāyaḥ kramiṣyati
analyzed: tribhiḥ kramaiḥ imān lokān viśva kāyaḥ kramiṣyati

original: BhP_08.19.033/3 sarvasvaṃ viṣṇave dattvā mūḍha vartiṣyase katham
analyzed: sarva svam viṣṇave dattvā mūḍha vartiṣyase katham

original: BhP_08.19.034/1 kramato gāṃ padaikena dvitīyena divaṃ vibhoḥ
analyzed: kramatas gām padā ekena dvitīyena divam vibhoḥ

original: BhP_08.19.034/3 khaṃ ca kāyena mahatā tārtīyasya kuto gatiḥ
analyzed: kham ca kāyena mahatā tārtīyasya kutas gatiḥ

original: BhP_08.19.035/1 niṣṭhāṃ te narake manye hy apradātuḥ pratiśrutam
analyzed: niṣṭhām te narake manye hi apradātuḥ pratiśrutam
pratiśrutasya yaḥ nīśaḥ pratipādayitum bhavān

original: BhP_08.19.036/1 na taddānaṃ praśaṃsanti yena vṛttirvipadyate
analyzed: na tat dānam praśaṃsanti yena vṛttiḥ vipadyate

original: BhP_08.19.036/3 dānaṃ yajñastapaḥ karma loke vṛttimato yataḥ
analyzed: dānam yajñaḥ tapaḥ karma loke vṛttimataḥ yatas

original: BhP_08.19.037/1 dharmāya yaśase 'rthāya kāmāya svajanāya ca
analyzed: dharmāya yaśase rthāya kāmāya sva janāya ca

original: BhP_08.19.037/3 pañcadhā vibhajan vittamihāmutra ca modate
analyzed: pañcadhā vibhajan vittam iha amutra ca modate
atrā api bahvṛcaiḥ gītam śṛṇu me sura sattama

original: BhP_08.19.038/3 satyamomiti yat proktaṃ yan nety āhānṛtaṃ hi tat
analyzed: satyam om iti yat proktam yat na iti āha anṛtam hi tat
satyam puṣpa phalam vidyāt ātma vṛkṣasya gīyate

original: BhP_08.19.039/3 vṛkṣe 'jīvati tan na syādanṛtaṃ mūlamātmanaḥ
analyzed: vṛkṣe jīvati tat na syāt anṛtam mūlam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_08.19.040/1 tadyathā vṛkṣa unmūlaḥ śuṣyaty udvartate 'cirāt
analyzed: tat yathā vṛkṣaḥ unmūlaḥ śuṣyati udvartate cirāt

original: BhP_08.19.040/3 evaṃ naṣṭānṛtaḥ sadya ātmā śuṣyen na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: evam naṣṭa anṛtaḥ sadyas ātmā śuṣyet na saṃśayaḥ

original: BhP_08.19.041/1 parāg riktamapūrṇaṃ vā akṣaraṃ yat tadomiti
analyzed: parāk riktam apūrṇam vai akṣaram yat tat om iti

original: BhP_08.19.041/3 yat kiñcidomiti brūyāt tena ricyeta vai pumān
analyzed: yat kiñcid om iti brūyāt tena ricyeta vai pumān

original: BhP_08.19.041/5 bhikṣave sarvamoṃ kurvan nālaṃ kāmena cātmane
analyzed: bhikṣave sarvam om kurvan na alam kāmena ca ātmane

original: BhP_08.19.042/1 athaitat pūrṇamabhyātmaṃ yac ca nety anṛtaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: atha etat pūrṇam abhyātmam yat ca na iti anṛtam vacaḥ

original: BhP_08.19.042/3 sarvaṃ nety anṛtaṃ brūyāt sa duṣkīrtiḥ śvasan mṛtaḥ
analyzed: sarvam na iti anṛtam brūyāt sa duṣkīrtiḥ śvasan mṛtaḥ

original: BhP_08.19.043/1 strīṣu narmavivāhe ca vṛttyarthe prāṇasaṅkaṭe
analyzed: strīṣu narma vivāhe ca vṛtti arthe prāṇa saṅkaṭe

original: BhP_08.19.043/3 gobrāhmaṇārthe hiṃsāyāṃ nānṛtaṃ syāj jugupsitam
analyzed: go brāhmaṇa arthe hiṃsāyām na anṛtam syāt jugupsitam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
baliḥ evam gṛhapatiḥ kula ācāryeṇa bhāṣitaḥ

original: BhP_08.20.001/3 tūṣṇīṃ bhūtvā kṣaṇaṃ rājannuvācāvahito gurum
analyzed: tūṣṇīm bhūtvā kṣaṇam rājan uvāca avahitaḥ gurum
śrī baliḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.20.002/1 satyaṃ bhagavatā proktaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ gṛhamedhinām
analyzed: satyam bhagavatā proktam dharmaḥ yam gṛhamedhinām

original: BhP_08.20.002/3 arthaṃ kāmaṃ yaśo vṛttiṃ yo na bādheta karhicit
analyzed: artham kāmam yaśaḥ vṛttim yaḥ na bādheta karhicit

original: BhP_08.20.003/1 sa cāhaṃ vittalobhena pratyācakṣe kathaṃ dvijam
analyzed: sa ca aham vitta lobhena pratyācakṣe katham dvijam

original: BhP_08.20.003/3 pratiśrutya dadāmīti prāhrādiḥ kitavo yathā
analyzed: pratiśrutya dadāmi iti prāhrādiḥ kitavaḥ yathā

original: BhP_08.20.004/1 na hy asatyāt paro 'dharma iti hovāca bhūriyam
analyzed: na hi asatyāt paraḥ dharmaḥ iti ha uvāca bhūḥ iyam

original: BhP_08.20.004/3 sarvaṃ soḍhumalaṃ manye ṛte 'līkaparaṃ naram
analyzed: sarvam soḍhum alam manye ṛte līka param naram
na aham bibhemi nirayāt na adhanyāt asukha arṇavāt
na sthāna cyavanāt mṛtyoḥ yathā vipra pralambhanāt
yat yat hāsyati loke smin samparetam dhana ādikam

original: BhP_08.20.006/3 tasya tyāge nimittaṃ kiṃ viprastuṣyen na tena cet
analyzed: tasya tyāge nimittam kim vipraḥ tuṣyet na tena ced

original: BhP_08.20.007/1 śreyaḥ kurvanti bhūtānāṃ sādhavo dustyajāsubhiḥ
analyzed: śreyaḥ kurvanti bhūtānām sādhavaḥ dustyaja asubhiḥ
dadhi aṅ śibi prabhṛtayaḥ kaḥ vikalpaḥ dharā ādiṣu
yaiḥ iyam bubhuje brahman daitya indraiḥ anivartibhiḥ

original: BhP_08.20.008/3 teṣāṃ kālo 'grasīl lokān na yaśo 'dhigataṃ bhuvi
analyzed: teṣām kālaḥ grasīt lokān na yaśaḥ dhigatam bhuvi

original: BhP_08.20.009/1 sulabhā yudhi viprarṣe hy anivṛttāstanutyajaḥ
analyzed: sulabhāḥ yudhi viprarṣe hi anivṛttāḥ tanutyajaḥ

original: BhP_08.20.009/3 na tathā tīrtha āyāte śraddhayā ye dhanatyajaḥ
analyzed: na tathā tīrthe āyāte śraddhayā ye dhanatyajaḥ

original: BhP_08.20.010/1 manasvinaḥ kāruṇikasya śobhanaṃ yadarthikāmopanayena durgatiḥ
analyzed: manasvinaḥ kāruṇikasya śobhanam yat arthi kāma upanayena durgatiḥ

original: BhP_08.20.010/3 kutaḥ punarbrahmavidāṃ bhavādṛśāṃ tato vaṭorasya dadāmi vāñchitam
analyzed: kutas punar brahma vidām bhavādṛśām tatas vaṭoḥ asya dadāmi vāñchitam

original: BhP_08.20.011/1 yajanti yajñaṃ kratubhiryamādṛtā bhavanta āmnāyavidhānakovidāḥ
analyzed: yajanti yajñam kratubhiḥ yam ādṛtāḥ bhavantaḥ āmnāya vidhāna kovidāḥ

original: BhP_08.20.011/3 sa eva viṣṇurvarado 'stu vā paro dāsyāmy amuṣmai kṣitimīpsitāṃ mune
analyzed: saḥ eva viṣṇuḥ vara daḥ stu vā paras dāsyāmi amuṣmai kṣitim īpsitām mune
yadi api asau adharmeṇa mām badhnīyāt anāgasam

original: BhP_08.20.012/3 tathāpy enaṃ na hiṃsiṣye bhītaṃ brahmatanuṃ ripum
analyzed: tathā api enam na hiṃsiṣye bhītam brahma tanum ripum

original: BhP_08.20.013/1 eṣa vā uttamaśloko na jihāsati yadyaśaḥ
analyzed: eṣa vai uttamaślokaḥ na jihāsati yat yaśaḥ

original: BhP_08.20.013/3 hatvā maināṃ haredyuddhe śayīta nihato mayā
analyzed: hatvā mā enām haret yuddhe śayīta nihataḥ mayā
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
evam aśraddhitam śiṣyam anādeśa karam guruḥ
śaśāpa daiva prahitaḥ satya sandham manasvinam

original: BhP_08.20.015/1 dṛḍhaṃ paṇḍitamāny ajñaḥ stabdho 'sy asmadupekṣayā
analyzed: dṛḍham ajñaḥ stabdhaḥ sī asmad upekṣayā
mad śāsana atigaḥ yaḥ tvam acirāt bhraśyase śriyaḥ

original: BhP_08.20.016/1 evaṃ śaptaḥ svaguruṇā satyān na calito mahān
analyzed: evam śaptaḥ sva guruṇā satyāt na calitaḥ mahān
vāmanāya dadau enām arcitvā udaka pūrvakam
vindhyāvaliḥ tadā āgatya patnī jālakamālinī
āninye kalaśam haimam avanejanī apām bhṛtam

original: BhP_08.20.018/1 yajamānaḥ svayaṃ tasya śrīmat pādayugaṃ mudā
analyzed: yajamānaḥ svayam tasya śrīmat pāda yugam mudā
avanijya avahat mūrdhni tad apaḥ viśva pāvanīḥ
tadā asura indram divi devatā gaṇāḥ gandharva vidyādhara siddha cāraṇāḥ

original: BhP_08.20.019/3 tat karma sarve 'pi gṛṇanta ārjavaṃ prasūnavarṣairvavṛṣurmudānvitāḥ
analyzed: tat karma sarve pi gṛṇantaḥ ārjavam prasūna varṣaiḥ vavṛṣuḥ mudā anvitāḥ
neduḥ muhur dundubhayaḥ sahasraśas gandharva kimpūruṣa kinnarāḥ jaguḥ

original: BhP_08.20.020/3 manasvinānena kṛtaṃ suduṣkaraṃ vidvān adādyadripave jagattrayam
analyzed: manasvinā anena kṛtam su duṣkaram vidvān adāt yad ripave jagattrayam
tat vāmanam rūpam avardhata adbhutam hareḥ anantasya guṇa traya ātmakam

original: BhP_08.20.021/3 bhūḥ khaṃ diśo dyaurvivarāḥ payodhayas tiryaṅnṛdevā ṛṣayo yadāsata
analyzed: bhūḥ kham diśaḥ dyauḥ vivarāḥ payodhayaḥ tiryak nṛ devāḥ ṛṣayaḥ yadā āsata

original: BhP_08.20.022/1 kāye balistasya mahāvibhūteḥ sahartvigācāryasadasya etat
analyzed: kāye baliḥ tasya mahā vibhūteḥ saha ṛtvij ācārya sadasyaḥ etat

original: BhP_08.20.022/3 dadarśa viśvaṃ triguṇaṃ guṇātmake bhūtendriyārthāśayajīvayuktam
analyzed: dadarśa viśvam triguṇam guṇa ātmake bhūta indriya artha āśaya jīva yuktam

original: BhP_08.20.023/1 rasāmacaṣṭāṅghritale 'tha pādayor mahīṃ mahīdhrān puruṣasya jaṅghayoḥ
analyzed: pādayoḥ mahīm mahīdhrān puruṣasya jaṅghayoḥ

original: BhP_08.20.023/3 patattriṇo jānuni viśvamūrter ūrvorgaṇaṃ mārutamindrasenaḥ
analyzed: patattriṇaḥ jānuni viśvamūrteḥ ūrvoḥ gaṇam mārutam indrasenaḥ

original: BhP_08.20.024/1 sandhyāṃ vibhorvāsasi guhya aikṣat prajāpatīn jaghane ātmamukhyān
analyzed: sandhyām vibhoḥ vāsasi guhya aikṣat prajāpatīn jaghane ātma mukhyān

original: BhP_08.20.024/3 nābhyāṃ nabhaḥ kukṣiṣu saptasindhūn urukramasyorasi carkṣamālām
analyzed: nābhyām nabhaḥ kukṣiṣu sapta sindhūn urukramasya urasi ca ṛkṣa mālām

original: BhP_08.20.025/1 hṛdy aṅga dharmaṃ stanayormurārer ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ ca manasy athendum
analyzed: hṛdi aṅga dharmam stanayoḥ murāreḥ ṛtam ca satyam ca manasi atha indum

original: BhP_08.20.025/3 śriyaṃ ca vakṣasy aravindahastāṃ kaṇṭhe ca sāmāni samastarephān
analyzed: śriyam ca vakṣasi aravinda hastām kaṇṭhe ca sāmāni samasta rephān

original: BhP_08.20.026/1 indrapradhānān amarān bhujeṣu tatkarṇayoḥ kakubho dyauśca mūrdhni
analyzed: indra pradhānān amarān bhujeṣu tad karṇayoḥ kakubhaḥ dyauḥ ca mūrdhni

original: BhP_08.20.026/3 keśeṣu meghān chvasanaṃ nāsikāyām akṣṇośca sūryaṃ vadane ca vahnim
analyzed: keśeṣu meghān śvasanam nāsikāyām akṣṇoḥ ca sūryam vadane ca vahnim

original: BhP_08.20.027/1 vāṇyāṃ ca chandāṃsi rase jaleśaṃ bhruvorniṣedhaṃ ca vidhiṃ ca pakṣmasu
analyzed: vāṇyām ca chandāṃsi rase jaleśam bhruvoḥ niṣedham ca vidhim ca pakṣmasu

original: BhP_08.20.027/3 ahaśca rātriṃ ca parasya puṃso manyuṃ lalāṭe 'dhara eva lobham
analyzed: ahar ca rātrim ca parasya puṃsaḥ manyum lalāṭe dhare eva lobham

original: BhP_08.20.028/1 sparśe ca kāmaṃ nṛpa retasāmbhaḥ pṛṣṭhe tvadharmaṃ kramaṇeṣu yajñam
analyzed: sparśe ca kāmam nṛpa retasā ambhaḥ pṛṣṭhe tu adharmam kramaṇeṣu yajñam

original: BhP_08.20.028/3 chāyāsu mṛtyuṃ hasite ca māyāṃ tanūruheṣvoṣadhijātayaśca
analyzed: chāyāsu mṛtyum hasite ca māyām tanūruheṣu oṣadhi jātayaḥ ca

original: BhP_08.20.029/1 nadīśca nāḍīṣu śilā nakheṣu buddhāvajaṃ devagaṇān ṛṣīṃśca
analyzed: nadīḥ ca nāḍīṣu śilāḥ nakheṣu buddhau ajam deva gaṇān ṛṣīn ca

original: BhP_08.20.029/3 prāṇeṣu gātre sthirajaṅgamāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni dadarśa vīraḥ
analyzed: prāṇeṣu gātre sthira jaṅgamāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni dadarśa vīraḥ

original: BhP_08.20.030/1 sarvātmanīdaṃ bhuvanaṃ nirīkṣya sarve 'surāḥ kaśmalamāpuraṅga
analyzed: sarvātmani idam bhuvanam nirīkṣya sarve surāḥ kaśmalam āpuḥ aṅga

original: BhP_08.20.030/3 sudarśanaṃ cakramasahyatejo dhanuśca śārṅgaṃ stanayitnughoṣam
analyzed: sudarśanam cakram asahya tejaḥ dhanuḥ ca śārṅgam stanayitnu ghoṣam

original: BhP_08.20.031/1 parjanyaghoṣo jalajaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ kaumodakī viṣṇugadā tarasvinī

analyzed: śata candra yuktaḥ tūṇa uttamau akṣaya sāyakau ca
sunanda mukhyāḥ upatasthuḥ īśam pārṣada mukhyāḥ saha lokapālāḥ
sphurat kirīṭa aṅgada mīna kuṇḍalaḥ śrīvatsa ratna uttama mekhalā ambaraiḥ

original: BhP_08.20.033/1 madhuvratasragvanamālayāvṛto rarāja rājan bhagavān urukramaḥ
analyzed: madhu vrata sraj vanamālayā āvṛtaḥ rarāja rājan bhagavān urukramaḥ

original: BhP_08.20.033/3 kṣitiṃ padaikena balervicakrame nabhaḥ śarīreṇa diśaśca bāhubhiḥ
analyzed: kṣitim padā ekena baleḥ vicakrame nabhaḥ śarīreṇa diśaḥ ca bāhubhiḥ

original: BhP_08.20.034/1 padaṃ dvitīyaṃ kramatastriviṣṭapaṃ na vai tṛtīyāya tadīyamaṇvapi
analyzed: padam dvitīyam kramataḥ triviṣṭapam na vai tṛtīyāya tadīyam aṇu api

original: BhP_08.20.034/3 urukramasyāṅghrirupary upary atho maharjanābhyāṃ tapasaḥ paraṃ gataḥ
analyzed: urukramasya aṅghriḥ upari upari atho mahar janābhyām tapasaḥ param gataḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
satyam samīkṣya abja bhavaḥ nakha indubhiḥ hata sva dhāma dyutiḥ āvṛtaḥ bhyagāt

original: BhP_08.21.001/3 marīcimiśrā ṛṣayo bṛhadvratāḥ sanandanādyā naradeva yoginaḥ
analyzed: marīci miśrāḥ ṛṣayaḥ bṛhat vratāḥ sanandana ādyāḥ naradeva yoginaḥ
veda upavedāḥ niyamāḥ yama anvitāḥ tarka itihāsa aṅga purāṇa saṃhitāḥ

original: BhP_08.21.002/3 ye cāpare yogasamīradīpita jñānāgninā randhitakarmakalmaṣāḥ
analyzed: ye ca apare jñāna agninā randhita karma kalmaṣāḥ

original: BhP_08.21.002/5 vavandire yatsmaraṇānubhāvataḥ svāyambhuvaṃ dhāma gatā akarmakam
analyzed: vavandire yad smaraṇa anubhāvataḥ svāyambhuvam dhāma gatāḥ akarmakam

original: BhP_08.21.003/1 athāṅghraye pronnamitāya viṣṇor upāharat padmabhavo 'rhaṇodakam
analyzed: atha aṅghraye pronnamitāya viṣṇoḥ upāharat padma bhavaḥ rhaṇa udakam

original: BhP_08.21.003/3 samarcya bhaktyābhyagṛṇāc chuciśravā yannābhipaṅkeruhasambhavaḥ svayam
analyzed: samarcya bhaktyā abhyagṛṇāt śuciśravāḥ yad nābhi paṅkeruha sambhavaḥ svayam

original: BhP_08.21.004/1 dhātuḥ kamaṇḍalujalaṃ tadurukramasya pādāvanejanapavitratayā narendra
analyzed: dhātuḥ kamaṇḍalu jalam tat urukramasya pāda avanejana pavitra tayā narendra

original: BhP_08.21.004/3 svardhuny abhūn nabhasi sā patatī nimārṣṭi lokatrayaṃ bhagavato viśadeva kīrtiḥ
analyzed: svardhunī abhūt nabhasi sā patatī nimārṣṭi lokatrayam bhagavataḥ viśadā iva kīrtiḥ
brahma ādayaḥ loka nāthāḥ sva nāthāya samādṛtāḥ
sa anugāḥ balim ājahruḥ saṅkṣipta ātma vibhūtaye
toyaiḥ samarhaṇaiḥ sragbhiḥ divya gandha anulepanaiḥ
dhūpaiḥ dīpaiḥ surabhibhiḥ lāja akṣata phala aṅkuraiḥ
stavanaiḥ jaya śabdaiḥ ca tad vīrya mahima aṅkitaiḥ
nṛtya vāditra gītaiḥ ca śaṅkha dundubhi niḥsvanaiḥ
jāmbavān ṛkṣa rājaḥ tu bherī śabdaiḥ manojavaḥ
vijayam dikṣu sarvāsu mahā utsavam aghoṣayat

original: BhP_08.21.009/1 mahīṃ sarvāṃ hṛtāṃ dṛṣṭvā tripadavyājayācñayā
analyzed: mahīm sarvām hṛtām dṛṣṭvā tripada vyāja yācñayā
ūcuḥ sva bhartuḥ asurāḥ dīkṣitasya ati amarṣitāḥ
na vā ayam brahmabandhuḥ viṣṇuḥ māyāvinām varaḥ
dvija rūpa praticchannaḥ deva kāryam cikīrṣati
anena yācamānena śatruṇā vaṭu rūpiṇā

original: BhP_08.21.011/3 sarvasvaṃ no hṛtaṃ bharturnyastadaṇḍasya barhiṣi
analyzed: sarva svam naḥ hṛtam bhartuḥ nyasta daṇḍasya barhiṣi
satya vratasya satatam dīkṣitasya viśeṣataḥ

original: BhP_08.21.012/3 nānṛtaṃ bhāṣituṃ śakyaṃ brahmaṇyasya dayāvataḥ
analyzed: na anṛtam bhāṣitum śakyam brahmaṇyasya dayāvataḥ

original: BhP_08.21.013/1 tasmādasya vadho dharmo bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ ca naḥ
analyzed: tasmāt asya vadhaḥ dharmaḥ bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇam ca naḥ
iti āyudhāni jagṛhuḥ baleḥ anucara asurāḥ

original: BhP_08.21.014/1 te sarve vāmanaṃ hantuṃ śūlapaṭṭiśapāṇayaḥ
analyzed: te sarve vāmanam hantum śūla paṭṭiśa pāṇayaḥ

original: BhP_08.21.014/3 anicchanto bale rājan prādravan jātamanyavaḥ
analyzed: an icchantaḥ bale rājan prādravan jāta manyavaḥ

original: BhP_08.21.015/1 tān abhidravato dṛṣṭvā ditijānīkapān nṛpa
analyzed: tān abhidravataḥ dṛṣṭvā ditija anīka pān nṛpa
prahasya anucarāḥ viṣṇoḥ pratyaṣedhan udāyudhāḥ

original: BhP_08.21.016/1 nandaḥ sunando 'tha jayo vijayaḥ prabalo balaḥ
analyzed: nandaḥ sunandaḥ jayaḥ vijayaḥ prabalaḥ balaḥ
kumudaḥ kumudākṣaḥ ca viṣvaksenaḥ patattrirāj
jayantaḥ śrutadevaḥ ca sātvataḥ
sarve nāga ayuta prāṇāḥ camūm te jaghnuḥ āsurīm
hanyamānān svakān dṛṣṭvā puruṣa anucaraiḥ baliḥ
vārayāmāsa saṃrabdhān kāvya śāpam anusmaran

original: BhP_08.21.019/1 he vipracitte he rāho he neme śrūyatāṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: he vipracitte he rāho he neme śrūyatām vacaḥ

original: BhP_08.21.019/3 mā yudhyata nivartadhvaṃ na naḥ kālo 'yamarthakṛt
analyzed: mā yudhyata nivartadhvam na naḥ kālaḥ yam artha kṛt
yaḥ prabhuḥ sarva bhūtānām sukha duḥkha upapattaye

original: BhP_08.21.020/3 taṃ nātivartituṃ daityāḥ pauruṣairīśvaraḥ pumān
analyzed: tam na ativartitum daityāḥ pauruṣaiḥ īśvaraḥ pumān

original: BhP_08.21.021/1 yo no bhavāya prāg āsīdabhavāya divaukasām
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ bhavāya prāk āsīt abhavāya divaukasām

original: BhP_08.21.021/3 sa eva bhagavān adya vartate tadviparyayam
analyzed: saḥ eva bhagavān adya vartate tad viparyayam
balena sacivaiḥ buddhyā durgaiḥ mantra auṣadha ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_08.21.022/3 sāmādibhirupāyaiśca kālaṃ nātyeti vai janaḥ
analyzed: sāma ādibhiḥ upāyaiḥ ca kālam na atyeti vai janaḥ

original: BhP_08.21.023/1 bhavadbhirnirjitā hy ete bahuśo 'nucarā hareḥ
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ nirjitāḥ hi ete bahuśas nucarāḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_08.21.023/3 daivenarddhaista evādya yudhi jitvā nadanti naḥ
analyzed: daivena ṛddhaiḥ te evā adya yudhi jitvā nadanti naḥ

original: BhP_08.21.024/1 etān vayaṃ vijeṣyāmo yadi daivaṃ prasīdati
analyzed: etān vayam vijeṣyāmaḥ yadi daivam prasīdati

original: BhP_08.21.024/3 tasmāt kālaṃ pratīkṣadhvaṃ yo no 'rthatvāya kalpate
analyzed: tasmāt kālam pratīkṣadhvam yaḥ naḥ ṛtha tvāya kalpate
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
patyuḥ nigaditam śrutvā daitya dānava yūthapāḥ

original: BhP_08.21.025/3 rasāṃ nirviviśū rājan viṣṇupārṣada tāḍitāḥ
analyzed: rasām nirviviśuḥ rājan viṣṇu pārṣada tāḍitāḥ

original: BhP_08.21.026/1 atha tārkṣyasuto jñātvā virāṭ prabhucikīrṣitam
analyzed: atha tārkṣya sutaḥ jñātvā virāj prabhu cikīrṣitam

original: BhP_08.21.026/3 babandha vāruṇaiḥ pāśairbaliṃ sūtye 'hani kratau
analyzed: babandha vāruṇaiḥ pāśaiḥ balim sūtye hani kratau

original: BhP_08.21.027/1 hāhākāro mahān āsīdrodasyoḥ sarvato diśam
analyzed: hāhākāraḥ mahān āsīt rodasyoḥ sarvatas diśam
nigṛhyamāṇe surapatau viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā

original: BhP_08.21.028/1 taṃ baddhaṃ vāruṇaiḥ pāśairbhagavān āha vāmanaḥ
analyzed: tam baddham vāruṇaiḥ pāśaiḥ bhagavān āha vāmanaḥ
naṣṭa śriyam sthira prajñam udāra yaśasam nṛpa

original: BhP_08.21.029/1 padāni trīṇi dattāni bhūmermahyaṃ tvayāsura
analyzed: padāni trīṇi dattāni bhūmeḥ mahyam tvayā asura

original: BhP_08.21.029/3 dvābhyāṃ krāntā mahī sarvā tṛtīyamupakalpaya
analyzed: dvābhyām krāntā mahī sarvā tṛtīyam upakalpaya

original: BhP_08.21.030/1 yāvat tapaty asau gobhiryāvadinduḥ sahoḍubhiḥ
analyzed: yāvat tapati asau gobhiḥ yāvat induḥ saha uḍubhiḥ
yāvat varṣati parjanyaḥ tāvatī bhūḥ iyam tava

original: BhP_08.21.031/1 padaikena mayākrānto bhūrlokaḥ khaṃ diśastanoḥ
analyzed: pada ekena mayā ākrāntaḥ bhūrlokaḥ kham diśaḥ tanoḥ
svar lokaḥ te dvitīyena paśyataḥ te svam ātmanā
pratiśrutam adātuḥ te niraye vāsaḥ iṣyate

original: BhP_08.21.032/3 viśa tvaṃ nirayaṃ tasmādguruṇā cānumoditaḥ
analyzed: viśa tvam nirayam tasmāt guruṇā ca anumoditaḥ

original: BhP_08.21.033/1 vṛthā manorathastasya dūraḥ svargaḥ pataty adhaḥ
analyzed: vṛthā manorathaḥ tasya dūraḥ svargaḥ patati adhas
pratiśrutasya adānena yaḥ rthinam vipralambhate
vipralabdhaḥ dadāmi iti tvayā aham ca āḍhya māninā

original: BhP_08.21.034/3 tadvyalīkaphalaṃ bhuṅkṣva nirayaṃ katicit samāḥ
analyzed: tad vyalīka phalam bhuṅkṣva nirayam katicid samāḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
evam viprakṛtaḥ rājan baliḥ bhagavatā asuraḥ
bhidyamānaḥ pi abhinna ātmā pratyāha aviklavam vacaḥ
śrī baliḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.22.002/1 yady uttamaśloka bhavān mameritaṃ vaco vyalīkaṃ suravarya manyate
analyzed: yadi uttamaśloka bhavān mama īritam vacaḥ vyalīkam sura varya manyate

original: BhP_08.22.002/3 karomy ṛtaṃ tan na bhavet pralambhanaṃ padaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kuru śīrṣṇi me nijam
analyzed: karomi ṛtam tat na bhavet pralambhanam padam tṛtīyam kuru śīrṣṇi me nijam

original: BhP_08.22.003/1 bibhemi nāhaṃ nirayāt padacyuto na pāśabandhādvyasanādduratyayāt
analyzed: bibhemi na aham nirayāt pada cyutaḥ na pāśa bandhāt vyasanāt duratyayāt
na eva artha kṛcchrāt bhavataḥ vinigrahāt asādhuvādāt bhṛśam udvije yathā
puṃsām ślāghyatamam manye daṇḍam arhattama arpitam

original: BhP_08.22.004/3 yaṃ na mātā pitā bhrātā suhṛdaścādiśanti hi
analyzed: yam na mātā pitā bhrātā suhṛdaḥ ca ādiśanti hi

original: BhP_08.22.005/1 tvaṃ nūnamasurāṇāṃ naḥ parokṣaḥ paramo guruḥ
analyzed: tvam nūnam asurāṇām naḥ parokṣaḥ paramaḥ guruḥ
yaḥ naḥ na eka mada andhānām vibhraṃśam cakṣuḥ ādiśat
yasmin vaira anubandhena vyūḍhena vibudha itarāḥ

original: BhP_08.22.006/3 bahavo lebhire siddhiṃ yāmu haikāntayoginaḥ
analyzed: bahavaḥ lebhire siddhim ha ekānta yoginaḥ
tena aham nigṛhītaḥ smi bhavatā bhūri karmaṇā

original: BhP_08.22.007/3 baddhaśca vāruṇaiḥ pāśairnātivrīḍe na ca vyathe
analyzed: baddhaḥ ca vāruṇaiḥ pāśaiḥ na ati vrīḍe na ca vyathe

original: BhP_08.22.008/1 pitāmaho me bhavadīyasammataḥ prahrāda āviṣkṛtasādhuvādaḥ
analyzed: pitāmahaḥ me bhavadīya sammataḥ prahrādaḥ āviṣkṛta sādhuvādaḥ

original: BhP_08.22.008/3 bhavadvipakṣeṇa vicitravaiśasaṃ samprāpitastvaṃ paramaḥ svapitrā
analyzed: bhavat vipakṣeṇa vicitra vaiśasam samprāpitaḥ tvam paramaḥ sva pitrā

original: BhP_08.22.009/1 kimātmanānena jahāti yo 'ntataḥ kiṃ rikthahāraiḥ svajanākhyadasyubhiḥ
analyzed: kim ātmanā anena jahāti yaḥ kim rikthahāraiḥ sva jana ākhya dasyubhiḥ

original: BhP_08.22.009/3 kiṃ jāyayā saṃsṛtihetubhūtayā martyasya gehaiḥ kimihāyuṣo vyayaḥ
analyzed: kim jāyayā saṃsṛti hetu bhūtayā martyasya gehaiḥ kim iha āyuṣaḥ vyayaḥ

original: BhP_08.22.010/1 itthaṃ sa niścitya pitāmaho mahān agādhabodho bhavataḥ pādapadmam
analyzed: ittham sa niścitya pitāmahaḥ mahān agādha bodhaḥ bhavataḥ pāda padmam

original: BhP_08.22.010/3 dhruvaṃ prapede hy akutobhayaṃ janād bhītaḥ svapakṣakṣapaṇasya sattama
analyzed: dhruvam prapede hi akutobhayam janāt bhītaḥ sva pakṣa kṣapaṇasya sattama

original: BhP_08.22.011/1 athāhamapy ātmaripostavāntikaṃ daivena nītaḥ prasabhaṃ tyājitaśrīḥ
analyzed: atha aham api ātma ripoḥ tava antikam daivena nītaḥ prasabham tyājita śrīḥ

original: BhP_08.22.011/3 idaṃ kṛtāntāntikavarti jīvitaṃ yayādhruvaṃ stabdhamatirna budhyate
analyzed: idam kṛtānta antika varti jīvitam yayā adhruvam stabdha matiḥ na budhyate
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
tasya ittham bhāṣamāṇasya prahrādaḥ bhagavat priyaḥ
ājagāma kuru śreṣṭha rākāpatiḥ iva utthitaḥ

original: BhP_08.22.013/1 tamindrasenaḥ svapitāmahaṃ śriyā virājamānaṃ nalināyatekṣaṇam
analyzed: tam indrasenaḥ sva pitāmaham śriyā virājamānam nalina āyata īkṣaṇam
prāṃśum piśaṅga ambaram añjana tviṣam pralamba bāhum śubhaga ṛṣabham aikṣata

original: BhP_08.22.014/1 tasmai balirvāruṇapāśayantritaḥ samarhaṇaṃ nopajahāra pūrvavat
analyzed: tasmai baliḥ vāruṇa pāśa yantritaḥ samarhaṇam na upajahāra pūrvavat

original: BhP_08.22.014/3 nanāma mūrdhnāśruvilolalocanaḥ savrīḍanīcīnamukho babhūva ha
analyzed: nanāma mūrdhnā aśru vilola locanaḥ sa vrīḍa anīcīna mukhaḥ babhūva ha

original: BhP_08.22.015/1 sa tatra hāsīnamudīkṣya satpatiṃ hariṃ sunandādyanugairupāsitam
analyzed: sa tatra ha āsīnam udīkṣya sat patim harim sunanda ādi anugaiḥ upāsitam

original: BhP_08.22.015/3 upetya bhūmau śirasā mahāmanā nanāma mūrdhnā pulakāśruviklavaḥ
analyzed: upetya bhūmau śirasā mahāmanāḥ nanāma mūrdhnā pulaka aśru viklavaḥ
śrī prahrādaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.22.016/1 tvayaiva dattaṃ padamaindramūrjitaṃ hṛtaṃ tadevādya tathaiva śobhanam
analyzed: tvayā eva dattam padam aindram ūrjitam hṛtam tat eva adya tathā eva śobhanam

original: BhP_08.22.016/3 manye mahān asya kṛto hy anugraho vibhraṃśito yac chriya ātmamohanāt
analyzed: manye mahān asya kṛtaḥ hi anugrahaḥ vibhraṃśitaḥ yat śriyaḥ ātma mohanāt

original: BhP_08.22.017/1 yayā hi vidvān api muhyate yatas tat ko vicaṣṭe gatimātmano yathā
analyzed: yayā hi vidvān api muhyate yatas tat kaḥ vicaṣṭe gatim ātmanaḥ yathā

original: BhP_08.22.017/3 tasmai namaste jagadīśvarāya vai nārāyaṇāyākhilalokasākṣiṇe
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ te jagat īśvarāya vai nārāyaṇāya akhila loka sākṣiṇe
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
tasya anuśṛṇvataḥ rājan prahrādasya kṛta añjaleḥ
hiraṇyagarbhaḥ bhagavān uvāca madhusūdanam

original: BhP_08.22.019/1 baddhaṃ vīkṣya patiṃ sādhvī tatpatnī bhayavihvalā
analyzed: baddham vīkṣya patim sādhvī tad patnī bhaya vihvalā
prāñjaliḥ praṇatā upendram babhāṣe vāc mukhī nṛpa
uvāca

original: BhP_08.22.020/1 krīḍārthamātmana idaṃ trijagat kṛtaṃ te svāmyaṃ tu tatra kudhiyo 'para īśa kuryuḥ
analyzed: krīḍā artham ātmanaḥ idam trijagat kṛtam te svāmyam tu tatra pare īśa kuryuḥ

original: BhP_08.22.020/3 kartuḥ prabhostava kimasyata āvahanti tyaktahriyastvadavaropitakartṛvādāḥ
analyzed: kartuḥ prabhoḥ tava kim asyataḥ āvahanti tyakta hriyaḥ tvad avaropita kartṛ vādāḥ
śrī brahmā uvāca
bhūtabhāvana bhūteśa devadeva jagat maya
muñca enam hṛta sarvasvam na ayam arhati nigraham

original: BhP_08.22.022/1 kṛtsnā te 'nena dattā bhūrlokāḥ karmārjitāśca ye
analyzed: kṛtsnā te nena dattāḥ bhūḥ lokāḥ karma arjitāḥ ca ye
niveditam ca sarva svam ātma aviklavayā dhiyā
yat pādayoḥ aśaṭha dhīḥ salilam pradāya
dūrvā aṅkuraiḥ api vidhāya satīm saparyām

original: BhP_08.22.023/3 apy uttamāṃ gatimasau bhajate trilokīṃ
analyzed: api uttamām gatim asau bhajate trilokīm
dāśvān aviklava manāḥ katham ārtim ṛcchet
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_08.22.024/1 brahman yamanugṛhṇāmi tadviśo vidhunomy aham
analyzed: brahman yam anugṛhṇāmi tat viśaḥ vidhunomi aham

original: BhP_08.22.024/3 yanmadaḥ puruṣaḥ stabdho lokaṃ māṃ cāvamanyate
analyzed: yat madaḥ puruṣaḥ stabdhaḥ lokam mām ca avamanyate

original: BhP_08.22.025/1 yadā kadācij jīvātmā saṃsaran nijakarmabhiḥ
analyzed: yadā kadācid jīvātmā saṃsaran nija karmabhiḥ
nānā yoniṣu anīśaḥ yam pauruṣīm gatim āvrajet
janma karma vayaḥ rūpa vidyā aiśvarya dhana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_08.22.026/3 yady asya na bhavet stambhastatrāyaṃ madanugrahaḥ
analyzed: yadi asya na bhavet stambhaḥ tatra ayam mad anugrahaḥ
māna stambha nimittānām janma ādīnām samantataḥ

original: BhP_08.22.027/3 sarvaśreyaḥpratīpānāṃ hanta muhyen na matparaḥ
analyzed: sarva śreyaḥ pratīpānām hanta muhyet na mad paraḥ
eṣa dānava daityānām agra nīḥ kīrti vardhanaḥ

original: BhP_08.22.028/3 ajaiṣīdajayāṃ māyāṃ sīdannapi na muhyati
analyzed: ajaiṣīt ajayām māyām sīdan api na muhyati

original: BhP_08.22.029/1 kṣīṇarikthaścyutaḥ sthānāt kṣipto baddhaśca śatrubhiḥ
analyzed: kṣīṇa rikthaḥ cyutaḥ sthānāt kṣiptaḥ baddhaḥ ca śatrubhiḥ
jñātibhiḥ ca parityaktaḥ yātanām anuyāpitaḥ

original: BhP_08.22.030/1 guruṇā bhartsitaḥ śapto jahau satyaṃ na suvrataḥ
analyzed: guruṇā bhartsitaḥ śaptaḥ jahau satyam na suvrataḥ

original: BhP_08.22.030/3 chalairukto mayā dharmo nāyaṃ tyajati satyavāk
analyzed: chalaiḥ uktaḥ mayā dharmaḥ na ayam tyajati satya vāc

original: BhP_08.22.031/1 eṣa me prāpitaḥ sthānaṃ duṣprāpamamarairapi
analyzed: eṣa me prāpitaḥ sthānam duṣprāpam amaraiḥ api
sāvarṇeḥ antarasya ayam bhavitā indraḥ mad āśrayaḥ
tāvat su talam adhyāstām viśvakarma vinirmitam
yadā ādhayaḥ vyādhayaḥ ca klamaḥ tandrā parābhavaḥ
na upasargāḥ nivasatām sambhavanti mama īkṣayā

original: BhP_08.22.033/1 indrasena mahārāja yāhi bho bhadramastu te
analyzed: indrasena mahā rāja yāhi bho bhadram astu te

original: BhP_08.22.033/3 sutalaṃ svargibhiḥ prārthyaṃ jñātibhiḥ parivāritaḥ
analyzed: sutalam svargibhiḥ prārthyam jñātibhiḥ parivāritaḥ
na tvām abhibhaviṣyanti lokeśāḥ kim uta apare
tvad śāsana atigān daityān cakram me sūdayiṣyati

original: BhP_08.22.035/1 rakṣiṣye sarvato 'haṃ tvāṃ sānugaṃ saparicchadam
analyzed: rakṣiṣye sarvatas ham tvām sa anugam sa paricchadam

original: BhP_08.22.035/3 sadā sannihitaṃ vīra tatra māṃ drakṣyate bhavān
analyzed: sadā sannihitam vīra tatra mām drakṣyate bhavān

original: BhP_08.22.036/1 tatra dānavadaityānāṃ saṅgāt te bhāva āsuraḥ
analyzed: tatra dānava daityānām saṅgāt te bhāvaḥ āsuraḥ

original: BhP_08.22.036/3 dṛṣṭvā madanubhāvaṃ vai sadyaḥ kuṇṭho vinaṅkṣyati
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā mad anubhāvam vai sadyas kuṇṭhaḥ vinaṅkṣyati
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.23.001/1 ity uktavantaṃ puruṣaṃ purātanaṃ mahānubhāvo 'khilasādhusammataḥ
analyzed: iti uktavantam puruṣam purātanam mahā anubhāvaḥ khila sādhu sammataḥ
baddhāñjaliḥ bāṣpa kalā ākula īkṣaṇaḥ bhakti utkalaḥ gadgadayā girā bravīt
śrī baliḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.23.002/1 aho praṇāmāya kṛtaḥ samudyamaḥ prapannabhaktārthavidhau samāhitaḥ
analyzed: aho praṇāmāya kṛtaḥ samudyamaḥ prapanna bhakta artha vidhau samāhitaḥ
yat lokapālaiḥ tvad anugrahaḥ maraiḥ a labdha pūrvaḥ upasade sure rpitaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.23.003/1 ity uktvā harimānatya brahmāṇaṃ sabhavaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā harim ānatya brahmāṇam sa bhavam tatas

original: BhP_08.23.003/3 viveśa sutalaṃ prīto balirmuktaḥ sahāsuraiḥ
analyzed: viveśa su talam prītaḥ baliḥ muktaḥ saha asuraiḥ
evam indrāya bhagavān pratyānīya triviṣṭapam
pūrayitvā aditeḥ kāmam aśāsat sakalam jagat

original: BhP_08.23.005/1 labdhaprasādaṃ nirmuktaṃ pautraṃ vaṃśadharaṃ balim
analyzed: labdha prasādam nirmuktam pautram vaṃśa dharam balim
niśāmya bhakti pravaṇaḥ prahrādaḥ idam abravīt
śrī prahrādaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.23.006/1 nemaṃ viriñco labhate prasādaṃ na śrīrna śarvaḥ kimutāpare 'nye
analyzed: na imam viriñcaḥ labhate prasādam na śrīḥ na śarvaḥ kim uta apare nye
yat naḥ surāṇām asi durga pālaḥ viśva abhivandyaiḥ abhivandita aṅghriḥ
yat pāda padma makaranda niṣevaṇena
brahma ādayaḥ śaraṇa dāḥ aśnuvate vibhūtīḥ
kasmāt vayam kusṛtayaḥ khala yonayaḥ te
dākṣiṇya dṛṣṭi padavīm bhavataḥ praṇītāḥ
citram tava īhitam aho mita yoga māyā
līlā visṛṣṭa bhuvanasya viśāradasya
sarva ātmanaḥ samadṛśaḥ viṣamaḥ
bhakta priyaḥ yat asi kalpataru svabhāvaḥ
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_08.23.009/1 vatsa prahrāda bhadraṃ te prayāhi sutalālayam
analyzed: vatsa prahrāda bhadram te prayāhi suta lālayam
modamānaḥ sva pautreṇa jñātīnām sukham āvaha

original: BhP_08.23.010/1 nityaṃ draṣṭāsi māṃ tatra gadāpāṇimavasthitam
analyzed: nityam draṣṭāsi mām tatra gadā pāṇim avasthitam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.23.011/1 ājñāṃ bhagavato rājan prahrādo balinā saha
analyzed: ājñām bhagavataḥ rājan prahrādaḥ balinā saha

original: BhP_08.23.011/3 bāḍhamity amalaprajño mūrdhny ādhāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: bāḍham iti amala prajñaḥ mūrdhni ādhāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
parikramya ādipuruṣam sarva asura camū patiḥ
praṇataḥ tad anujñātaḥ praviveśa mahā bilam
atha āha uśanasam rājan hariḥ nārāyaṇaḥ ntike
āsīnam ṛtvijām madhye sadasi brahma vādinām

original: BhP_08.23.014/1 brahman santanu śiṣyasya karmacchidraṃ vitanvataḥ
analyzed: brahman santanu śiṣyasya karma chidram vitanvataḥ

original: BhP_08.23.014/3 yat tat karmasu vaiṣamyaṃ brahmadṛṣṭaṃ samaṃ bhavet
analyzed: yat tat karmasu vaiṣamyam brahma dṛṣṭam samam bhavet
uvāca
kutas tad karma vaiṣamyam yasya karma īśvaraḥ bhavān
mantrataḥ tantrataḥ chidram deśa kāla arha vastutaḥ
sarvam karoti niśchidram anusaṅkīrtanam tava

original: BhP_08.23.017/1 tathāpi vadato bhūman kariṣyāmy anuśāsanam
analyzed: tathā api vadataḥ bhūman kariṣyāmi anuśāsanam

original: BhP_08.23.017/3 etac chreyaḥ paraṃ puṃsāṃ yat tavājñānupālanam
analyzed: etat śreyaḥ param puṃsām yat tava ajñā anupālanam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
pratinandya hareḥ ājñām uśanāḥ bhagavān iti
yajña chidram samādhatta baleḥ viprarṣibhiḥ saha

original: BhP_08.23.019/1 evaṃ balermahīṃ rājan bhikṣitvā vāmano hariḥ
analyzed: evam baleḥ mahīm rājan bhikṣitvā vāmanaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_08.23.019/3 dadau bhrātre mahendrāya tridivaṃ yat parairhṛtam
analyzed: dadau bhrātre mahā indrāya tridivam yat paraiḥ hṛtam
prajāpati patiḥ brahmā deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūmipaiḥ
dakṣa bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ mukhyaiḥ kumāreṇa bhavena ca
kaśyapasya aditeḥ prītyai sarva bhūta bhavāya ca
lokānām lokapālānām akarot vāmanam patim

original: BhP_08.23.022/1 vedānāṃ sarvadevānāṃ dharmasya yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ
analyzed: vedānām sarva devānām dharmasya yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ

original: BhP_08.23.022/3 maṅgalānāṃ vratānāṃ ca kalpaṃ svargāpavargayoḥ
analyzed: maṅgalānām vratānām ca kalpam svarga apavargayoḥ

original: BhP_08.23.023/1 upendraṃ kalpayāṃ cakre patiṃ sarvavibhūtaye
analyzed: upendram cakre patim sarva vibhūtaye

original: BhP_08.23.023/3 tadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhṛśaṃ mumudire nṛpa
analyzed: tadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhṛśam mumudire nṛpa
tatas tu indraḥ puraskṛtya deva yānena vāmanam
lokapālaiḥ divam ninye brahmaṇā ca anumoditaḥ
prāpya tribhuvanam ca indraḥ upendra bhuja pālitaḥ

original: BhP_08.23.025/3 śriyā paramayā juṣṭo mumude gatasādhvasaḥ
analyzed: śriyā paramayā juṣṭaḥ mumude gata sādhvasaḥ

original: BhP_08.23.026/1 brahmā śarvaḥ kumāraśca bhṛgvādyā munayo nṛpa
analyzed: brahmā śarvaḥ kumāraḥ ca bhṛgu ādyāḥ munayaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_08.23.026/3 pitaraḥ sarvabhūtāni siddhā vaimānikāśca ye
analyzed: pitaraḥ sarva bhūtāni siddhāḥ vaimānikāḥ ca ye
su mahat karma tat viṣṇoḥ gāyantaḥ param adbhutam

original: BhP_08.23.027/3 dhiṣṇyāni svāni te jagmuraditiṃ ca śaśaṃsire
analyzed: dhiṣṇyāni svāni te jagmuḥ aditim ca śaśaṃsire
sarvam etat mayā ākhyātam bhavataḥ kula nandana
urukramasya caritam śrotṝṇām agha mocanam
pāram mahimnaḥ uru vikramataḥ gṛṇānaḥ

original: BhP_08.23.029/2 yaḥ pārthivāni vimame sa rajāṃsi martyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ pārthivāni vimame sa rajāṃsi martyaḥ

original: BhP_08.23.029/3 kiṃ jāyamāna uta jāta upaiti martya
analyzed: kim jāyamānaḥ uta jātaḥ upaiti martya

original: BhP_08.23.029/4 ity āha mantradṛg ṛṣiḥ puruṣasya yasya
analyzed: iti āha mantra dṛś ṛṣiḥ puruṣasya yasya
yaḥ idam devadevasya hareḥ adbhuta karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_08.23.030/3 avatārānucaritaṃ śṛṇvan yāti parāṃ gatim
analyzed: avatāra anucaritam śṛṇvan yāti parām gatim

original: BhP_08.23.031/1 kriyamāṇe karmaṇīdaṃ daive pitrye 'tha mānuṣe
analyzed: kriyamāṇe karmaṇi idam daive pitrye tha mānuṣe

original: BhP_08.23.031/3 yatra yatrānukīrtyeta tat teṣāṃ sukṛtaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: yatra yatra anukīrtyeta tat teṣām sukṛtam viduḥ
śrī rājā uvāca
bhagavan śrotum icchāmi hareḥ adbhuta karmaṇaḥ
avatāra kathām ādyām māyā matsya viḍambanam
yad artham adadhāt rūpam mātsyam loka jugupsitam
tamaḥ prakṛti durmarṣam karma grastaḥ iva īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_08.24.003/1 etan no bhagavan sarvaṃ yathāvadvaktumarhasi
analyzed: etat naḥ bhagavan sarvam yathāvat vaktum arhasi
śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.24.004/1 ity ukto viṣṇurātena bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ viṣṇurātena bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ

original: BhP_08.24.004/3 uvāca caritaṃ viṣṇormatsyarūpeṇa yat kṛtam
analyzed: uvāca caritam viṣṇoḥ matsya rūpeṇa yat kṛtam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca
go vipra sura sādhūnām chandasām api ca īśvaraḥ
rakṣām icchan tanūḥ dhatte dharmasya arthasya ca eva hi
uccāvaceṣu bhūteṣu caran vāyuḥ iva īśvaraḥ
na uccāvaca tvam bhajate nirguṇa tvāt dhiyaḥ guṇaiḥ
āsīt atīta kalpa ante brāhmaḥ naimittikaḥ layaḥ
samudra upaplutāḥ tatra lokāḥ bhūḥ ādayaḥ nṛpa
kālena āgata nidrasya dhātuḥ śiśayiṣoḥ balī
mukhataḥ niḥsṛtān vedān hayagrīvaḥ ntike harat
jñātvā tat dānava indrasya hayagrīvasya ceṣṭitam
dadhāra śapharī rūpam bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_08.24.010/1 tatra rājaṛṣiḥ kaścin nāmnā satyavrato mahān
analyzed: tatra rāja ṛṣiḥ kaścid nāmnā satyavrataḥ mahān
tapat tapaḥ sa salila aśanaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.011/1 yo 'sāvasmin mahākalpe tanayaḥ sa vivasvataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sau asmin mahā kalpe tanayaḥ sa vivasvataḥ

original: BhP_08.24.011/3 śrāddhadeva iti khyāto manutve hariṇārpitaḥ
analyzed: śrāddhadevaḥ iti khyātaḥ manu tve hariṇā arpitaḥ
ekadā kṛtamālāyām kurvataḥ jala tarpaṇam
tasya añjali udake kācid śapharī ekā abhyapadyata
satyavrataḥ ñjali gatām saha toyena bhārata
utsasarja nadī toye śapharīm draviḍa īśvaraḥ
tam āha sā ati karuṇam mahā kāruṇikam nṛpam

original: BhP_08.24.014/3 yādobhyo jñātighātibhyo dīnāṃ māṃ dīnavatsala
analyzed: yādobhyaḥ jñāti ghātibhyaḥ dīnām mām dīna vatsala

original: BhP_08.24.014/5 kathaṃ visṛjase rājan bhītāmasmin sarijjale
analyzed: katham visṛjase rājan bhītām asmin sarit jale
tam ātmanaḥ nugraha artham prītyā matsya vapuḥ dharam

original: BhP_08.24.015/3 ajānan rakṣaṇārthāya śapharyāḥ sa mano dadhe
analyzed: a jānan rakṣaṇa arthāya śapharyāḥ sa manaḥ dadhe

original: BhP_08.24.016/1 tasyā dīnataraṃ vākyamāśrutya sa mahīpatiḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ dīnataram vākyam āśrutya sa mahīpatiḥ
kalaśa apsu nidhāya enām dayāluḥ ninye āśramam

original: BhP_08.24.017/1 sā tu tatraikarātreṇa vardhamānā kamaṇḍalau
analyzed: sā tu tatra eka rātreṇa vardhamānā kamaṇḍalau
a labdhvā ātma avakāśam vā idam āha mahīpatim
na aham kamaṇḍalau asmin kṛcchram vastum iha utsahe

original: BhP_08.24.018/3 kalpayaukaḥ suvipulaṃ yatrāhaṃ nivase sukham
analyzed: kalpaya okaḥ su vipulam yatra aham nivase sukham

original: BhP_08.24.019/1 sa enāṃ tata ādāya nyadhādaudañcanodake
analyzed: saḥ enām tatas ādāya nyadhāt audañcana udake
tatra kṣiptā muhūrtena hasta trayam avardhata

original: BhP_08.24.020/1 na ma etadalaṃ rājan sukhaṃ vastumudañcanam
analyzed: na me etat alam rājan sukham vastum udañcanam

original: BhP_08.24.020/3 pṛthu dehi padaṃ mahyaṃ yat tvāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā
analyzed: pṛthu dehi padam mahyam yat tvā aham śaraṇam gatā

original: BhP_08.24.021/1 tata ādāya sā rājñā kṣiptā rājan sarovare
analyzed: tatas ādāya sā rājñā kṣiptā rājan sarovare
tadā āvṛtya ātmanā saḥ yam mahā mīnaḥ nvavardhata

original: BhP_08.24.022/1 naitan me svastaye rājannudakaṃ salilaukasaḥ
analyzed: na etat me svastaye rājan udakam salilaukasaḥ
nidhehi rakṣā yogena hrade mām avidāsini

original: BhP_08.24.023/1 ity uktaḥ so 'nayan matsyaṃ tatra tatrāvidāsini
analyzed: iti uktaḥ saḥ nayan matsyam tatra tatra avidāsini

original: BhP_08.24.023/3 jalāśaye 'sammitaṃ taṃ samudre prākṣipaj jhaṣam
analyzed: jalāśaye sammitam tam samudre prākṣipat jhaṣam
kṣipyamāṇaḥ tam āha idam iha mām makara ādayaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.024/3 adanty atibalā vīra māṃ nehotsraṣṭumarhasi
analyzed: adanti atibalāḥ vīra mām na iha utsraṣṭum arhasi
evam vimohitaḥ tena vadatā valgu bhāratīm

original: BhP_08.24.025/3 tamāha ko bhavān asmān matsyarūpeṇa mohayan
analyzed: tam āha kaḥ bhavān asmān matsya rūpeṇa mohayan

original: BhP_08.24.026/1 naivaṃ vīryo jalacaro dṛṣṭo 'smābhiḥ śruto 'pi vā
analyzed: na evam vīryaḥ jalacaraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ smābhiḥ vā
yaḥ bhavān yojana śata mahnā abhivyānaśe saraḥ
nūnam tvam bhagavān sākṣāt hariḥ nārāyaṇaḥ vyayaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.027/3 anugrahāya bhūtānāṃ dhatse rūpaṃ jalaukasām
analyzed: anugrahāya bhūtānām dhatse rūpam jalaukasām
namaḥ te puruṣa śreṣṭha sthiti utpatti apyaya īśvara

original: BhP_08.24.028/3 bhaktānāṃ naḥ prapannānāṃ mukhyo hy ātmagatirvibho
analyzed: bhaktānām naḥ prapannānām mukhyaḥ hi ātma gatiḥ vibho
sarve līlāvatārāḥ te bhūtānām bhūti hetavaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.029/3 jñātumicchāmy ado rūpaṃ yadarthaṃ bhavatā dhṛtam
analyzed: jñātum icchāmi adaḥ rūpam yad artham bhavatā dhṛtam

original: BhP_08.24.030/1 na te 'ravindākṣa padopasarpaṇaṃ mṛṣā bhavet sarvasuhṛtpriyātmanaḥ
analyzed: na te ravinda akṣa pada upasarpaṇam mṛṣā bhavet sarva suhṛd priya ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.030/3 yathetareṣāṃ pṛthagātmanāṃ satām adīdṛśo yadvapuradbhutaṃ hi naḥ
analyzed: yathā itareṣām pṛthak ātmanām satām adīdṛśaḥ yat vapuḥ adbhutam hi naḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.24.031/1 iti bruvāṇaṃ nṛpatiṃ jagatpatiḥ satyavrataṃ matsyavapuryugakṣaye
analyzed: iti bruvāṇam nṛpatim jagatpatiḥ satyavratam matsya vapuḥ yuga kṣaye
vihartu kāmaḥ pralaya arṇave bravīt cikīrṣuḥ ekānta jana priyaḥ priyam
śrī bhagavān uvāca
saptame hi adyatanāt ūrdhvam ahani etat arindama
nimaṅkṣyati apyaya ambhodhau trailokyam bhūrbhuva ādikam

original: BhP_08.24.033/1 trilokyāṃ līyamānāyāṃ saṃvartāmbhasi vai tadā
analyzed: trilokyām līyamānāyām saṃvarta ambhasi vai tadā

original: BhP_08.24.033/3 upasthāsyati nauḥ kācidviśālā tvāṃ mayeritā
analyzed: upasthāsyati nauḥ kācid viśālā tvām mayā īritā

original: BhP_08.24.034/1 tvaṃ tāvadoṣadhīḥ sarvā bījāny uccāvacāni ca
analyzed: tvam tāvat oṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ bījāni uccāvacāni ca
saptarṣibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarva sattva upabṛṃhitaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.035/1 āruhya bṛhatīṃ nāvaṃ vicariṣyasy aviklavaḥ
analyzed: āruhya bṛhatīm nāvam vicariṣyasi aviklavaḥ
ekārṇave nirāloke ṛṣīṇām eva varcasā

original: BhP_08.24.036/1 dodhūyamānāṃ tāṃ nāvaṃ samīreṇa balīyasā
analyzed: dodhūyamānām tām nāvam samīreṇa balīyasā

original: BhP_08.24.036/3 upasthitasya me śṛṅge nibadhnīhi mahāhinā
analyzed: upasthitasya me śṛṅge nibadhnīhi mahā ahinā
aham tvām ṛṣibhiḥ sārdham saha nāvam udanvati

original: BhP_08.24.037/3 vikarṣan vicariṣyāmi yāvadbrāhmī niśā prabho
analyzed: vikarṣan vicariṣyāmi yāvat brāhmī niśā prabho

original: BhP_08.24.038/1 madīyaṃ mahimānaṃ ca paraṃ brahmeti śabditam
analyzed: madīyam mahimānam ca param brahma iti śabditam

original: BhP_08.24.038/3 vetsyasy anugṛhītaṃ me sampraśnairvivṛtaṃ hṛdi
analyzed: vetsyasi anugṛhītam me sampraśnaiḥ vivṛtam hṛdi
ittham ādiśya rājānam hariḥ antaradhīyata

original: BhP_08.24.039/3 so 'nvavaikṣata taṃ kālaṃ yaṃ hṛṣīkeśa ādiśat
analyzed: saḥ nu avaikṣata tam kālam yam hṛṣīkeśaḥ ādiśat

original: BhP_08.24.040/1 āstīrya darbhān prākkūlān rājarṣiḥ prāgudaṅmukhaḥ
analyzed: āstīrya darbhān prāc kūlān rājarṣiḥ prāc udak mukhaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.040/3 niṣasāda hareḥ pādau cintayan matsyarūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: niṣasāda hareḥ pādau cintayan matsya rūpiṇaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.041/1 tataḥ samudra udvelaḥ sarvataḥ plāvayan mahīm
analyzed: tatas samudraḥ udvelaḥ sarvatas plāvayan mahīm
vardhamānaḥ mahā meghaiḥ varṣadbhiḥ samadṛśyata
dhyāyan bhagavat ādeśam dadṛśe nāvam āgatām
tām āruroha vipra indraiḥ ādāya oṣadhi vīrudhaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.043/1 tamūcurmunayaḥ prītā rājan dhyāyasva keśavam
analyzed: tam ūcuḥ munayaḥ prītāḥ rājan dhyāyasva keśavam

original: BhP_08.24.043/3 sa vai naḥ saṅkaṭādasmādavitā śaṃ vidhāsyati
analyzed: sa vai naḥ saṅkaṭāt asmāt avitā śam vidhāsyati
saḥ nu dhyātaḥ tatas rājñā prādurāsīt mahā arṇave
eka śṛṅga dharaḥ matsyaḥ haimaḥ niyuta yojanaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.045/1 nibadhya nāvaṃ tacchṛṅge yathokto hariṇā purā
analyzed: nibadhya nāvam tad śṛṅge yathā uktaḥ hariṇā purā
varatreṇa ahinā tuṣṭaḥ tuṣṭāva madhusūdanam
śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_08.24.046/3 yadṛcchayopasṛtā yamāpnuyur vimuktido naḥ paramo gururbhavān
analyzed: yadṛcchayā upasṛtāḥ yam āpnuyuḥ vimukti daḥ naḥ paramaḥ guruḥ bhavān

original: BhP_08.24.047/1 jano 'budho 'yaṃ nijakarmabandhanaḥ sukhecchayā karma samīhate 'sukham
analyzed: janaḥ budhaḥ yam nija karma bandhanaḥ sukha icchayā karma samīhate sukham

original: BhP_08.24.047/3 yatsevayā tāṃ vidhunoty asanmatiṃ granthiṃ sa bhindyāddhṛdayaṃ sa no guruḥ
analyzed: yad sevayā tām vidhunoti asat matim granthim sa bhindyāt hṛdayam sa naḥ guruḥ

original: BhP_08.24.048/1 yatsevayāgneriva rudrarodanaṃ pumān vijahyān malamātmanastamaḥ
analyzed: yad sevayā agneḥ iva rudra rodanam pumān vijahyāt malam ātmanaḥ tamaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.048/3 bhajeta varṇaṃ nijameṣa so 'vyayo bhūyāt sa īśaḥ paramo gurorguruḥ
analyzed: bhajeta varṇam nijam eṣa saḥ vyayaḥ bhūyāt saḥ īśaḥ paramaḥ guroḥ guruḥ

original: BhP_08.24.049/1 na yatprasādāyutabhāgaleśam anye ca devā guravo janāḥ svayam
analyzed: na yad prasāda ayuta bhāga leśam anye ca devāḥ guravaḥ janāḥ svayam

original: BhP_08.24.049/3 kartuṃ sametāḥ prabhavanti puṃsas tamīśvaraṃ tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye
analyzed: kartum sametāḥ prabhavanti puṃsaḥ tam īśvaram tvām śaraṇam prapadye

original: BhP_08.24.050/1 acakṣurandhasya yathāgraṇīḥ kṛtas tathā janasyāviduṣo 'budho guruḥ
analyzed: a cakṣuḥ andhasya yathā agraṇīḥ kṛtaḥ tathā janasya a viduṣaḥ budhaḥ guruḥ

original: BhP_08.24.050/3 tvamarkadṛk sarvadṛśāṃ samīkṣaṇo vṛto gururnaḥ svagatiṃ bubhutsatām
analyzed: tvam arka dṛś sarva dṛśām samīkṣaṇaḥ vṛtaḥ guruḥ naḥ sva gatim bubhutsatām

original: BhP_08.24.051/1 jano janasyādiśate 'satīṃ gatiṃ yayā prapadyeta duratyayaṃ tamaḥ
analyzed: janaḥ janasya ādiśate satīm gatim yayā prapadyeta duratyayam tamaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.051/3 tvaṃ tvavyayaṃ jñānamamoghamañjasā prapadyate yena jano nijaṃ padam
analyzed: tvam tu avyayam jñānam amogham añjasā prapadyate yena janaḥ nijam padam

original: BhP_08.24.052/1 tvaṃ sarvalokasya suhṛt priyeśvaro hy ātmā gururjñānamabhīṣṭasiddhiḥ
analyzed: tvam sarva lokasya suhṛd priya īśvaraḥ hi ātmā guruḥ jñānam abhīṣṭa siddhiḥ

original: BhP_08.24.052/3 tathāpi loko na bhavantamandhadhīr jānāti santaṃ hṛdi baddhakāmaḥ
analyzed: tathā api lokaḥ na bhavantam andha dhīḥ jānāti santam hṛdi baddha kāmaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.053/1 taṃ tvāmahaṃ devavaraṃ vareṇyaṃ prapadya īśaṃ pratibodhanāya
analyzed: tam tvām aham deva varam vareṇyam prapadye īśam pratibodhanāya

original: BhP_08.24.053/3 chindhy arthadīpairbhagavan vacobhir granthīn hṛdayyān vivṛṇu svamokaḥ
analyzed: chindhi artha dīpaiḥ bhagavan vacobhiḥ granthīn hṛdayyān vivṛṇu sva mokaḥ
śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_08.24.054/1 ity uktavantaṃ nṛpatiṃ bhagavān ādipūruṣaḥ
analyzed: iti uktavantam nṛpatim bhagavān ādipūruṣaḥ
matsya rūpī mahā ambhodhau viharan tattvam abravīt
purāṇa saṃhitām divyām sāṅkhya yoga kriyāvatīm
satyavratasya rājarṣeḥ ātma guhyam aśeṣatas
aśrauṣīt ṛṣibhiḥ sākam ātma tattvam asaṃśayam

original: BhP_08.24.056/3 nāvy āsīno bhagavatā proktaṃ brahma sanātanam
analyzed: nāvi āsīnaḥ bhagavatā proktam brahma sanātanam
atīta pralaya apāye utthitāya sa vedhase
hatvā asuram hayagrīvam vedān pratyāharat hariḥ

original: BhP_08.24.058/1 sa tu satyavrato rājā jñānavijñānasaṃyutaḥ
analyzed: sa tu satyavrataḥ rājā jñāna vijñāna saṃyutaḥ
viṣṇoḥ prasādāt kalpe smin āsīt vaivasvataḥ manuḥ
satyavratasya rājarṣeḥ māyā matsyasya śārṅgiṇaḥ

original: BhP_08.24.059/3 saṃvādaṃ mahadākhyānaṃ śrutvā mucyeta kilbiṣāt
analyzed: saṃvādam mahat ākhyānam śrutvā mucyeta kilbiṣāt
avatāram hareḥ yaḥ yam kīrtayet anvaham naraḥ

original: BhP_08.24.060/3 saṅkalpāstasya sidhyanti sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
analyzed: saṅkalpāḥ tasya sidhyanti sa yāti paramām gatim
pralaya payasi dhātuḥ supta śakteḥ mukhebhyaḥ
śruti gaṇam apanītam pratyupādatta hatvā
ditijam akathayat yaḥ brahma satya vratānām
tam aham akhila hetum jihmamīnam nataḥ smi
